xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.metrics</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">MetricsHandler.java</span></div><h1>MetricsHandler.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.metrics;

import com.clockify.addon.sdk.HttpResponse;
import com.clockify.addon.sdk.RequestHandler;
import io.micrometer.prometheusmetrics.PrometheusConfig;
import io.micrometer.prometheusmetrics.PrometheusMeterRegistry;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;

/**
 * Simple Prometheus metrics endpoint. Exposes a singleton PrometheusMeterRegistry
 * and scrapes it on each request. Content type matches Prometheus text format.
 */
<span class="nc" id="L13">public class MetricsHandler implements RequestHandler {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L14">    private static final PrometheusMeterRegistry REGISTRY = new PrometheusMeterRegistry(PrometheusConfig.DEFAULT);</span>

    public static PrometheusMeterRegistry registry() {
<span class="fc" id="L17">        return REGISTRY;</span>
    }

    @Override
    public HttpResponse handle(HttpServletRequest request) {
<span class="nc" id="L22">        String scrape = REGISTRY.scrape();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L23">        return HttpResponse.ok(scrape, &quot;text/plain; version=0.0.4; charset=utf-8&quot;);</span>
    }
}

"http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>ClockifyHttpClient.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.http</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">ClockifyHttpClient.java</span></div><h1>ClockifyHttpClient.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.http;

import java.net.URI;
import java.net.http.HttpClient;
import java.net.http.HttpRequest;
import java.net.http.HttpResponse;
import java.time.Duration;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.Optional;

/**
 * Minimal HTTP client wrapper with sane timeouts and retries for 429/5xx.
 * Adds the x-addon-token header for workspace-scoped requests.
 */
public class ClockifyHttpClient {
    private final HttpClient client;
    private final String baseUrl;
    private final Duration timeout;
    private final int maxRetries;

    public ClockifyHttpClient(String baseUrl) {
<span class="fc" id="L22">        this(baseUrl, Duration.ofSeconds(10), 3);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L23">    }</span>

<span class="fc" id="L25">    public ClockifyHttpClient(String baseUrl, Duration timeout, int maxRetries) {</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L26" title="All 2 branches covered.">        this.baseUrl = baseUrl.endsWith(&quot;/&quot;) ? baseUrl.substring(0, baseUrl.length() - 1) : baseUrl;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L27">        this.timeout = timeout;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L28">        this.maxRetries = maxRetries;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L29">        this.client = HttpClient.newBuilder().connectTimeout(timeout).build();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L30">    }</span>

    public HttpResponse&lt;String&gt; get(String path, String addonToken, Map&lt;String, String&gt; headers) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L33">        HttpRequest.Builder b = baseRequest(path, addonToken, headers).GET();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L34">        return sendWithRetry(b.build());</span>
    }

    public HttpResponse&lt;String&gt; postJson(String path, String addonToken, String jsonBody, Map&lt;String, String&gt; headers) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L38">        HttpRequest.Builder b = baseRequest(path, addonToken, headers)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L39">                .header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L40">                .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.ofString(jsonBody));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L41">        return sendWithRetry(b.build());</span>
    }

    public HttpResponse&lt;String&gt; putJson(String path, String addonToken, String jsonBody, Map&lt;String, String&gt; headers) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L45">        HttpRequest.Builder b = baseRequest(path, addonToken, headers)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L46">                .header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L47">                .PUT(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.ofString(jsonBody));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L48">        return sendWithRetry(b.build());</span>
    }

    public HttpResponse&lt;String&gt; patchJson(String path, String addonToken, String jsonBody, Map&lt;String, String&gt; headers) throws Exception {
<span class="nc" id="L52">        HttpRequest.Builder b = baseRequest(path, addonToken, headers)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L53">                .header(&quot;Content-Type&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L54">                .method(&quot;PATCH&quot;, HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.ofString(jsonBody));</span>
<span class="nc" id="L55">        return sendWithRetry(b.build());</span>
    }

    public HttpResponse&lt;String&gt; delete(String path, String addonToken, Map&lt;String, String&gt; headers) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L59">        HttpRequest.Builder b = baseRequest(path, addonToken, headers).DELETE();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L60">        return sendWithRetry(b.build());</span>
    }

    private HttpRequest.Builder baseRequest(String path, String addonToken, Map&lt;String, String&gt; headers) {
<span class="fc" id="L64">        HttpRequest.Builder b = HttpRequest.newBuilder()</span>
<span class="fc" id="L65">                .uri(URI.create(baseUrl + normalize(path)))</span>
<span class="fc" id="L66">                .timeout(timeout)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L67">                .header(&quot;x-addon-token&quot;, addonToken)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L68">                .header(&quot;Accept&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L69" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (headers != null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L70">            headers.forEach(b::header);</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L72">        return b;</span>
    }

    private static String normalize(String p) {
<span class="fc bfc" id="L76" title="All 2 branches covered.">        return p.startsWith(&quot;/&quot;) ? p : &quot;/&quot; + p;</span>
    }

    private HttpResponse&lt;String&gt; sendWithRetry(HttpRequest req) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L80">        int attempt = 0;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L81">        long backoffMs = 300L;</span>
        while (true) {
<span class="fc" id="L83">            attempt++;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L84">            HttpResponse&lt;String&gt; resp = client.send(req, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString());</span>
<span class="fc" id="L85">            int code = resp.statusCode();</span>

<span class="fc bfc" id="L87" title="All 4 branches covered.">            if (code &lt; 500 &amp;&amp; code != 429) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L88">                return resp; // success or client error</span>
            }

<span class="fc bfc" id="L91" title="All 2 branches covered.">            if (attempt &gt; maxRetries) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L92">                return resp; // give up</span>
            }

<span class="fc" id="L95">            long sleep = retryAfterMillis(resp).orElse(backoffMs);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L96">            Thread.sleep(sleep);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L97">            backoffMs = Math.min(backoffMs * 2, 3000L);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L98">        }</span>
    }

    private Optional&lt;Long&gt; retryAfterMillis(HttpResponse&lt;?&gt; resp) {
<span class="fc" id="L102">        return resp.headers().firstValue(&quot;Retry-After&quot;).map(v -&gt; {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L103">            try { return Long.parseLong(v) * 1000L; } catch (NumberFormatException e) { return 0L; }</span>
        });
    }
}

"http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">RequestIdPropagationFilter.java</span></div><h1>RequestIdPropagationFilter.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware;

import jakarta.servlet.Filter;
import jakarta.servlet.FilterChain;
import jakarta.servlet.ServletException;
import jakarta.servlet.ServletRequest;
import jakarta.servlet.ServletResponse;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import org.slf4j.MDC;

import java.io.IOException;

/**
 * Ensures {@code X-Request-Id} is included on every HTTP response.
 * &lt;p&gt;
 * DiagnosticContextFilter generates/attaches a request id early in the chain; this filter
 * simply copies the attribute (or current MDC value) onto the response headers after
 * the downstream handlers finish.
 * &lt;/p&gt;
 */
<span class="fc" id="L22">public class RequestIdPropagationFilter implements Filter {</span>
    private static final String REQUEST_ID_HEADER = &quot;X-Request-Id&quot;;

    @Override
    public void doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain)
            throws IOException, ServletException {
        try {
<span class="fc" id="L29">            chain.doFilter(request, response);</span>
        } finally {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L31" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">            if (request instanceof HttpServletRequest httpRequest &amp;&amp;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L32">                    response instanceof HttpServletResponse httpResponse) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L33">                Object attr = httpRequest.getAttribute(DiagnosticContextFilter.REQUEST_ID_ATTR);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L34" title="All 2 branches covered.">                String requestId = attr != null ? attr.toString() : MDC.get(&quot;requestId&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L35" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">                if (requestId != null &amp;&amp; !requestId.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L36">                    httpResponse.setHeader(REQUEST_ID_HEADER, requestId);</span>
                }
            }
        }
<span class="fc" id="L40">    }</span>
}
</pre><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" id="d12"/><td class="ctr2" id="e12">n/a</td><td class="ctr1" id="f12">0</td><td class="ctr2" id="g12">2</td><td class="ctr1" id="h12">0</td><td class="ctr2" id="i13">5</td><td class="ctr1" class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>CorsFilter.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">CorsFilter.java</span></div><h1>CorsFilter.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware;

import jakarta.servlet.*;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.net.URI;
import java.util.*;

/**
 * Minimal CORS filter with explicit origin allowlist via ADDON_CORS_ORIGINS env var.
 *
 * ADDON_CORS_ORIGINS: comma-separated list of exact origins to allow, e.g.:
 *   https://app.clockify.me,https://example.com
 */
public class CorsFilter implements Filter {
<span class="fc" id="L20">    private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(CorsFilter.class);</span>

    private final Set&lt;String&gt; allowedOrigins;
    private final boolean allowCredentials;
    private final List&lt;AllowedWildcard&gt; wildcardOrigins;

    public CorsFilter() {
<span class="nc" id="L27">        this(System.getenv(&quot;ADDON_CORS_ORIGINS&quot;),</span>
<span class="nc" id="L28">             Boolean.parseBoolean(System.getenv().getOrDefault(&quot;ADDON_CORS_ALLOW_CREDENTIALS&quot;, &quot;false&quot;)));</span>
<span class="nc" id="L29">    }</span>

    public CorsFilter(String originsCsv) {
<span class="nc" id="L32">        this(originsCsv, false);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L33">    }</span>

<span class="fc" id="L35">    public CorsFilter(String originsCsv, boolean allowCredentials) {</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L36" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (originsCsv == null || originsCsv.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L37">            this.allowedOrigins = Set.of();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L38">            this.wildcardOrigins = List.of();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L39">            logger.info(&quot;CorsFilter initialized with empty allowlist; CORS disabled&quot;);</span>
        } else {
<span class="fc" id="L41">            Set&lt;String&gt; s = new HashSet&lt;&gt;();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L42">            List&lt;AllowedWildcard&gt; wildcards = new ArrayList&lt;&gt;();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L43">            Arrays.stream(originsCsv.split(&quot;,&quot;))</span>
<span class="fc" id="L44">                    .map(String::trim)</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L45" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">                    .filter(v -&gt; !v.isEmpty())</span>
<span class="fc" id="L46">                    .forEach(v -&gt; {</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L47" title="All 2 branches covered.">                        if (v.contains(&quot;*&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L48">                            AllowedWildcard aw = AllowedWildcard.parse(v);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L49" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">                            if (aw != null) wildcards.add(aw);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L50">                            else s.add(v); // fallback to exact if unparsable</span>
<span class="fc" id="L51">                        } else {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L52">                            s.add(v);</span>
                        }
<span class="fc" id="L54">                    });</span>
<span class="fc" id="L55">            this.allowedOrigins = Set.copyOf(s);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L56">            this.wildcardOrigins = Collections.unmodifiableList(wildcards);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L57">            logger.info(&quot;CorsFilter allowlist: {}&quot;, this.allowedOrigins);</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L59">        this.allowCredentials = allowCredentials;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L60">    }</span>

    @Override
    public void doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain) throws IOException, ServletException {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L64" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (!(request instanceof HttpServletRequest req) || !(response instanceof HttpServletResponse resp)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L65">            chain.doFilter(request, response);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L66">            return;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L69">        String origin = req.getHeader(&quot;Origin&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L70" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        boolean preflight = &quot;OPTIONS&quot;.equalsIgnoreCase(req.getMethod()) &amp;&amp; req.getHeader(&quot;Access-Control-Request-Method&quot;) != null;</span>

        // Always vary on Origin for caches
<span class="fc" id="L73">        resp.addHeader(&quot;Vary&quot;, &quot;Origin&quot;);</span>

<span class="fc bfc" id="L75" title="All 6 branches covered.">        if (origin != null &amp;&amp; (allowedOrigins.contains(origin) || isWildcardAllowed(origin))) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L76">            resp.setHeader(&quot;Access-Control-Allow-Origin&quot;, origin);</span>
            // Allow typical headers used in add-ons
<span class="fc" id="L78">            resp.setHeader(&quot;Access-Control-Allow-Headers&quot;, &quot;Content-Type, Authorization, clockify-webhook-signature&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L79">            resp.setHeader(&quot;Access-Control-Allow-Methods&quot;, &quot;GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L80">            resp.setHeader(&quot;Access-Control-Max-Age&quot;, &quot;600&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L81" title="All 2 branches covered.">            if (allowCredentials) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L82">                resp.setHeader(&quot;Access-Control-Allow-Credentials&quot;, &quot;true&quot;);</span>
            }

<span class="fc bfc" id="L85" title="All 2 branches covered.">            if (preflight) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L86">                resp.setStatus(204);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L87">                return;</span>
            }
<span class="fc bfc" id="L89" title="All 2 branches covered.">        } else if (preflight) {</span>
            // Unknown origin preflight  reject quickly
<span class="fc" id="L91">            resp.setStatus(403);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L92">            return;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L95">        chain.doFilter(request, response);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L96">    }</span>

    private boolean isWildcardAllowed(String origin) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L99" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (wildcardOrigins.isEmpty() || origin == null) return false;</span>
        try {
<span class="fc" id="L101">            URI o = URI.create(origin);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L102">            String scheme = Optional.ofNullable(o.getScheme()).orElse(&quot;&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L103">            String host = Optional.ofNullable(o.getHost()).orElse(&quot;&quot;).toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L104" title="All 2 branches covered.">            for (AllowedWildcard aw : wildcardOrigins) {</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L105" title="All 2 branches covered.">                if (aw.matches(scheme, host)) return true;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L106">            }</span>
<span class="pc" id="L107">        } catch (Exception ignored) {}</span>
<span class="fc" id="L108">        return false;</span>
    }

    private static final class AllowedWildcard {
        final String scheme; // e.g., https
        final String suffix; // e.g., clockify.me

<span class="fc" id="L115">        private AllowedWildcard(String scheme, String suffix) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L116">            this.scheme = scheme;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L117">            this.suffix = suffix;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L118">        }</span>

        static AllowedWildcard parse(String pattern) {
            // Expect formats like: https://*.example.com or http://*.example.com
            try {
<span class="fc" id="L123">                int schemeEnd = pattern.indexOf(&quot;://&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L124" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">                String scheme = schemeEnd &gt; 0 ? pattern.substring(0, schemeEnd).toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT) : &quot;&quot;;</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L125" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">                String host = schemeEnd &gt; 0 ? pattern.substring(schemeEnd + 3) : pattern;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L126">                host = host.trim().toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L127" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">                if (!host.startsWith(&quot;*.&quot;) || host.length() &lt; 3) return null;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L128">                String suffix = host.substring(2); // drop '*.'</span>
<span class="fc" id="L129">                return new AllowedWildcard(scheme, suffix);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L130">            } catch (Exception e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L131">                return null;</span>
            }
        }

        boolean matches(String originScheme, String originHost) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L136" title="3 of 6 branches missed.">            if (scheme != null &amp;&amp; !scheme.isBlank() &amp;&amp; !scheme.equalsIgnoreCase(originScheme)) return false;</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L137" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">            return originHost.endsWith(suffix) &amp;&amp; !originHost.equals(suffix); // must be a subdomain</span>
        }
    }
}
</pre><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>CsrfProtectionFilter.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">CsrfProtectionFilter.java</span></div><h1>CsrfProtectionFilter.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware;

import com.clockify.addon.sdk.security.AuditLogger;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

import jakarta.servlet.*;
import jakarta.servlet.http.Cookie;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpSession;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.security.SecureRandom;
import java.util.Base64;
import java.util.Set;

/**
 * SECURITY: CSRF (Cross-Site Request Forgery) protection filter.
 *
 * Clockify addon webhooks use webhook signatures (HMAC-based) which naturally provide
 * CSRF protection since attackers cannot forge valid signatures without the secret.
 *
 * However, this filter adds defense-in-depth CSRF protection for:
 * - Custom endpoints that accept form data or cookies
 * - State-changing operations (POST/PUT/DELETE/PATCH)
 * - Browser-based interactions (where applicable)
 *
 * Implementation: Token-based CSRF protection
 * - Generates a unique CSRF token per session
 * - Validates token on state-changing requests (POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH)
 * - Tokens must be provided via header (X-CSRF-Token) or parameter (__csrf)
 * - Webhook endpoints automatically bypass CSRF (they use signature validation)
 *
 * Note: Clockify webhooks are NOT vulnerable to CSRF because they:
 * 1. Use HMAC-SHA256 signatures (cryptographic authentication)
 * 2. Require specific content-type headers
 * 3. Cannot be triggered by browser form submissions
 */
public class CsrfProtectionFilter implements Filter {
<span class="fc" id="L40">    private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(CsrfProtectionFilter.class);</span>

    private static final String CSRF_TOKEN_ATTR = &quot;_csrf_token&quot;;
    private static final String CSRF_COOKIE_NAME = &quot;clockify-addon-csrf&quot;;
    private static final String CSRF_HEADER = &quot;X-CSRF-Token&quot;;
    private static final String CSRF_PARAM = &quot;__csrf&quot;;
    private static final int TOKEN_LENGTH = 32;  // 256 bits
<span class="fc" id="L47">    private static final boolean COOKIE_ATTRIBUTE_SUPPORTED = cookieAttributeSupported();</span>

<span class="fc" id="L49">    private final SecureRandom random = new SecureRandom();</span>
    private final String sameSiteAttribute;

<span class="fc" id="L52">    private static final Set&lt;String&gt; EXEMPT_PREFIXES = Set.of(</span>
            &quot;/webhook&quot;,
            &quot;/lifecycle&quot;,
            &quot;/health&quot;,
            &quot;/actuator&quot;
    );

<span class="fc" id="L59">    private static final String[] SIGNATURE_HEADERS = {</span>
            &quot;clockify-webhook-signature&quot;,
            &quot;x-clockify-webhook-signature&quot;,
            &quot;Clockify-Signature&quot;,
            &quot;X-Clockify-Signature&quot;
    };

    public CsrfProtectionFilter() {
<span class="fc" id="L67">        this(System.getenv().getOrDefault(&quot;ADDON_CSRF_SAMESITE&quot;, &quot;None&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L68">    }</span>

<span class="fc" id="L70">    public CsrfProtectionFilter(String sameSiteAttribute) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L71">        this.sameSiteAttribute = normalizeSameSite(sameSiteAttribute);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L72">    }</span>

    @Override
    public void doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain)
            throws IOException, ServletException {

<span class="pc bpc" id="L78" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (!(request instanceof HttpServletRequest) || !(response instanceof HttpServletResponse)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L79">            chain.doFilter(request, response);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L80">            return;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L83">        HttpServletRequest httpRequest = (HttpServletRequest) request;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L84">        HttpServletResponse httpResponse = (HttpServletResponse) response;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L85">        String method = httpRequest.getMethod();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L86">        String path = requestPath(httpRequest);</span>

<span class="fc bfc" id="L88" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (isExempt(httpRequest, path, method)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L89">            logger.debug(&quot;CSRF check exempted for path: {}&quot;, path);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L90">            chain.doFilter(request, response);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L91">            return;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L94">        TokenState tokenState = getOrCreateCsrfToken(httpRequest);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L95">        String csrfToken = tokenState.token();</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L96" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (tokenState.generated() || isSafeMethod(method)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L97">            sendTokenCookie(httpResponse, httpRequest, csrfToken);</span>
        }

<span class="pc bpc" id="L100" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (isSafeMethod(method)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L101">            chain.doFilter(request, response);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L102">            return;</span>
        }

        // Validate CSRF token on state-changing requests
<span class="fc" id="L106">        String providedToken = extractCsrfToken(httpRequest);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L107" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (!validateCsrfToken(csrfToken, providedToken)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L108">            logger.warn(&quot;SECURITY: CSRF token validation failed for {} {} from {}&quot;,</span>
<span class="fc" id="L109">                    method, path, getClientIp(httpRequest));</span>

            // Audit log CSRF failure
<span class="fc" id="L112">            AuditLogger.log(AuditLogger.AuditEvent.CSRF_TOKEN_INVALID)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L113">                    .clientIp(getClientIp(httpRequest))</span>
<span class="fc" id="L114">                    .detail(&quot;path&quot;, path)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L115">                    .detail(&quot;method&quot;, method)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L116">                    .error();</span>

<span class="fc" id="L118">            sendCsrfError(httpResponse);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L119">            return;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L122">        AuditLogger.log(AuditLogger.AuditEvent.CSRF_TOKEN_VALIDATED)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L123">                .clientIp(getClientIp(httpRequest))</span>
<span class="fc" id="L124">                .detail(&quot;path&quot;, path)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L125">                .detail(&quot;method&quot;, method)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L126">                .info();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L127">        chain.doFilter(request, response);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L128">    }</span>

    /**
     * Gets existing CSRF token from session, or creates a new one.
     */
    private TokenState getOrCreateCsrfToken(HttpServletRequest request) {
<span class="fc" id="L134">        HttpSession session = request.getSession(true);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L135">        Object existing = session.getAttribute(CSRF_TOKEN_ATTR);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L136" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (existing instanceof String token &amp;&amp; !token.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L137">            return new TokenState(token, false);</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L140">        byte[] randomBytes = new byte[TOKEN_LENGTH];</span>
<span class="fc" id="L141">        random.nextBytes(randomBytes);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L142">        String token = Base64.getUrlEncoder().withoutPadding().encodeToString(randomBytes);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L143">        session.setAttribute(CSRF_TOKEN_ATTR, token);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L144">        AuditLogger.log(AuditLogger.AuditEvent.CSRF_TOKEN_GENERATED)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L145">                .clientIp(getClientIp(request))</span>
<span class="fc" id="L146">                .detail(&quot;path&quot;, request.getRequestURI())</span>
<span class="fc" id="L147">                .info();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L148">        logger.debug(&quot;Generated new CSRF token for session&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L149">        return new TokenState(token, true);</span>
    }

    /**
     * Extracts CSRF token from request (header preferred, then parameter).
     */
    private String extractCsrfToken(HttpServletRequest request) {
        // Try header first (preferred, XHR/API friendly)
<span class="fc" id="L157">        String token = request.getHeader(CSRF_HEADER);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L158" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (token != null &amp;&amp; !token.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L159">            return token;</span>
        }

        // Fall back to parameter (form submission)
<span class="fc" id="L163">        token = request.getParameter(CSRF_PARAM);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L164" title="3 of 4 branches missed.">        if (token != null &amp;&amp; !token.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L165">            return token;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L168">        return null;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Validates CSRF token using constant-time comparison.
     */
    private boolean validateCsrfToken(String expected, String provided) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L175" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (expected == null || provided == null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L176">            return false;</span>
        }

        // Use constant-time comparison to prevent timing attacks
<span class="fc" id="L180">        return constantTimeEquals(expected, provided);</span>
    }

    /**
     * Constant-time string comparison to prevent timing attacks.
     */
    private boolean constantTimeEquals(String a, String b) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L187" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (a.length() != b.length()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L188">            return false;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L191">        int result = 0;</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L192" title="All 2 branches covered.">        for (int i = 0; i &lt; a.length(); i++) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L193">            result |= a.charAt(i) ^ b.charAt(i);</span>
        }

<span class="pc bpc" id="L196" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        return result == 0;</span>
    }

    private boolean isExempt(HttpServletRequest request, String path, String method) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L200" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (path == null) return true;</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L201" title="All 2 branches covered.">        for (String prefix : EXEMPT_PREFIXES) {</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L202" title="All 2 branches covered.">            if (path.startsWith(prefix)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L203">                return true;</span>
            }
<span class="fc" id="L205">        }</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L206" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (hasSignatureHeader(request)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L207">            return true;</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L209">        return isSafeMethod(method);</span>
    }

    private boolean hasSignatureHeader(HttpServletRequest request) {
<span class="fc bfc" id="L213" title="All 2 branches covered.">        for (String header : SIGNATURE_HEADERS) {</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L214" title="All 2 branches covered.">            if (request.getHeader(header) != null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L215">                return true;</span>
            }
        }
<span class="fc" id="L218">        return false;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Checks if HTTP method is safe (doesn't change state).
     */
    private boolean isSafeMethod(String method) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L225" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (method == null) return true;</span>

<span class="fc bfc" id="L227" title="All 2 branches covered.">        switch (method.toUpperCase()) {</span>
            case &quot;GET&quot;:
            case &quot;HEAD&quot;:
            case &quot;OPTIONS&quot;:
            case &quot;TRACE&quot;:
<span class="fc" id="L232">                return true;</span>
            default:
<span class="fc" id="L234">                return false;</span>
        }
    }

    /**
     * Sends 403 Forbidden response for CSRF token validation failure.
     */
    private void sendCsrfError(HttpServletResponse response) throws IOException {
<span class="fc" id="L242">        response.setStatus(403);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L243">        response.setContentType(&quot;application/json&quot;);</span>

<span class="fc" id="L245">        String json = &quot;{\&quot;error\&quot;:\&quot;csrf_token_invalid\&quot;,\&quot;message\&quot;:\&quot;CSRF token validation failed. Please provide a valid &quot; +</span>
                CSRF_HEADER + &quot; header or &quot; + CSRF_PARAM + &quot; parameter.\&quot;}&quot;;

<span class="fc" id="L248">        response.getWriter().write(json);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L249">        response.getWriter().flush();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L250">    }</span>

    private void sendTokenCookie(HttpServletResponse response, HttpServletRequest request, String token) {
<span class="fc" id="L253">        boolean secure = isSecureRequest(request);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L254" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (COOKIE_ATTRIBUTE_SUPPORTED) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L255">            Cookie cookie = new Cookie(CSRF_COOKIE_NAME, token);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L256">            cookie.setPath(&quot;/&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L257">            cookie.setHttpOnly(false); // exposed to JS for double-submit header</span>
<span class="fc" id="L258">            cookie.setSecure(secure);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L259">            cookie.setMaxAge(-1);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L260">            cookie.setAttribute(&quot;SameSite&quot;, sameSiteAttribute);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L261">            response.addCookie(cookie);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L262">            return;</span>
        }

        // Fallback for Servlet containers that do not support Cookie#setAttribute (Servlet &lt;= 5)
<span class="nc" id="L266">        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L267">        sb.append(CSRF_COOKIE_NAME).append(&quot;=&quot;).append(token).append(&quot;; Path=/&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L268" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (secure) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L269">            sb.append(&quot;; Secure&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="nc" id="L271">        sb.append(&quot;; SameSite=&quot;).append(sameSiteAttribute);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L272">        response.addHeader(&quot;Set-Cookie&quot;, sb.toString());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L273">    }</span>

    private static String normalizeSameSite(String value) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L276" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (value == null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L277">            return &quot;None&quot;;</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L279">        String trimmed = value.trim();</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L280" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (trimmed.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L281">            return &quot;None&quot;;</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L283">        String upper = trimmed.toUpperCase();</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L284" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (&quot;STRICT&quot;.equals(upper)) return &quot;Strict&quot;;</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L285" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (&quot;LAX&quot;.equals(upper)) return &quot;Lax&quot;;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L286">        return &quot;None&quot;;</span>
    }

    private static boolean cookieAttributeSupported() {
        try {
<span class="fc" id="L291">            Cookie.class.getMethod(&quot;setAttribute&quot;, String.class, String.class);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L292">            return true;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L293">        } catch (NoSuchMethodException ex) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L294">            return false;</span>
        }
    }

    private boolean isSecureRequest(HttpServletRequest request) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L299" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (request.isSecure()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L300">            return true;</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L302">        String forwardedProto = request.getHeader(&quot;X-Forwarded-Proto&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L303" title="3 of 4 branches missed.">        return forwardedProto != null &amp;&amp; forwardedProto.equalsIgnoreCase(&quot;https&quot;);</span>
    }

    private String getClientIp(HttpServletRequest request) {
<span class="fc" id="L307">        String ip = request.getHeader(&quot;X-Forwarded-For&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L308" title="3 of 4 branches missed.">        if (ip == null || ip.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L309">            ip = request.getHeader(&quot;X-Real-IP&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="pc bpc" id="L311" title="3 of 4 branches missed.">        if (ip == null || ip.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L312">            ip = request.getRemoteAddr();</span>
        }

<span class="pc bpc" id="L315" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (ip != null &amp;&amp; ip.contains(&quot;,&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L316">            ip = ip.split(&quot;,&quot;)[0].trim();</span>
        }

<span class="pc bpc" id="L319" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        return ip != null ? ip : &quot;unknown&quot;;</span>
    }

    private String requestPath(HttpServletRequest request) {
<span class="fc" id="L323">        String uri = request.getRequestURI();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L324">        String context = request.getContextPath();</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L325" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (uri == null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L326">            return null;</span>
        }
<span class="pc bpc" id="L328" title="1 of 6 branches missed.">        if (context != null &amp;&amp; !context.isBlank() &amp;&amp; uri.startsWith(context)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L329">            return uri.substring(context.length());</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L331">        return uri;</span>
    }

<span class="fc" id="L334">    private record TokenState(String token, boolean generated) {}</span>

    @Override
    public void init(FilterConfig filterConfig) throws ServletException {
<span class="fc" id="L338">        logger.info(&quot;CSRF protection filter initialized&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L339">    }</span>

    @Override
    public void destroy() {
<span class="fc" id="L343">        logger.info(&quot;CSRF protection filter destroyed&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L344">    }</span>
}

class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">RequestLoggingFilter.java</span></div><h1>RequestLoggingFilter.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware;

import com.clockify.addon.sdk.logging.RedactingLogger;
import jakarta.servlet.*;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.Enumeration;
import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
import java.util.Map;

/**
 * Minimal request logging filter with header scrubbing.
 * Off by default; wire it in your server/app only when needed.
 */
<span class="fc" id="L16">public class RequestLoggingFilter implements Filter {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L17">    private static final RedactingLogger redactingLogger = RedactingLogger.get(RequestLoggingFilter.class);</span>

    @Override
    public void doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain) throws IOException, ServletException {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L21" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (request instanceof HttpServletRequest req) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L22">            String method = req.getMethod();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L23">            String path = req.getRequestURI();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L24">            Map&lt;String, String&gt; headers = collectHeaders(req);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L25">            redactingLogger.infoRequest(method, path, headers);</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L27">        chain.doFilter(request, response);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L28">    }</span>

    private Map&lt;String, String&gt; collectHeaders(HttpServletRequest req) {
<span class="fc" id="L31">        Map&lt;String, String&gt; headers = new LinkedHashMap&lt;&gt;();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L32">        Enumeration&lt;String&gt; names = req.getHeaderNames();</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L33" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (names != null) {</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L34" title="All 2 branches covered.">            while (names.hasMoreElements()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L35">                String name = names.nextElement();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L36">                String value = req.getHeader(name);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L37">                headers.put(name, value);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L38">            }</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L40">        return headers;</span>
    }

    public static Map&lt;String, String&gt; sanitizeHeaders(Map&lt;String, String&gt; headers) {
<span class="fc" id="L44">        return RedactingLogger.redactHeaders(headers);</span>
    }
}

0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>SecurityHeadersFilter.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">SecurityHeadersFilter.java</span></div><h1>SecurityHeadersFilter.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware;

import jakarta.servlet.*;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

import java.io.IOException;

/**
 * Simple security headers filter.
 * - X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
 * - Referrer-Policy: no-referrer
 * - Strict-Transport-Security: only when the request is secure or forwarded as https
 * - Content-Security-Policy: set frame-ancestors if ADDON_FRAME_ANCESTORS env is present
 */
public class SecurityHeadersFilter implements Filter {
<span class="fc" id="L19">    private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(SecurityHeadersFilter.class);</span>

    private final String frameAncestors;

    public SecurityHeadersFilter() {
<span class="nc" id="L24">        this(System.getenv(&quot;ADDON_FRAME_ANCESTORS&quot;));</span>
<span class="nc" id="L25">    }</span>

<span class="fc" id="L27">    public SecurityHeadersFilter(String frameAncestors) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L28">        this.frameAncestors = frameAncestors;</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L29" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (frameAncestors == null || frameAncestors.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L30">            logger.info(&quot;SecurityHeadersFilter initialized without frame-ancestors (CSP not set). Use ADDON_FRAME_ANCESTORS to enable.&quot;);</span>
        } else {
<span class="fc" id="L32">            logger.info(&quot;SecurityHeadersFilter will set CSP frame-ancestors: {}&quot;, frameAncestors);</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L34">    }</span>

    @Override
    public void doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain) throws IOException, ServletException {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L38" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (response instanceof HttpServletResponse resp &amp;&amp; request instanceof HttpServletRequest req) {</span>
            // Basic security headers
<span class="fc" id="L40">            resp.setHeader(&quot;X-Content-Type-Options&quot;, &quot;nosniff&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L41">            resp.setHeader(&quot;Referrer-Policy&quot;, &quot;no-referrer&quot;);</span>

            // HSTS only if secure (or forwarded as https)
<span class="fc" id="L44">            boolean secure = req.isSecure();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L45">            String forwardedProto = req.getHeader(&quot;X-Forwarded-Proto&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L46" title="1 of 6 branches missed.">            if (secure || (forwardedProto != null &amp;&amp; forwardedProto.equalsIgnoreCase(&quot;https&quot;))) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L47">                resp.setHeader(&quot;Strict-Transport-Security&quot;, &quot;max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains&quot;);</span>
            }

            // Optional CSP frame-ancestors (avoid breaking embedding unless explicitly configured)
<span class="pc bpc" id="L51" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">            if (frameAncestors != null &amp;&amp; !frameAncestors.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L52">                resp.setHeader(&quot;Content-Security-Policy&quot;, &quot;frame-ancestors &quot; + frameAncestors);</span>
            }
        }

<span class="fc" id="L56">        chain.doFilter(request, response);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L57">    }</span>
}

id="j2">0</td><td class="ctr2" id="k0">1</td></tr><tr><td id="a5"><a href="CriticalEndpointRateLimiter.java.html#L168" class="el_method">getIdentifier(HttpServletRequest)</a></td><td class="bar" class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>RequestSizeLimitFilter.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">RequestSizeLimitFilter.java</span></div><h1>RequestSizeLimitFilter.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware;

import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

import jakarta.servlet.*;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import java.io.IOException;

/**
 * SECURITY: Request size limit filter.
 *
 * Prevents DoS attacks via:
 * - Extremely large webhook payloads
 * - Memory exhaustion from big uploads
 * - Unbounded request processing
 *
 * Limits:
 * - Max 10 MB per request (configurable)
 * - Checked before body is read
 * - Fast reject (413 Payload Too Large)
 *
 * Environment variable: MAX_REQUEST_SIZE_MB (default: 10)
 */
public class RequestSizeLimitFilter implements Filter {
<span class="fc" id="L27">    private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(RequestSizeLimitFilter.class);</span>

    public static final long ONE_MB = 1024L * 1024L;
    private final long maxSizeBytes;
    private static final long DEFAULT_MAX_SIZE_MB = 10;

    /**
     * Creates request size limit filter with default limit (10 MB).
     */
    public RequestSizeLimitFilter() {
<span class="fc" id="L37">        this(DEFAULT_MAX_SIZE_MB);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L38">    }</span>

    /**
     * Creates request size limit filter with custom limit in MB.
     *
     * @param maxSizeMB maximum request size in megabytes
     */
<span class="fc" id="L45">    public RequestSizeLimitFilter(long maxSizeMB) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L46">        this.maxSizeBytes = maxSizeMB * ONE_MB;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L47">        logger.info(&quot;Request size limit filter initialized: {}MB ({}bytes)&quot;, maxSizeMB, maxSizeBytes);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L48">    }</span>

    /**
     * Creates request size limit filter from environment variable.
     *
     * @return filter configured from MAX_REQUEST_SIZE_MB env var or default
     */
    public static RequestSizeLimitFilter fromEnvironment() {
<span class="fc" id="L56">        String maxMbEnv = System.getenv(&quot;MAX_REQUEST_SIZE_MB&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L57" title="3 of 4 branches missed.">        if (maxMbEnv != null &amp;&amp; !maxMbEnv.isBlank()) {</span>
            try {
<span class="nc" id="L59">                long maxMb = Long.parseLong(maxMbEnv);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L60">                return new RequestSizeLimitFilter(maxMb);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L61">            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L62">                logger.warn(&quot;Invalid MAX_REQUEST_SIZE_MB value: {} (using default: {}MB)&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L63">                        maxMbEnv, DEFAULT_MAX_SIZE_MB);</span>
            }
        }
<span class="fc" id="L66">        return new RequestSizeLimitFilter(DEFAULT_MAX_SIZE_MB);</span>
    }

    @Override
    public void doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain)
            throws IOException, ServletException {

<span class="pc bpc" id="L73" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (!(request instanceof HttpServletRequest) || !(response instanceof HttpServletResponse)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L74">            chain.doFilter(request, response);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L75">            return;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L78">        HttpServletRequest httpRequest = (HttpServletRequest) request;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L79">        HttpServletResponse httpResponse = (HttpServletResponse) response;</span>

        // Check Content-Length header
<span class="fc" id="L82">        int contentLength = httpRequest.getContentLength();</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L83" title="All 4 branches covered.">        if (contentLength &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; contentLength &gt; maxSizeBytes) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L84">            String clientIp = getClientIp(httpRequest);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L85">            String path = httpRequest.getRequestURI();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L86">            String method = httpRequest.getMethod();</span>

<span class="fc" id="L88">            logger.warn(&quot;SECURITY: Request size {} exceeds limit {} from {} ({} {})&quot;,</span>
<span class="fc" id="L89">                    contentLength, maxSizeBytes, clientIp, method, path);</span>

<span class="fc" id="L91">            sendSizeExceededError(httpResponse, maxSizeBytes / ONE_MB);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L92">            return;</span>
        }

        // For requests without Content-Length, wrap the input stream to check size
<span class="fc" id="L96">        ServletRequest wrappedRequest = new SizeLimitedRequestWrapper(httpRequest, maxSizeBytes);</span>

        try {
<span class="fc" id="L99">            chain.doFilter(wrappedRequest, response);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L100">        } catch (IOException e) {</span>
            // Check if size limit was exceeded
<span class="pc bpc" id="L102" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            if (e.getCause() instanceof SizeLimitExceededException) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L103">                logger.warn(&quot;SECURITY: Request size exceeded limit {} during processing from {}&quot;,</span>
<span class="fc" id="L104">                        maxSizeBytes, getClientIp(httpRequest));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L105">                sendSizeExceededError(httpResponse, maxSizeBytes / ONE_MB);</span>
            } else {
                // Re-throw other IOExceptions
<span class="nc" id="L108">                throw e;</span>
            }
<span class="fc" id="L110">        }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L111">    }</span>

    /**
     * Gets client IP address, accounting for proxies.
     */
    private String getClientIp(HttpServletRequest request) {
<span class="fc" id="L117">        String ip = request.getHeader(&quot;X-Forwarded-For&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L118" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (ip == null || ip.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L119">            ip = request.getHeader(&quot;X-Real-IP&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="pc bpc" id="L121" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (ip == null || ip.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L122">            ip = request.getRemoteAddr();</span>
        }

<span class="pc bpc" id="L125" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (ip != null &amp;&amp; ip.contains(&quot;,&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L126">            ip = ip.split(&quot;,&quot;)[0].trim();</span>
        }

<span class="pc bpc" id="L129" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        return ip != null ? ip : &quot;unknown&quot;;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Sends 413 Payload Too Large response.
     */
    private void sendSizeExceededError(HttpServletResponse response, long maxSizeMB) throws IOException {
<span class="fc" id="L136">        response.setStatus(413);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L137">        response.setContentType(&quot;application/json&quot;);</span>

<span class="fc" id="L139">        String json = String.format(</span>
                &quot;{\&quot;error\&quot;:\&quot;payload_too_large\&quot;,&quot; +
                &quot;\&quot;message\&quot;:\&quot;Request exceeds maximum size of %d MB\&quot;,&quot; +
                &quot;\&quot;max_size_mb\&quot;:%d}&quot;,
<span class="fc" id="L143">                maxSizeMB, maxSizeMB);</span>

<span class="fc" id="L145">        response.getWriter().write(json);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L146">        response.getWriter().flush();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L147">    }</span>

    @Override
    public void init(FilterConfig filterConfig) throws ServletException {
<span class="fc" id="L151">        logger.info(&quot;Request size limit filter initialized&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L152">    }</span>

    @Override
    public void destroy() {
<span class="fc" id="L156">        logger.info(&quot;Request size limit filter destroyed&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L157">    }</span>

    /**
     * Exception thrown when request size exceeds limit.
     */
    public static class SizeLimitExceededException extends ServletException {
        public SizeLimitExceededException(String message) {
<span class="fc" id="L164">            super(message);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L165">        }</span>
    }

    /**
     * Wrapper that tracks request size during reading.
     */
    private static class SizeLimitedRequestWrapper extends jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper {
        private final long maxSize;
<span class="fc" id="L173">        private long bytesRead = 0;</span>

        SizeLimitedRequestWrapper(HttpServletRequest request, long maxSize) {
<span class="fc" id="L176">            super(request);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L177">            this.maxSize = maxSize;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L178">        }</span>

        @Override
        public ServletInputStream getInputStream() throws IOException {
<span class="fc" id="L182">            ServletInputStream wrapped = super.getInputStream();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L183">            return new FilteringServletInputStream(wrapped, maxSize);</span>
        }
    }

    /**
     * Input stream wrapper that enforces size limit.
     */
    private static class FilteringServletInputStream extends ServletInputStream {
        private final ServletInputStream delegate;
        private final long maxSize;
<span class="fc" id="L193">        private long bytesRead = 0;</span>

<span class="fc" id="L195">        FilteringServletInputStream(ServletInputStream delegate, long maxSize) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L196">            this.delegate = delegate;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L197">            this.maxSize = maxSize;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L198">        }</span>

        @Override
        public int read() throws IOException {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L202" title="All 2 branches missed.">            if (bytesRead &gt;= maxSize) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L203">                IOException ioe = new IOException(&quot;Request size exceeds limit&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L204">                ioe.initCause(new SizeLimitExceededException(&quot;Request size exceeds limit&quot;));</span>
<span class="nc" id="L205">                throw ioe;</span>
            }
<span class="nc" id="L207">            int result = delegate.read();</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L208" title="All 2 branches missed.">            if (result != -1) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L209">                bytesRead++;</span>
            }
<span class="nc" id="L211">            return result;</span>
        }

        @Override
        public int read(byte[] b) throws IOException {
<span class="fc bfc" id="L216" title="All 2 branches covered.">            if (bytesRead &gt;= maxSize) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L217">                IOException ioe = new IOException(&quot;Request size exceeds limit&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L218">                ioe.initCause(new SizeLimitExceededException(&quot;Request size exceeds limit&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L219">                throw ioe;</span>
            }
<span class="fc" id="L221">            int result = delegate.read(b);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L222" title="All 2 branches covered.">            if (result &gt; 0) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L223">                bytesRead += result;</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L224" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">                if (bytesRead &gt; maxSize) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L225">                    IOException ioe = new IOException(&quot;Request size exceeds limit&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L226">                    ioe.initCause(new SizeLimitExceededException(&quot;Request size exceeds limit&quot;));</span>
<span class="nc" id="L227">                    throw ioe;</span>
                }
            }
<span class="fc" id="L230">            return result;</span>
        }

        @Override
        public int read(byte[] b, int off, int len) throws IOException {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L235" title="All 2 branches missed.">            if (bytesRead &gt;= maxSize) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L236">                IOException ioe = new IOException(&quot;Request size exceeds limit&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L237">                ioe.initCause(new SizeLimitExceededException(&quot;Request size exceeds limit&quot;));</span>
<span class="nc" id="L238">                throw ioe;</span>
            }
<span class="nc" id="L240">            int result = delegate.read(b, off, len);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L241" title="All 2 branches missed.">            if (result &gt; 0) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L242">                bytesRead += result;</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L243" title="All 2 branches missed.">                if (bytesRead &gt; maxSize) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L244">                    IOException ioe = new IOException(&quot;Request size exceeds limit&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L245">                    ioe.initCause(new SizeLimitExceededException(&quot;Request size exceeds limit&quot;));</span>
<span class="nc" id="L246">                    throw ioe;</span>
                }
            }
<span class="nc" id="L249">            return result;</span>
        }

        @Override
        public boolean isFinished() {
<span class="nc" id="L254">            return delegate.isFinished();</span>
        }

        @Override
        public boolean isReady() {
<span class="nc" id="L259">            return delegate.isReady();</span>
        }

        @Override
        public void setReadListener(ReadListener listener) {
<span class="nc" id="L264">            delegate.setReadListener(listener);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L265">        }</span>

        @Override
        public void close() throws IOException {
<span class="nc" id="L269">            delegate.close();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L270">        }</span>
    }
}
