class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>DiagnosticContextFilter.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">DiagnosticContextFilter.java</span></div><h1>DiagnosticContextFilter.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware;

import jakarta.servlet.Filter;
import jakarta.servlet.FilterChain;
import jakarta.servlet.ServletException;
import jakarta.servlet.ServletRequest;
import jakarta.servlet.ServletResponse;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import org.slf4j.MDC;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.UUID;

/**
 * Populates SLF4J MDC with request-scoped metadata (requestId, workspaceId, userId).
 * Also ensures the requestId is propagated via the {@code X-Request-Id} header.
 */
<span class="fc" id="L19">public class DiagnosticContextFilter implements Filter {</span>
    public static final String REQUEST_ID_ATTR = &quot;clockify.requestId&quot;;
    public static final String WORKSPACE_ID_ATTR = &quot;clockify.workspaceId&quot;;
    public static final String USER_ID_ATTR = &quot;clockify.userId&quot;;
    private static final String REQUEST_ID_HEADER = &quot;X-Request-Id&quot;;

    @Override
    public void doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain)
            throws IOException, ServletException {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L28" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (!(request instanceof HttpServletRequest httpRequest) ||</span>
<span class="fc" id="L29">                !(response instanceof HttpServletResponse httpResponse)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L30">            chain.doFilter(request, response);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L31">            return;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L34">        String requestId = resolveRequestId(httpRequest);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L35">        MDC.put(&quot;requestId&quot;, requestId);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L36">        httpRequest.setAttribute(REQUEST_ID_ATTR, requestId);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L37">        httpResponse.setHeader(REQUEST_ID_HEADER, requestId);</span>

        try {
<span class="fc" id="L40">            chain.doFilter(request, response);</span>
        } finally {
<span class="fc" id="L42">            MDC.remove(&quot;requestId&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L43">            MDC.remove(&quot;workspaceId&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L44">            MDC.remove(&quot;userId&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L46">    }</span>

    private String resolveRequestId(HttpServletRequest request) {
<span class="fc" id="L49">        String headerId = request.getHeader(REQUEST_ID_HEADER);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L50" title="3 of 4 branches missed.">        if (headerId != null &amp;&amp; !headerId.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L51">            return headerId.trim();</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L53">        return UUID.randomUUID().toString();</span>
    }
}
</pre><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>CriticalEndpointRateLimiter.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">CriticalEndpointRateLimiter.java</span></div><h1>CriticalEndpointRateLimiter.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware;

import com.clockify.addon.sdk.security.AuditLogger;
import com.google.common.cache.CacheBuilder;
import com.google.common.cache.CacheLoader;
import com.google.common.cache.LoadingCache;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

import jakarta.servlet.*;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException;
import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;

/**
 * SECURITY: Mandatory rate limiting for critical endpoints (lifecycle, webhooks, token operations).
 *
 * Critical endpoints are sensitive to abuse:
 * - /lifecycle: Installation/deletion events (could trigger cleanup logic)
 * - /webhook: User event processing
 *
 * This filter applies strict rate limits to prevent:
 * - Spam/DoS attacks targeting sensitive operations
 * - Rapid installation/deletion cycles
 * - Resource exhaustion from event floods
 *
 * Fail-closed: If rate limiter initialization fails, requests are BLOCKED (security-first approach).
 */
public class CriticalEndpointRateLimiter implements Filter {
<span class="fc" id="L32">    private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(CriticalEndpointRateLimiter.class);</span>

    // Lifecycle endpoints: very sensitive, should be rare (1 install/delete per workspace)
    private static final double LIFECYCLE_PERMITS_PER_SECOND = 0.1;  // 1 per 10 seconds

    // Webhook endpoints: user events, moderate frequency
    private static final double WEBHOOK_PERMITS_PER_SECOND = 1.0;    // 1 per second

    // Default catch-all for other sensitive paths
    private static final double DEFAULT_PERMITS_PER_SECOND = 0.5;    // 1 per 2 seconds

    private final LoadingCache&lt;LimiterKey, com.google.common.util.concurrent.RateLimiter&gt; limiters;
    private final boolean failClosed;

    /**
     * Creates a critical endpoint rate limiter.
     *
     * @param failClosed If true, block requests when rate limiter fails (security-first).
     *                   If false, allow requests (fail-open, less secure).
     */
<span class="fc" id="L52">    public CriticalEndpointRateLimiter(boolean failClosed) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L53">        this.failClosed = failClosed;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L54">        this.limiters = CacheBuilder.newBuilder()</span>
<span class="fc" id="L55">                .expireAfterAccess(10, TimeUnit.MINUTES)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L56">                .maximumSize(5000)  // Smaller cache for critical paths</span>
<span class="fc" id="L57">                .build(new CacheLoader&lt;LimiterKey, com.google.common.util.concurrent.RateLimiter&gt;() {</span>
                    @Override
                    public com.google.common.util.concurrent.RateLimiter load(LimiterKey key) {
<span class="fc" id="L60">                        double rate = getPermitRate(key.scope());</span>
<span class="fc" id="L61">                        logger.debug(&quot;Creating critical endpoint rate limiter for: {} ({}) -&gt; {} permits/sec&quot;,</span>
<span class="fc" id="L62">                                key.identifier(), key.scope(), rate);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L63">                        return com.google.common.util.concurrent.RateLimiter.create(rate);</span>
                    }
                });
<span class="fc" id="L66">        logger.info(&quot;Critical endpoint rate limiter initialized (fail-closed: {})&quot;, failClosed);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L67">    }</span>

    /**
     * Default: fail-closed for security
     */
    public CriticalEndpointRateLimiter() {
<span class="nc" id="L73">        this(true);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L74">    }</span>

    @Override
    public void doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain)
            throws IOException, ServletException {

<span class="pc bpc" id="L80" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (!(request instanceof HttpServletRequest) || !(response instanceof HttpServletResponse)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L81">            chain.doFilter(request, response);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L82">            return;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L85">        HttpServletRequest httpRequest = (HttpServletRequest) request;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L86">        HttpServletResponse httpResponse = (HttpServletResponse) response;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L87">        String path = httpRequest.getRequestURI();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L88">        Scope scope = resolveScope(path);</span>

        // SECURITY: Only apply to critical paths
<span class="fc bfc" id="L91" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (scope == null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L92">            chain.doFilter(request, response);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L93">            return;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L96">        String identifier = getIdentifier(httpRequest);</span>

        try {
<span class="fc" id="L99">            LimiterKey limiterKey = new LimiterKey(scope, identifier);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L100">            com.google.common.util.concurrent.RateLimiter limiter = limiters.get(limiterKey);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L101">            double permitsPerSecond = getPermitRate(scope);</span>

<span class="fc bfc" id="L103" title="All 2 branches covered.">            if (limiter.tryAcquire()) {</span>
                // Request allowed
<span class="fc" id="L105">                chain.doFilter(request, response);</span>
            } else {
                // Rate limit exceeded - log audit event
<span class="fc" id="L108">                logger.warn(&quot;CRITICAL: Rate limit exceeded for path: {} identifier: {}&quot;, path, identifier);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L109">                AuditLogger.log(AuditLogger.AuditEvent.RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L110">                        .clientIp(identifier)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L111">                        .detail(&quot;path&quot;, path)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L112">                        .detail(&quot;scope&quot;, scope.name())</span>
<span class="fc" id="L113">                        .detail(&quot;limit_permits_sec&quot;, permitsPerSecond)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L114">                        .error();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L115">                sendRateLimitError(httpResponse, permitsPerSecond);</span>
            }

<span class="nc" id="L118">        } catch (ExecutionException e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L119">            logger.error(&quot;CRITICAL: Error in rate limiter for path: {} identifier: {}&quot;, path, identifier, e);</span>

<span class="nc bnc" id="L121" title="All 2 branches missed.">            if (failClosed) {</span>
                // SECURITY: Block request if rate limiter fails
<span class="nc" id="L123">                logger.warn(&quot;SECURITY: Blocking request due to rate limiter failure (fail-closed mode)&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L124">                sendRateLimitError(httpResponse, 0.0);</span>
            } else {
                // Fail open: allow the request
<span class="nc" id="L127">                logger.warn(&quot;Allowing request despite rate limiter failure (fail-open mode)&quot;);</span>
                try {
<span class="nc" id="L129">                    chain.doFilter(request, response);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L130">                } catch (Exception ex) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L131">                    logger.error(&quot;Error processing request after rate limiter failure&quot;, ex);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L132">                }</span>
            }
<span class="fc" id="L134">        }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L135">    }</span>

    private Scope resolveScope(String path) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L138" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (path == null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L139">            return null;</span>
        }
<span class="pc bpc" id="L141" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (path.startsWith(&quot;/lifecycle&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L142">            return Scope.LIFECYCLE;</span>
        }
<span class="fc bfc" id="L144" title="All 4 branches covered.">        if (path.startsWith(&quot;/webhook&quot;) || path.endsWith(&quot;/webhook&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L145">            return Scope.WEBHOOK;</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L147">        return null;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Gets appropriate permit rate for a given identifier/path.
     */
    private double getPermitRate(Scope scope) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L154" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (scope == Scope.LIFECYCLE) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L155">            return LIFECYCLE_PERMITS_PER_SECOND;</span>
        }
<span class="pc bpc" id="L157" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (scope == Scope.WEBHOOK) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L158">            return WEBHOOK_PERMITS_PER_SECOND;</span>
        }
<span class="nc" id="L160">        return DEFAULT_PERMITS_PER_SECOND;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Gets the identifier for rate limiting (workspace ID preferred).
     */
    private String getIdentifier(HttpServletRequest request) {
        // Try to get workspace ID from header (preferred)
<span class="fc" id="L168">        String workspaceId = request.getHeader(&quot;X-Workspace-Id&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L169" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (workspaceId != null &amp;&amp; !workspaceId.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L170">            return workspaceId;</span>
        }

        // Try to extract from path
<span class="fc" id="L174">        String path = request.getRequestURI();</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L175" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (path.contains(&quot;workspace/&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L176">            String[] parts = path.split(&quot;/&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L177" title="All 2 branches missed.">            for (int i = 0; i &lt; parts.length - 1; i++) {</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L178" title="All 4 branches missed.">                if (&quot;workspace&quot;.equals(parts[i]) &amp;&amp; i + 1 &lt; parts.length) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L179">                    return parts[i + 1];</span>
                }
            }
        }

        // Fallback to IP address
<span class="fc" id="L185">        return getClientIp(request);</span>
    }

    /**
     * Gets client IP, accounting for proxies.
     */
    private String getClientIp(HttpServletRequest request) {
<span class="fc" id="L192">        String ip = request.getHeader(&quot;X-Forwarded-For&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L193" title="5 of 6 branches missed.">        if (ip == null || ip.isEmpty() || &quot;unknown&quot;.equalsIgnoreCase(ip)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L194">            ip = request.getHeader(&quot;X-Real-IP&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="pc bpc" id="L196" title="5 of 6 branches missed.">        if (ip == null || ip.isEmpty() || &quot;unknown&quot;.equalsIgnoreCase(ip)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L197">            ip = request.getRemoteAddr();</span>
        }

<span class="pc bpc" id="L200" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (ip != null &amp;&amp; ip.contains(&quot;,&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L201">            ip = ip.split(&quot;,&quot;)[0].trim();</span>
        }

<span class="pc bpc" id="L204" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        return ip != null ? ip : &quot;unknown&quot;;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Sends a 429 Too Many Requests error response.
     */
    private void sendRateLimitError(HttpServletResponse response, double permitsPerSecond) throws IOException {
<span class="fc" id="L211">        response.setStatus(429);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L212">        response.setContentType(&quot;application/json&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L213">        response.setHeader(&quot;Retry-After&quot;, &quot;60&quot;);  // Longer retry for critical endpoints</span>

        String json;
<span class="pc bpc" id="L216" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (permitsPerSecond &gt; 0) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L217">            json = String.format(</span>
                    &quot;{\&quot;error\&quot;:\&quot;rate_limit_exceeded\&quot;,\&quot;message\&quot;:\&quot;Critical endpoint rate limit exceeded. Please retry after some time.\&quot;,\&quot;retry_after\&quot;:60}&quot;);
        } else {
<span class="nc" id="L220">            json = &quot;{\&quot;error\&quot;:\&quot;rate_limit_exceeded\&quot;,\&quot;message\&quot;:\&quot;Critical endpoint temporarily unavailable due to rate limiting.\&quot;,\&quot;retry_after\&quot;:60}&quot;;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L223">        response.getWriter().write(json);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L224">        response.getWriter().flush();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L225">    }</span>

    @Override
    public void init(FilterConfig filterConfig) throws ServletException {
<span class="fc" id="L229">        logger.info(&quot;Critical endpoint rate limiter filter initialized&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L230">    }</span>

    @Override
    public void destroy() {
<span class="fc" id="L234">        limiters.invalidateAll();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L235">        logger.info(&quot;Critical endpoint rate limiter destroyed&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L236">    }</span>

<span class="fc" id="L238">    private record LimiterKey(Scope scope, String identifier) { }</span>

<span class="fc" id="L240">    private enum Scope {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L241">        LIFECYCLE,</span>
<span class="fc" id="L242">        WEBHOOK</span>
    }

    /**
     * Returns cache statistics for monitoring.
     */
    public String getStats() {
<span class="nc" id="L249">        return String.format(&quot;Critical rate limiter - Size: %d, Hits: %d, Misses: %d&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L250">                limiters.size(),</span>
<span class="nc" id="L251">                limiters.stats().hitCount(),</span>
<span class="nc" id="L252">                limiters.stats().missCount());</span>
    }
}
</pre><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>RateLimiter.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">RateLimiter.java</span></div><h1>RateLimiter.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware;

import com.google.common.cache.CacheBuilder;
import com.google.common.cache.CacheLoader;
import com.google.common.cache.LoadingCache;
// Do not import Guava RateLimiter by simple name to avoid clashing with this class name
// Use the fully-qualified name com.google.common.util.concurrent.RateLimiter instead
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

import jakarta.servlet.*;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException;
import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;

/**
 * Rate limiting middleware using token bucket algorithm.
 * Prevents abuse by limiting requests per IP address or workspace.
 */
public class RateLimiter implements Filter {
<span class="fc" id="L23">    private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(RateLimiter.class);</span>

    private final LoadingCache&lt;String, com.google.common.util.concurrent.RateLimiter&gt; limiters;
    private final double permitsPerSecond;
    private final String limitBy;

    /**
     * Creates a rate limiter.
     *
     * @param permitsPerSecond Maximum requests per second per identifier
     * @param limitBy How to identify clients: &quot;ip&quot; or &quot;workspace&quot;
     */
<span class="fc" id="L35">    public RateLimiter(double permitsPerSecond, String limitBy) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L36">        this.permitsPerSecond = permitsPerSecond;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L37">        this.limitBy = limitBy;</span>

        // Cache of rate limiters, one per unique identifier
        // Expires after 5 minutes of inactivity to prevent memory leaks
<span class="fc" id="L41">        this.limiters = CacheBuilder.newBuilder()</span>
<span class="fc" id="L42">                .expireAfterAccess(5, TimeUnit.MINUTES)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L43">                .maximumSize(10000) // Max 10k unique identifiers</span>
<span class="fc" id="L44">                .build(new CacheLoader&lt;String, com.google.common.util.concurrent.RateLimiter&gt;() {</span>
                    @Override
                    public com.google.common.util.concurrent.RateLimiter load(String key) {
<span class="fc" id="L47">                        logger.debug(&quot;Creating new rate limiter for: {}&quot;, key);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L48">                        return com.google.common.util.concurrent.RateLimiter.create(permitsPerSecond);</span>
                    }
                });

<span class="fc" id="L52">        logger.info(&quot;Rate limiter initialized: {} permits/sec, limit by: {}&quot;, permitsPerSecond, limitBy);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L53">    }</span>

    /**
     * Creates a default rate limiter: 10 requests/sec per IP.
     */
    public RateLimiter() {
<span class="nc" id="L59">        this(10.0, &quot;ip&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L60">    }</span>

    @Override
    public void doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain)
            throws IOException, ServletException {

<span class="pc bpc" id="L66" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (!(request instanceof HttpServletRequest) || !(response instanceof HttpServletResponse)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L67">            chain.doFilter(request, response);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L68">            return;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L71">        HttpServletRequest httpRequest = (HttpServletRequest) request;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L72">        HttpServletResponse httpResponse = (HttpServletResponse) response;</span>

<span class="fc" id="L74">        String identifier = getIdentifier(httpRequest);</span>

        try {
<span class="fc" id="L77">            com.google.common.util.concurrent.RateLimiter limiter = limiters.get(identifier);</span>

            // Try to acquire a permit (non-blocking)
<span class="fc bfc" id="L80" title="All 2 branches covered.">            if (limiter.tryAcquire()) {</span>
                // Request allowed
<span class="fc" id="L82">                chain.doFilter(request, response);</span>
            } else {
                // Rate limit exceeded
<span class="fc" id="L85">                logger.warn(&quot;Rate limit exceeded for: {} ({})&quot;, identifier, limitBy);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L86">                sendRateLimitError(httpResponse, identifier);</span>
            }

<span class="nc" id="L89">        } catch (ExecutionException e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L90">            logger.error(&quot;Error getting rate limiter for: &quot; + identifier, e);</span>
            // Fail open: allow the request if rate limiter fails
<span class="nc" id="L92">            chain.doFilter(request, response);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L93">        }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L94">    }</span>

    /**
     * Gets the identifier for rate limiting.
     */
    private String getIdentifier(HttpServletRequest request) {
<span class="fc bfc" id="L100" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (&quot;workspace&quot;.equalsIgnoreCase(limitBy)) {</span>
            // Extract workspace ID from path or header
<span class="fc" id="L102">            String workspaceId = extractWorkspaceId(request);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L103" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            return workspaceId != null ? workspaceId : getClientIp(request);</span>
        } else {
            // Default: limit by IP
<span class="fc" id="L106">            return getClientIp(request);</span>
        }
    }

    /**
     * Extracts workspace ID from request.
     */
    private String extractWorkspaceId(HttpServletRequest request) {
        // Try header first
<span class="fc" id="L115">        String workspaceId = request.getHeader(&quot;X-Workspace-Id&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L116" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (workspaceId != null &amp;&amp; !workspaceId.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L117">            return workspaceId;</span>
        }

        // Try path: /workspace/{id}/...
<span class="fc" id="L121">        String path = request.getRequestURI();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L122">        String[] parts = path.split(&quot;/&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L123" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        for (int i = 0; i &lt; parts.length - 1; i++) {</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L124" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">            if (&quot;workspace&quot;.equals(parts[i]) &amp;&amp; i + 1 &lt; parts.length) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L125">                return parts[i + 1];</span>
            }
        }

<span class="nc" id="L129">        return null;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Gets the client IP address, accounting for proxies.
     */
    private String getClientIp(HttpServletRequest request) {
<span class="fc" id="L136">        String ip = request.getHeader(&quot;X-Forwarded-For&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L137" title="5 of 6 branches missed.">        if (ip == null || ip.isEmpty() || &quot;unknown&quot;.equalsIgnoreCase(ip)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L138">            ip = request.getHeader(&quot;X-Real-IP&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="pc bpc" id="L140" title="5 of 6 branches missed.">        if (ip == null || ip.isEmpty() || &quot;unknown&quot;.equalsIgnoreCase(ip)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L141">            ip = request.getRemoteAddr();</span>
        }

        // X-Forwarded-For can contain multiple IPs, take the first
<span class="pc bpc" id="L145" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (ip != null &amp;&amp; ip.contains(&quot;,&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L146">            ip = ip.split(&quot;,&quot;)[0].trim();</span>
        }

<span class="pc bpc" id="L149" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        return ip != null ? ip : &quot;unknown&quot;;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Sends a 429 Too Many Requests error response.
     */
    private void sendRateLimitError(HttpServletResponse response, String identifier) throws IOException {
<span class="fc" id="L156">        response.setStatus(429);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L157">        response.setContentType(&quot;application/json&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L158">        response.setHeader(&quot;Retry-After&quot;, &quot;1&quot;); // Retry after 1 second</span>

<span class="fc" id="L160">        String json = String.format(</span>
                &quot;{\&quot;error\&quot;:\&quot;rate_limit_exceeded\&quot;,\&quot;message\&quot;:\&quot;Too many requests. Please slow down.\&quot;,\&quot;identifier\&quot;:\&quot;%s\&quot;,\&quot;limit\&quot;:%.1f}&quot;,
<span class="fc" id="L162">                identifier, permitsPerSecond);</span>

<span class="fc" id="L164">        response.getWriter().write(json);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L165">        response.getWriter().flush();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L166">    }</span>

    @Override
    public void init(FilterConfig filterConfig) throws ServletException {
        // No initialization needed
<span class="nc" id="L171">    }</span>

    @Override
    public void destroy() {
        // Clean up cache
<span class="nc" id="L176">        limiters.invalidateAll();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L177">        logger.info(&quot;Rate limiter destroyed&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L178">    }</span>

    /**
     * Gets current cache statistics for monitoring.
     */
    public String getStats() {
<span class="nc" id="L184">        return String.format(&quot;Rate limiter stats - Size: %d, Hits: %d, Misses: %d&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L185">                limiters.size(),</span>
<span class="nc" id="L186">                limiters.stats().hitCount(),</span>
<span class="nc" id="L187">                limiters.stats().missCount());</span>
    }
}
</pre><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" {...}</span></div><h1>RateLimiter.new CacheLoader() {...}</h1><table class="coverage" cellspacing="0" id="coveragetable"><thead><tr><td class="sortable" id="a" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" width="120" height="10" title="4" alt="4"/></td><td class="ctr2" id="c0">100%</td><td class="bar" id="d0"/><td class="ctr2" id="e0">n/a</td><td class="ctr1" id="f0">0</td><td class="ctr2" id="g0">1</td><td class="ctr1" id="h0">0</td><td class="ctr2" id="i0">2</td><td class="ctr1" id="j0">0</td><td class="ctr2" id="k0">1</td></tr></tbody></table><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>HttpsEnforcementFilter.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">HttpsEnforcementFilter.java</span></div><h1>HttpsEnforcementFilter.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware;

import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

import jakarta.servlet.*;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import java.io.IOException;

/**
 * SECURITY: HTTPS enforcement filter.
 *
 * In production, all addon communication MUST use HTTPS to:
 * - Prevent man-in-the-middle attacks
 * - Protect webhook signatures and tokens in transit
 * - Comply with security best practices
 *
 * This filter:
 * 1. Blocks non-HTTPS requests with 403 Forbidden
 * 2. Checks X-Forwarded-Proto header (for proxies/load balancers)
 * 3. Is automatically enabled in production
 * 4. Can be disabled for local development (not recommended)
 *
 * Environment variable: ENFORCE_HTTPS=true (default: true in production)
 */
public class HttpsEnforcementFilter implements Filter {
<span class="fc" id="L28">    private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(HttpsEnforcementFilter.class);</span>

    private final boolean enforceHttps;

    /**
     * Creates HTTPS enforcement filter with configurable strictness.
     *
     * @param enforceHttps if true, reject non-HTTPS requests. If false, log warning but allow.
     */
<span class="fc" id="L37">    public HttpsEnforcementFilter(boolean enforceHttps) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L38">        this.enforceHttps = enforceHttps;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L39">        logger.info(&quot;HTTPS enforcement filter initialized (enforce: {})&quot;, enforceHttps);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L40">    }</span>

    /**
     * Default: enforce HTTPS (security-first approach).
     */
    public HttpsEnforcementFilter() {
<span class="fc" id="L46">        this(true);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L47">    }</span>

    @Override
    public void doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain)
            throws IOException, ServletException {

<span class="pc bpc" id="L53" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (!(request instanceof HttpServletRequest) || !(response instanceof HttpServletResponse)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L54">            chain.doFilter(request, response);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L55">            return;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L58">        HttpServletRequest httpRequest = (HttpServletRequest) request;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L59">        HttpServletResponse httpResponse = (HttpServletResponse) response;</span>

        // Check if request is HTTPS
<span class="fc bfc" id="L62" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (!isSecureConnection(httpRequest)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L63">            String clientIp = getClientIp(httpRequest);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L64">            String path = httpRequest.getRequestURI();</span>

<span class="fc bfc" id="L66" title="All 2 branches covered.">            if (enforceHttps) {</span>
                // SECURITY: Reject non-HTTPS in strict mode
<span class="fc" id="L68">                logger.warn(&quot;SECURITY: Rejecting non-HTTPS request from {} to {}. Use HTTPS in production.&quot;,</span>
                        clientIp, path);

<span class="fc" id="L71">                sendHttpsEnforcementError(httpResponse);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L72">                return;</span>
            } else {
                // Development mode: warn but allow
<span class="fc" id="L75">                logger.warn(&quot;Non-HTTPS request from {} to {} (allowed in development mode)&quot;, clientIp, path);</span>
            }
        }

<span class="fc" id="L79">        chain.doFilter(request, response);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L80">    }</span>

    /**
     * Checks if connection is secure (HTTPS or equivalent).
     * Accounts for reverse proxies and load balancers.
     */
    private boolean isSecureConnection(HttpServletRequest request) {
        // Direct HTTPS connection
<span class="fc bfc" id="L88" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (request.isSecure()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L89">            return true;</span>
        }

        // Check X-Forwarded-Proto (for proxies/load balancers)
<span class="fc" id="L93">        String forwardedProto = request.getHeader(&quot;X-Forwarded-Proto&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L94" title="All 4 branches covered.">        if (forwardedProto != null &amp;&amp; &quot;https&quot;.equalsIgnoreCase(forwardedProto.trim())) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L95">            return true;</span>
        }

        // Check X-Original-Proto (Cloudflare)
<span class="fc" id="L99">        String originalProto = request.getHeader(&quot;X-Original-Proto&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L100" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (originalProto != null &amp;&amp; &quot;https&quot;.equalsIgnoreCase(originalProto.trim())) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L101">            return true;</span>
        }

        // Check CloudFront header
<span class="fc" id="L105">        String cloudFrontProto = request.getHeader(&quot;CloudFront-Forwarded-Proto&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L106" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (cloudFrontProto != null &amp;&amp; &quot;https&quot;.equalsIgnoreCase(cloudFrontProto.trim())) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L107">            return true;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L110">        return false;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Gets client IP address, accounting for proxies.
     */
    private String getClientIp(HttpServletRequest request) {
<span class="fc" id="L117">        String ip = request.getHeader(&quot;X-Forwarded-For&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L118" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (ip == null || ip.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L119">            ip = request.getHeader(&quot;X-Real-IP&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="pc bpc" id="L121" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (ip == null || ip.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L122">            ip = request.getRemoteAddr();</span>
        }

<span class="pc bpc" id="L125" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (ip != null &amp;&amp; ip.contains(&quot;,&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L126">            ip = ip.split(&quot;,&quot;)[0].trim();</span>
        }

<span class="pc bpc" id="L129" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        return ip != null ? ip : &quot;unknown&quot;;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Sends 403 Forbidden response for non-HTTPS requests.
     */
    private void sendHttpsEnforcementError(HttpServletResponse response) throws IOException {
<span class="fc" id="L136">        response.setStatus(403);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L137">        response.setContentType(&quot;application/json&quot;);</span>

<span class="fc" id="L139">        String json = &quot;{\&quot;error\&quot;:\&quot;insecure_connection\&quot;,&quot; +</span>
                &quot;\&quot;message\&quot;:\&quot;HTTPS is required. Please use a secure connection.\&quot;,&quot; +
                &quot;\&quot;documentation\&quot;:\&quot;https://clockify.me/help/security/https-requirement\&quot;}&quot;;

<span class="fc" id="L143">        response.getWriter().write(json);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L144">        response.getWriter().flush();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L145">    }</span>

    @Override
    public void init(FilterConfig filterConfig) throws ServletException {
<span class="nc" id="L149">        logger.info(&quot;HTTPS enforcement filter initialized&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L150">    }</span>

    @Override
    public void destroy() {
<span class="nc" id="L154">        logger.info(&quot;HTTPS enforcement filter destroyed&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L155">    }</span>
}
</pre><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>SecretsPolicy</title><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/sort.js"></script></head><body onload="initialSort(['breadcrumb'])"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.config</a> &gt; <span class="el_class">SecretsPolicy</span></div><h1>SecretsPolicy</h1><table class="coverage" cellspacing="0" id="coveragetable"><thead><tr><td class="sortable" id="a" onclick="toggleSort(this)">Element</td><td class="down sortable bar" id="b" onclick="toggleSort(this)">Missed Instructions</td><td class="sortable ctr2" id="c" onclick="toggleSort(this)">Cov.</td><td class="sortable bar" id="d" onclick="toggleSort(this)">Missed Branches</td><td class="sortable ctr2" id="e" onclick="toggleSort(this)">Cov.</td><td class="sortable ctr1" id="f" onclick="toggleSort(this)">Missed</td><td class="sortable ctr2" id="g" onclick="toggleSort(this)">Cxty</td><td class="sortable class="el_method">getPort()</a></td><td class="bar" id="b3"><img src="../jacoco-resources/greenbar.gif" width="24" height="10" title="3" alt="3"/></td><td class="ctr2" id="c2">100%</td><td class="bar" id="d3"/><td class="ctr2" id="e3">n/a</td><td class="ctr1" id="f3">0</td><td class="ctr2" id="g3">1</td><td class="ctr1" id="h3">0</td><td class="ctr2" id="i3">1</td><td class="ctr1" id="j3">0</td><td href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>ConfigValidator.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.config</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">ConfigValidator.java</span></div><h1>ConfigValidator.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.config;

import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

import java.net.MalformedURLException;
import java.net.URL;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;

/**
 * Backward-compatible configuration validator kept under the historic
 * package com.clockify.addon.sdk.config for tests and examples.
 *
 * New code should prefer com.clockify.addon.sdk.ConfigValidator (static helpers).
 */
<span class="fc" id="L18">public class ConfigValidator {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L19">    private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ConfigValidator.class);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L20">    private final List&lt;String&gt; errors = new ArrayList&lt;&gt;();</span>

    public String validateRequired(String key, String value) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L23" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (value == null || value.trim().isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L24">            errors.add(String.format(&quot;Required environment variable '%s' is missing or empty.&quot;, key));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L25">            return null;</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L27">        return value.trim();</span>
    }

    public int validatePort(String key, String value, int defaultValue) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L31" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (value == null || value.trim().isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L32">            logger.info(&quot;Port '{}' not specified, using default: {}&quot;, key, defaultValue);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L33">            return defaultValue;</span>
        }
        try {
<span class="fc" id="L36">            int port = Integer.parseInt(value.trim());</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L37" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">            if (port &lt; 1 || port &gt; 65535) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L38">                errors.add(String.format(&quot;%s must be 1-65535, got: %d&quot;, key, port));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L39">                return defaultValue;</span>
            }
<span class="fc" id="L41">            return port;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L42">        } catch (NumberFormatException e) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L43">            errors.add(String.format(&quot;%s must be an integer port, got: '%s'&quot;, key, value));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L44">            return defaultValue;</span>
        }
    }

    public String validateUrl(String key, String value) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L49" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (value == null || value.trim().isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L50">            errors.add(String.format(&quot;Required URL '%s' missing&quot;, key));</span>
<span class="nc" id="L51">            return null;</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L53">        String trimmed = value.trim();</span>
        try {
<span class="fc" id="L55">            new URL(trimmed);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L56" title="All 2 branches covered.">            return trimmed.endsWith(&quot;/&quot;) ? trimmed.substring(0, trimmed.length() - 1) : trimmed;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L57">        } catch (MalformedURLException e) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L58">            errors.add(String.format(&quot;%s must be a valid URL, got '%s'&quot;, key, value));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L59">            return null;</span>
        }
    }

    public String validateWebhookSecret(String key, String value) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L64" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (value == null || value.trim().isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L65">            errors.add(String.format(&quot;Required webhook secret '%s' missing&quot;, key));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L66">            return null;</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L68">        String trimmed = value.trim();</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L69" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (trimmed.length() &lt; 32) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L70">            errors.add(String.format(&quot;Webhook secret '%s' too weak (&lt;32 chars)&quot;, key));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L71">            return null;</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L73">        return trimmed;</span>
    }

    public boolean validateBoolean(String key, String value, boolean defaultValue) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L77" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (value == null || value.trim().isEmpty()) return defaultValue;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L78">        String lower = value.trim().toLowerCase();</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L79" title="All 6 branches covered.">        if (lower.equals(&quot;true&quot;) || lower.equals(&quot;1&quot;) || lower.equals(&quot;yes&quot;)) return true;</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L80" title="1 of 6 branches missed.">        if (lower.equals(&quot;false&quot;) || lower.equals(&quot;0&quot;) || lower.equals(&quot;no&quot;)) return false;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L81">        errors.add(String.format(&quot;%s must be boolean (true/false/1/0/yes/no), got '%s'&quot;, key, value));</span>
<span class="nc" id="L82">        return defaultValue;</span>
    }

    public void throwIfInvalid() throws ConfigValidationException {
<span class="fc bfc" id="L86" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (!errors.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L87">            StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(&quot;Configuration validation failed:\n&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L88" title="All 2 branches covered.">            for (String e : errors) sb.append(&quot; - &quot;).append(e).append('\n');</span>
<span class="fc" id="L89">            throw new ConfigValidationException(sb.toString(), new ArrayList&lt;&gt;(errors));</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L91">    }</span>

<span class="fc bfc" id="L93" title="All 2 branches covered.">    public boolean hasErrors() { return !errors.isEmpty(); }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L94">    public List&lt;String&gt; getErrors() { return new ArrayList&lt;&gt;(errors); }</span>

    public static AddonConfig validateAddonConfig(Map&lt;String, String&gt; env) throws ConfigValidationException {
<span class="fc" id="L97">        ConfigValidator v = new ConfigValidator();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L98">        String baseUrl = v.validateUrl(&quot;ADDON_BASE_URL&quot;, env.get(&quot;ADDON_BASE_URL&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L99">        String webhookSecret = v.validateWebhookSecret(&quot;ADDON_WEBHOOK_SECRET&quot;, env.get(&quot;ADDON_WEBHOOK_SECRET&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L100">        int port = v.validatePort(&quot;ADDON_PORT&quot;, env.get(&quot;ADDON_PORT&quot;), 8080);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L101">        boolean debugMode = v.validateBoolean(&quot;DEBUG&quot;, env.get(&quot;DEBUG&quot;), false);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L102">        v.throwIfInvalid();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L103">        return new AddonConfig(baseUrl, webhookSecret, port, debugMode);</span>
    }

    public static class AddonConfig {
        private final String baseUrl;
        private final String webhookSecret;
        private final int port;
        private final boolean debugMode;

<span class="fc" id="L112">        public AddonConfig(String baseUrl, String webhookSecret, int port, boolean debugMode) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L113">            this.baseUrl = baseUrl;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L114">            this.webhookSecret = webhookSecret;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L115">            this.port = port;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L116">            this.debugMode = debugMode;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L117">        }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L118">        public String getBaseUrl() { return baseUrl; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L119">        public String getWebhookSecret() { return webhookSecret; }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L120">        public int getPort() { return port; }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L121">        public boolean isDebugMode() { return debugMode; }</span>
    }

    public static class ConfigValidationException extends RuntimeException {
        private final List&lt;String&gt; errors;
<span class="fc" id="L126">        public ConfigValidationException(String msg, List&lt;String&gt; errors) { super(msg); this.errors = errors; }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L127">        public List&lt;String&gt; getErrors() { return errors; }</span>
    }
}
</pre><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>SecretsPolicy.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.config</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">SecretsPolicy.java</span></div><h1>SecretsPolicy.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.config;

import java.util.Locale;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.Objects;
import java.util.Set;

/**
 * SECURITY: Enforces baseline rules for secrets and sensitive environment variables.
 * &lt;p&gt;
 * Applications should invoke {@link #enforce()} during startup to fail-fast when
 * required secrets are missing, blank, or using placeholder defaults.
 * &lt;/p&gt;
 */
public final class SecretsPolicy {
<span class="fc" id="L16">    private static final Set&lt;String&gt; DISALLOWED_SECRETS = Set.of(</span>
            &quot;changeme&quot;,
            &quot;secret&quot;,
            &quot;default&quot;,
            &quot;placeholder&quot;,
            &quot;sample&quot;,
            &quot;password&quot;,
            &quot;123456&quot;,
            &quot;123456789&quot;,
            &quot;letmein&quot;
    );

    private SecretsPolicy() {}

    /** Enforces the policy using {@link System#getenv()}. */
    public static void enforce() {
<span class="nc" id="L32">        enforce(System.getenv());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L33">    }</span>

    /** Enforces the policy using the provided environment map (used by tests). */
    public static void enforce(Map&lt;String, String&gt; env) {
<span class="fc" id="L37">        Objects.requireNonNull(env, &quot;env&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L38">        requireStrongSecret(env, &quot;ADDON_WEBHOOK_SECRET&quot;);</span>

        // Optional database credentials: if URL is provided, ensure username/password are not blank
<span class="fc" id="L41">        String dbUrl = env.get(&quot;DB_URL&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L42" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (dbUrl != null &amp;&amp; !dbUrl.trim().isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L43">            requirePresent(env, &quot;DB_USERNAME&quot;, &quot;DB_USERNAME is required when DB_URL is set&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L44">            requirePresent(env, &quot;DB_PASSWORD&quot;, &quot;DB_PASSWORD is required when DB_URL is set&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L46">    }</span>

    private static void requireStrongSecret(Map&lt;String, String&gt; env, String key) {
<span class="fc" id="L49">        String value = env.get(key);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L50" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (value == null || value.trim().isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L51">            throw new IllegalStateException(key + &quot; is required and cannot be empty&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L53">        String trimmed = value.trim();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L54">        String normalized = trimmed.toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L55" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (trimmed.length() &lt; 32) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L56">            throw new IllegalStateException(key + &quot; must be at least 32 characters long&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="pc bpc" id="L58" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (DISALLOWED_SECRETS.contains(normalized)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L59">            throw new IllegalStateException(key + &quot; cannot use placeholder values such as '&quot; + trimmed + &quot;'&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L61">    }</span>

    private static void requirePresent(Map&lt;String, String&gt; env, String key, String message) {
<span class="fc" id="L64">        String value = env.get(key);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L65" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (value == null || value.trim().isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L66">            throw new IllegalStateException(message);</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L68">    }</span>
}
</pre><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html>/*******************************************************************************

 * This program and the accompanying materials are made available under

 * http://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-2.0

 * SPDX-License-Identifier: EPL-2.0

 *    Marc R. Hoffmann - initial API and implementation
 *
 *******************************************************************************/

(function () {

  /**
   * Sets the initial sorting derived from the hash.
   *
   * @param linkelementids
   *          list of element ids to search for links to add sort inidcator
   *          hash links
   */
  function initialSort(linkelementids) {
    window.linkelementids = linkelementids;
    var hash = window.location.hash;
    if (hash) {
      var m = hash.match(/up-./);
      if (m) {
        var header = window.document.getElementById(m[0].charAt(3));
        if (header) {
          sortColumn(header, true);
        }
        return;
      }
      var m = hash.match(/dn-./);
      if (m) {
        var header = window.document.getElementById(m[0].charAt(3));
        if (header) {
          sortColumn(header, false);
        }
        return
      }
    }
  }

  /**
   * Sorts the columns with the given header dependening on the current sort state.
   */
  function toggleSort(header) {
    var sortup = header.className.indexOf('down ') == 0;
    sortColumn(header, sortup);
  }

  /**
   * Sorts the columns with the given header in the given direction.
   */
  function sortColumn(header, sortup) {
    var table = header.parentNode.parentNode.parentNode;
    var body = table.tBodies[0];
    var colidx = getNodePosition(header);

    resetSortedStyle(table);

    var rows = body.rows;
    var sortedrows = [];
    for (var i = 0; i < rows.length; i++) {
      r = rows[i];
      sortedrows[parseInt(r.childNodes[colidx].id.slice(1))] = r;
    }

    var hash;

    if (sortup) {
      for (var i = sortedrows.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        body.appendChild(sortedrows[i]);
      }
      header.className = 'up ' + header.className;
      hash = 'up-' + header.id;
    } else {
      for (var i = 0; i < sortedrows.length; i++) {
        body.appendChild(sortedrows[i]);
      }
      header.className = 'down ' + header.className;
      hash = 'dn-' + header.id;
    }

    setHash(hash);
  }

  /**
   * Adds the sort indicator as a hash to the document URL and all links.
   */
  function setHash(hash) {
    window.document.location.hash = hash;
    ids = window.linkelementids;
    for (var i = 0; i < ids.length; i++) {
        setHashOnAllLinks(document.getElementById(ids[i]), hash);
    }
  }

  /**
   * Extend all links within the given tag with the given hash.
   */
  function setHashOnAllLinks(tag, hash) {
    links = tag.getElementsByTagName("a");
    for (var i = 0; i < links.length; i++) {
        var a = links[i];
        var href = a.href;
        var hashpos = href.indexOf("#");
        if (hashpos != -1) {
            href = href.substring(0, hashpos);
        }
        a.href = href + "#" + hash;
    }
  }

  /**
   * Calculates the position of a element within its parent.
   */
  function getNodePosition(element) {
    var pos = -1;
    while (element) {
      element = element.previousSibling;
      pos++;
    }
    return pos;
  }

  /**
   * Remove the sorting indicator style from all headers.
   */
  function resetSortedStyle(table) {
    for (var c = table.tHead.firstChild.firstChild; c; c = c.nextSibling) {
      if (c.className) {
        if (c.className.indexOf('down ') == 0) {
          c.className = c.className.slice(5);
        }
        if (c.className.indexOf('up ') == 0) {
          c.className = c.className.slice(3);
        }
      }
    }
  }

  window['initialSort'] = initialSort;
  window['toggleSort'] = toggleSort;

})();
// Copyright (C) 2006 Google Inc.
