id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.security</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">TokenStore.java</span></div><h1>TokenStore.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.security;

import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

import java.net.URI;
import java.time.Clock;
import java.time.Duration;
import java.time.Instant;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.Optional;
import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;

/**
 * Static facade used by demo modules and tests.
 * Stores a WorkspaceToken consisting of the installation token and normalized apiBaseUrl.
 *
 * Default behavior is in-memory. For production, implement a TokenStoreSPI (e.g., DatabaseTokenStore)
 * and wire it at your application entry if needed.
 */
public final class TokenStore {
<span class="fc" id="L23">    private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(TokenStore.class);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L24">    private static final ObjectMapper PERSISTENCE_MAPPER = new ObjectMapper();</span>

    private TokenStore() {}

    /** Workspace token shape used by demo modules. */
<span class="fc" id="L29">    public record WorkspaceToken(String token, String apiBaseUrl, long createdAt, long expiresAt, long rotatedAt) {}</span>

<span class="fc" id="L31">    private static final Map&lt;String, WorkspaceToken&gt; STORE = new ConcurrentHashMap&lt;&gt;();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L32">    private static final Map&lt;String, WorkspaceToken&gt; ROTATED = new ConcurrentHashMap&lt;&gt;();</span>
    private static volatile TokenStoreSPI persistentStore;

<span class="fc" id="L35">    private static Clock clock = Clock.systemUTC();</span>

<span class="pc bpc" id="L37" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">    public static void setClock(Clock custom) { clock = custom == null ? Clock.systemUTC() : custom; }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L38">    public static void resetClock() { clock = Clock.systemUTC(); }</span>

<span class="fc" id="L40">    private static final long DEFAULT_TOKEN_TTL_MS = Duration.ofHours(24).toMillis();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L41">    private static final long DEFAULT_ROTATION_GRACE_MS = Duration.ofMinutes(15).toMillis();</span>
    private static final String TTL_PROPERTY = &quot;clockify.token.ttl.ms&quot;;
    private static final String GRACE_PROPERTY = &quot;clockify.token.rotation.grace.ms&quot;;

    /** Clears all stored tokens (used by tests). */
    public static void clear() {
<span class="fc" id="L47">        STORE.clear();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L48">        ROTATED.clear();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L49">    }</span>

    /**
     * Configure an optional persistent store. When configured, tokens are serialized to the
     * backing store (e.g., PostgreSQL) and lazily restored on first access.
     */
    public static void configurePersistence(TokenStoreSPI store) {
<span class="nc" id="L56">        persistentStore = store;</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L57" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (store != null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L58">            logger.info(&quot;TokenStore persistence enabled via {}&quot;, store.getClass().getSimpleName());</span>
        } else {
<span class="nc" id="L60">            logger.info(&quot;TokenStore persistence disabled&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="nc" id="L62">    }</span>

    /** Save workspace token and normalize apiBaseUrl to include /api/vN if missing. */
    public static void save(String workspaceId, String token, String apiBaseUrl) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L66" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (workspaceId == null || workspaceId.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L67">            throw new IllegalArgumentException(&quot;workspaceId is required&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="pc bpc" id="L69" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (token == null || token.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L70">            throw new IllegalArgumentException(&quot;token is required&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L72">        String normalized = normalizeApiBaseUrl(apiBaseUrl);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L73">        long now = Instant.now(clock).toEpochMilli();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L74">        ROTATED.remove(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L75">        saveRecord(workspaceId, token, normalized, now, true);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L76">    }</span>

    /** Fetch workspace token. */
    public static Optional&lt;WorkspaceToken&gt; get(String workspaceId) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L80" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (workspaceId == null || workspaceId.isBlank()) return Optional.empty();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L81">        WorkspaceToken current = STORE.get(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L82" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (current != null &amp;&amp; !isExpired(current)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L83">            return Optional.of(current);</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L86">        WorkspaceToken previous = ROTATED.get(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L87" title="3 of 4 branches missed.">        if (previous != null &amp;&amp; !isExpired(previous)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L88">            return Optional.of(previous);</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L91">        return restoreFromPersistence(workspaceId);</span>
    }

    /** Checks whether the provided token is currently valid (current or rotated). */
    public static boolean isValidToken(String workspaceId, String token) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L96" title="4 of 8 branches missed.">        if (workspaceId == null || workspaceId.isBlank() || token == null || token.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L97">            return false;</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L99">        WorkspaceToken current = STORE.get(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L100" title="1 of 6 branches missed.">        if (current != null &amp;&amp; !isExpired(current) &amp;&amp; current.token().equals(token)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L101">            return true;</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L103">        WorkspaceToken previous = ROTATED.get(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L104" title="1 of 6 branches missed.">        return previous != null &amp;&amp; !isExpired(previous) &amp;&amp; previous.token().equals(token);</span>
    }

    /** Remove workspace token. Returns true if a token was removed. */
    public static boolean delete(String workspaceId) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L109" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (workspaceId == null || workspaceId.isBlank()) return false;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L110">        ROTATED.remove(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L111" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        boolean removed = STORE.remove(workspaceId) != null;</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L112" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (persistentStore != null) {</span>
            try {
<span class="nc" id="L114">                persistentStore.remove(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L115">            } catch (Exception e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L116">                logger.warn(&quot;Failed to delete token for {} from persistent store: {}&quot;, workspaceId, e.getMessage());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L117">            }</span>
        }
<span class="pc bpc" id="L119" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (removed) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L120">            AuditLogger.log(AuditLogger.AuditEvent.TOKEN_REMOVED)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L121">                    .workspace(workspaceId)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L122">                    .info();</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L124">        return removed;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Rotates the workspace token while keeping the previous token valid for the grace period.
     */
    public static void rotate(String workspaceId, String newToken) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L131" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (workspaceId == null || workspaceId.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L132">            throw new IllegalArgumentException(&quot;workspaceId is required&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="pc bpc" id="L134" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (newToken == null || newToken.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L135">            throw new IllegalArgumentException(&quot;new token is required&quot;);</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L138">        WorkspaceToken current = STORE.get(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L139">        long now = Instant.now(clock).toEpochMilli();</span>

<span class="pc bpc" id="L141" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (current != null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L142">            long grace = rotationGraceMs();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L143">            WorkspaceToken rotated = new WorkspaceToken(</span>
<span class="fc" id="L144">                    current.token(),</span>
<span class="fc" id="L145">                    current.apiBaseUrl(),</span>
<span class="fc" id="L146">                    current.createdAt(),</span>
                    now + grace,
                    now
            );
<span class="fc" id="L150">            ROTATED.put(workspaceId, rotated);</span>
        }

<span class="pc bpc" id="L153" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        String apiBaseUrl = current != null ? current.apiBaseUrl() : normalizeApiBaseUrl(null);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L154">        saveRecord(workspaceId, newToken, apiBaseUrl, now, false);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L155">        AuditLogger.log(AuditLogger.AuditEvent.TOKEN_ROTATED)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L156">                .workspace(workspaceId)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L157">                .detail(&quot;rotatedAt&quot;, now)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L158">                .info();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L159">        AuditLogger.log(AuditLogger.AuditEvent.TOKEN_SAVED)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L160">                .workspace(workspaceId)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L161">                .detail(&quot;apiBaseUrl&quot;, apiBaseUrl)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L162">                .detail(&quot;expiresAt&quot;, now + tokenTtlMs())</span>
<span class="fc" id="L163">                .info();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L164">        persistState(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L165">    }</span>

    private static void saveRecord(String workspaceId, String token, String apiBaseUrl, long now, boolean log) {
<span class="fc" id="L168">        long ttl = tokenTtlMs();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L169">        long expiresAt = now + ttl;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L170">        STORE.put(workspaceId, new WorkspaceToken(token, apiBaseUrl, now, expiresAt, now));</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L171" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (log) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L172">            AuditLogger.log(AuditLogger.AuditEvent.TOKEN_SAVED)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L173">                    .workspace(workspaceId)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L174">                    .detail(&quot;apiBaseUrl&quot;, apiBaseUrl)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L175">                    .detail(&quot;expiresAt&quot;, expiresAt)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L176">                    .info();</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L178">        persistState(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L179">    }</span>

    private static long tokenTtlMs() {
<span class="fc" id="L182">        return parseLongProperty(TTL_PROPERTY, DEFAULT_TOKEN_TTL_MS);</span>
    }

    private static long rotationGraceMs() {
<span class="fc" id="L186">        return parseLongProperty(GRACE_PROPERTY, DEFAULT_ROTATION_GRACE_MS);</span>
    }

    private static long parseLongProperty(String key, long defaultValue) {
<span class="fc" id="L190">        String value = System.getProperty(key);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L191" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (value != null &amp;&amp; !value.isBlank()) {</span>
            try {
<span class="fc" id="L193">                long parsed = Long.parseLong(value.trim());</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L194" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">                if (parsed &gt; 0) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L195">                    return parsed;</span>
                }
<span class="nc" id="L197">            } catch (NumberFormatException ignored) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L198">            }</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L200">        return defaultValue;</span>
    }

    private static boolean isExpired(WorkspaceToken token) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L204" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        return token.expiresAt() &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; currentTimeMs() &gt; token.expiresAt();</span>
    }

    private static long currentTimeMs() {
<span class="fc" id="L208">        return Instant.now(clock).toEpochMilli();</span>
    }

    private static String normalizeApiBaseUrl(String apiBaseUrl) {
<span class="fc" id="L212">        String DEFAULT = &quot;https://api.clockify.me/api/v1&quot;;</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L213" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (apiBaseUrl == null || apiBaseUrl.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L214">            return DEFAULT;</span>
        }
        try {
<span class="fc" id="L217">            URI uri = URI.create(apiBaseUrl.trim());</span>
<span class="fc" id="L218">            String scheme = uri.getScheme();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L219">            String host = uri.getHost();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L220">            int port = uri.getPort();</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L221" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            String path = uri.getPath() == null ? &quot;&quot; : uri.getPath();</span>

            // trim trailing slash
<span class="pc bpc" id="L224" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            if (path.endsWith(&quot;/&quot;)) path = path.substring(0, path.length() - 1);</span>

            // if already contains /api/v&lt;digits&gt;, keep as-is
<span class="fc bfc" id="L227" title="All 2 branches covered.">            if (path.matches(&quot;.*/api/v\\d+&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L228">                return rebuild(scheme, host, port, path);</span>
            }
            // if contains /api (no version), append /v1
<span class="pc bpc" id="L231" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">            if (path.endsWith(&quot;/api&quot;) || path.contains(&quot;/api&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L232">                return rebuild(scheme, host, port, path + &quot;/v1&quot;);</span>
            }
            // otherwise append /api/v1
<span class="pc bpc" id="L235" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            String newPath = (path.isEmpty() ? &quot;/api/v1&quot; : path + &quot;/api/v1&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L236">            return rebuild(scheme, host, port, newPath);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L237">        } catch (Exception e) {</span>
            // Fallback to default on malformed input
<span class="nc" id="L239">            return DEFAULT;</span>
        }
    }

    private static String rebuild(String scheme, String host, int port, String path) {
<span class="fc" id="L244">        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L245" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        sb.append(scheme != null ? scheme : &quot;https&quot;).append(&quot;://&quot;).append(host);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L246" title="5 of 6 branches missed.">        if (port &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; port != 80 &amp;&amp; port != 443) sb.append(&quot;:&quot; + port);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L247">        sb.append(path);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L248">        return sb.toString();</span>
    }

    private static void persistState(String workspaceId) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L252" title="5 of 6 branches missed.">        if (persistentStore == null || workspaceId == null || workspaceId.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L253">            return;</span>
        }
        try {
<span class="nc" id="L256">            PersistentState state = new PersistentState(STORE.get(workspaceId), ROTATED.get(workspaceId));</span>
<span class="nc" id="L257">            String payload = PERSISTENCE_MAPPER.writeValueAsString(state);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L258">            persistentStore.save(workspaceId, payload);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L259">        } catch (Exception e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L260">            logger.warn(&quot;Failed to persist token for {}: {}&quot;, workspaceId, e.getMessage());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L261">        }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L262">    }</span>

    private static Optional&lt;WorkspaceToken&gt; restoreFromPersistence(String workspaceId) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L265" title="5 of 6 branches missed.">        if (persistentStore == null || workspaceId == null || workspaceId.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L266">            return Optional.empty();</span>
        }
        try {
<span class="nc" id="L269">            Optional&lt;String&gt; raw = persistentStore.get(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L270" title="All 2 branches missed.">            if (raw.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L271">                return Optional.empty();</span>
            }
<span class="nc" id="L273">            String serialized = raw.get();</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L274" title="All 2 branches missed.">            if (looksLikeJson(serialized)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L275">                PersistentState state = PERSISTENCE_MAPPER.readValue(serialized, PersistentState.class);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L276" title="All 2 branches missed.">                if (state.current != null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L277">                    STORE.put(workspaceId, state.current);</span>
                }
<span class="nc bnc" id="L279" title="All 2 branches missed.">                if (state.rotated != null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L280">                    ROTATED.put(workspaceId, state.rotated);</span>
                }
<span class="nc" id="L282">                WorkspaceToken current = STORE.get(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L283" title="All 4 branches missed.">                if (current != null &amp;&amp; !isExpired(current)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L284">                    return Optional.of(current);</span>
                }
<span class="nc" id="L286">                WorkspaceToken rotated = ROTATED.get(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L287" title="All 4 branches missed.">                if (rotated != null &amp;&amp; !isExpired(rotated)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L288">                    return Optional.of(rotated);</span>
                }
<span class="nc" id="L290">            } else {</span>
                // Legacy format: plain token string without metadata
<span class="nc" id="L292">                WorkspaceToken token = new WorkspaceToken(serialized, normalizeApiBaseUrl(null),</span>
<span class="nc" id="L293">                        currentTimeMs(), 0, 0);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L294">                STORE.put(workspaceId, token);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L295">                return Optional.of(token);</span>
            }
<span class="nc" id="L297">        } catch (Exception e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L298">            logger.warn(&quot;Failed to restore token for {} from persistent store: {}&quot;, workspaceId, e.getMessage());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L299">        }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L300">        return Optional.empty();</span>
    }

    private static boolean looksLikeJson(String data) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L304" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (data == null) return false;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L305">        String trimmed = data.trim();</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L306" title="All 4 branches missed.">        return trimmed.startsWith(&quot;{&quot;) &amp;&amp; trimmed.endsWith(&quot;}&quot;);</span>
    }

    private static class PersistentState {
        public WorkspaceToken current;
        public WorkspaceToken rotated;

<span class="nc" id="L313">        public PersistentState() {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L314">        }</span>

<span class="nc" id="L316">        public PersistentState(WorkspaceToken current, WorkspaceToken rotated) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L317">            this.current = current;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L318">            this.rotated = rotated;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L319">        }</span>
    }
}
</pre><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>TokenStoreSPI.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.security</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">TokenStoreSPI.java</span></div><h1>TokenStoreSPI.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.security;

import java.util.Optional;

/**
 * TokenStoreSPI defines the contract for storing per-workspace installation tokens.
 * Implementations must be thread-safe.
 *
 * SECURITY: Token rotation support for long-lived secrets.
 * Supports graceful token transitions with dual-token acceptance.
 */
public interface TokenStoreSPI {
    /** Save or update the installation token for a workspace. */
    void save(String workspaceId, String token);

    /** Retrieve the installation token for a workspace. */
    Optional&lt;String&gt; get(String workspaceId);

    /** Remove the installation token for a workspace. */
    void remove(String workspaceId);

    /**
     * SECURITY: Rotate token to a new value while keeping old token briefly.
     * Allows graceful transition when tokens are updated.
     *
     * @param workspaceId workspace identifier
     * @param newToken the new token to use
     * @throws UnsupportedOperationException if implementation doesn't support rotation
     */
    default void rotate(String workspaceId, String newToken) {
<span class="nc" id="L31">        throw new UnsupportedOperationException(&quot;Token rotation not supported by this TokenStore implementation&quot;);</span>
    }

    /**
     * SECURITY: Checks if token is valid (either current or recent previous).
     * Used to validate webhook signatures during token rotation period.
     *
     * @param workspaceId workspace identifier
     * @param token token to validate
     * @return true if token is current or recently rotated (within grace period)
     */
    default boolean isValidToken(String workspaceId, String token) {
<span class="nc" id="L43">        Optional&lt;String&gt; current = get(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L44" title="All 4 branches missed.">        return current.isPresent() &amp;&amp; current.get().equals(token);</span>
    }

    /**
     * SECURITY: Gets rotation metadata (last rotated time, grace period remaining).
     * Useful for monitoring token rotation status.
     *
     * @param workspaceId workspace identifier
     * @return rotation metadata or empty if no metadata available
     */
    default Optional&lt;RotationMetadata&gt; getRotationMetadata(String workspaceId) {
<span class="nc" id="L55">        return Optional.empty();</span>
    }

    /**
     * Metadata about token rotation state.
     */
    class RotationMetadata {
        public final long lastRotatedAt;
        public final long gracePeriodEndAt;

<span class="nc" id="L65">        public RotationMetadata(long lastRotatedAt, long gracePeriodEndAt) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L66">            this.lastRotatedAt = lastRotatedAt;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L67">            this.gracePeriodEndAt = gracePeriodEndAt;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L68">        }</span>

        public boolean isInGracePeriod() {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L71" title="All 2 branches missed.">            return System.currentTimeMillis() &lt; gracePeriodEndAt;</span>
        }
    }
}

class="ctr2" id="c5">100%</td><td class="bar" id="d18"/><td class="ctr2" id="e18">n/a</td><td class="ctr1" id="f18">0</td><td class="ctr2" id="g18">1</td><td class="ctr1" id="h18">0</td><td id="k19">1</td></tr><tr><td id="a12"><a href="TokenStore.java.html#L38" class="el_method">resetClock()</a></td><td class="bar" id="b20"><img src="../jacoco-resources/greenbar.gif" width="3" class="ctr1" id="h20">0</td><td class="ctr2" id="i20">1</td><td class="ctr1" id="j20">0</td><td class="ctr2" id="k20">1</td></tr></tbody></table><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>AuditLogger.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.security</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">AuditLogger.java</span></div><h1>AuditLogger.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.security;

import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

import java.time.Instant;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.Objects;

/**
 * SECURITY: Audit logging for security-relevant events.
 *
 * Logs all sensitive operations for compliance and debugging:
 * - Authentication events (token validation, rotation)
 * - Authorization failures (rate limit exceeded, CSRF failures)
 * - Data access (token lookups, storage)
 * - Suspicious activity (invalid event types, oversized requests)
 *
 * Output format: JSON for easy parsing by log aggregation systems.
 * Example:
 * &lt;pre&gt;{@code
 * {
 *   &quot;timestamp&quot;:&quot;2025-11-09T10:30:45.123Z&quot;,
 *   &quot;event&quot;:&quot;TOKEN_SAVED&quot;,
 *   &quot;workspace&quot;:&quot;ws-123&quot;,
 *   &quot;status&quot;:&quot;SUCCESS&quot;,
 *   &quot;details&quot;:{&quot;workspaceId&quot;:&quot;ws-123&quot;,&quot;source&quot;:&quot;lifecycle_event&quot;}
 * }
 * }&lt;/pre&gt;
 *
 * Usage:
 * &lt;pre&gt;{@code
 * AuditLogger.log(AuditEvent.TOKEN_VALIDATION_FAILURE)
 *     .workspace(&quot;ws-123&quot;)
 *     .detail(&quot;reason&quot;, &quot;invalid_signature&quot;)
 *     .detail(&quot;ip&quot;, &quot;192.168.1.1&quot;)
 *     .error();
 * }&lt;/pre&gt;
 */
<span class="nc" id="L41">public class AuditLogger {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L42">    private static final Logger auditLog = LoggerFactory.getLogger(&quot;com.clockify.addon.audit&quot;);</span>

    /**
     * Audit events with security significance.
     */
<span class="fc" id="L47">    public enum AuditEvent {</span>
        // Authentication/Authorization
<span class="fc" id="L49">        TOKEN_VALIDATION_SUCCESS(&quot;Token validation succeeded&quot;),</span>
<span class="fc" id="L50">        TOKEN_VALIDATION_FAILURE(&quot;Token validation failed&quot;),</span>
<span class="fc" id="L51">        TOKEN_SAVED(&quot;Token saved to storage&quot;),</span>
<span class="fc" id="L52">        TOKEN_ROTATED(&quot;Token rotated&quot;),</span>
<span class="fc" id="L53">        TOKEN_REMOVED(&quot;Token removed from storage&quot;),</span>
<span class="fc" id="L54">        TOKEN_LOOKUP_FAILURE(&quot;Token lookup failed&quot;),</span>

        // Rate Limiting
<span class="fc" id="L57">        RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED(&quot;Rate limit exceeded&quot;),</span>
<span class="fc" id="L58">        RATE_LIMIT_ENFORCED(&quot;Rate limit enforcement triggered&quot;),</span>

        // CSRF Protection
<span class="fc" id="L61">        CSRF_TOKEN_GENERATED(&quot;CSRF token generated&quot;),</span>
<span class="fc" id="L62">        CSRF_TOKEN_VALIDATED(&quot;CSRF token validated successfully&quot;),</span>
<span class="fc" id="L63">        CSRF_TOKEN_INVALID(&quot;CSRF token validation failed&quot;),</span>

        // Input Validation
<span class="fc" id="L66">        INVALID_EVENT_TYPE(&quot;Invalid webhook event type received&quot;),</span>
<span class="fc" id="L67">        INVALID_PAYLOAD_SIZE(&quot;Payload size exceeds limit&quot;),</span>
<span class="fc" id="L68">        INVALID_JSON(&quot;Malformed JSON payload&quot;),</span>

        // HTTPS Enforcement
<span class="fc" id="L71">        INSECURE_CONNECTION_REJECTED(&quot;Non-HTTPS request rejected&quot;),</span>

        // Database Operations
<span class="fc" id="L74">        DATABASE_CONNECTION_ERROR(&quot;Database connection failed&quot;),</span>
<span class="fc" id="L75">        DATABASE_QUERY_ERROR(&quot;Database query failed&quot;),</span>

        // Suspicious Activity
<span class="fc" id="L78">        SUSPICIOUS_REQUEST(&quot;Suspicious request detected&quot;),</span>
<span class="fc" id="L79">        MULTIPLE_AUTH_FAILURES(&quot;Multiple authentication failures from IP&quot;);</span>

        public final String description;

<span class="fc" id="L83">        AuditEvent(String description) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L84">            this.description = description;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L85">        }</span>
    }

    /**
     * Creates a new audit log entry builder.
     *
     * @param event the audit event
     * @return builder for fluent API
     */
    public static AuditEntry log(AuditEvent event) {
<span class="fc" id="L95">        return new AuditEntry(event);</span>
    }

    /**
     * Builder for audit log entries with fluent API.
     */
    public static class AuditEntry {
        private final AuditEvent event;
        private final long timestamp;
        private String workspace;
        private String clientIp;
        private String userId;
<span class="fc" id="L107">        private String status = &quot;INFO&quot;;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L108">        private Map&lt;String, Object&gt; details = new HashMap&lt;&gt;();</span>

<span class="fc" id="L110">        AuditEntry(AuditEvent event) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L111">            this.event = Objects.requireNonNull(event, &quot;event is required&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L112">            this.timestamp = System.currentTimeMillis();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L113">        }</span>

        /**
         * Sets workspace ID for this audit event.
         */
        public AuditEntry workspace(String workspaceId) {
<span class="fc" id="L119">            this.workspace = workspaceId;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L120">            return this;</span>
        }

        /**
         * Sets client IP address for this audit event.
         */
        public AuditEntry clientIp(String ip) {
<span class="fc" id="L127">            this.clientIp = ip;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L128">            return this;</span>
        }

        /**
         * Sets user ID for this audit event.
         */
        public AuditEntry userId(String id) {
<span class="nc" id="L135">            this.userId = id;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L136">            return this;</span>
        }

        /**
         * Adds a detail to the audit log.
         *
         * @param key the detail key
         * @param value the detail value
         */
        public AuditEntry detail(String key, Object value) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L146" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">            if (key != null &amp;&amp; value != null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L147">                details.put(key, value);</span>
            }
<span class="fc" id="L149">            return this;</span>
        }

        /**
         * Logs this entry as INFO level (default).
         */
        public void info() {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L156" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            if (auditLog.isInfoEnabled()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L157">                auditLog.info(&quot;{}&quot;, toJson(&quot;INFO&quot;));</span>
            }
<span class="fc" id="L159">        }</span>

        /**
         * Logs this entry as WARN level (security issue detected).
         */
        public void warn() {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L165" title="All 2 branches missed.">            if (auditLog.isWarnEnabled()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L166">                auditLog.warn(&quot;{}&quot;, toJson(&quot;WARN&quot;));</span>
            }
<span class="nc" id="L168">        }</span>

        /**
         * Logs this entry as ERROR level (security violation detected).
         */
        public void error() {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L174" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            if (auditLog.isErrorEnabled()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L175">                auditLog.error(&quot;{}&quot;, toJson(&quot;ERROR&quot;));</span>
            }
<span class="fc" id="L177">        }</span>

        /**
         * Converts this entry to JSON format for log aggregation.
         */
        private String toJson(String level) {
<span class="fc" id="L183">            StringBuilder json = new StringBuilder();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L184">            json.append(&quot;{\&quot;timestamp\&quot;:\&quot;&quot;).append(Instant.ofEpochMilli(timestamp).toString()).append(&quot;\&quot;&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L185">            json.append(&quot;,\&quot;event\&quot;:\&quot;&quot;).append(event.name()).append(&quot;\&quot;&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L186">            json.append(&quot;,\&quot;level\&quot;:\&quot;&quot;).append(level).append(&quot;\&quot;&quot;);</span>

<span class="fc bfc" id="L188" title="All 2 branches covered.">            if (workspace != null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L189">                json.append(&quot;,\&quot;workspace\&quot;:\&quot;&quot;).append(escapeJson(workspace)).append(&quot;\&quot;&quot;);</span>
            }
<span class="fc bfc" id="L191" title="All 2 branches covered.">            if (clientIp != null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L192">                json.append(&quot;,\&quot;clientIp\&quot;:\&quot;&quot;).append(escapeJson(clientIp)).append(&quot;\&quot;&quot;);</span>
            }
<span class="pc bpc" id="L194" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            if (userId != null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L195">                json.append(&quot;,\&quot;userId\&quot;:\&quot;&quot;).append(escapeJson(userId)).append(&quot;\&quot;&quot;);</span>
            }

<span class="fc bfc" id="L198" title="All 2 branches covered.">            if (!details.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L199">                json.append(&quot;,\&quot;details\&quot;:{&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L200">                boolean first = true;</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L201" title="All 2 branches covered.">                for (Map.Entry&lt;String, Object&gt; entry : details.entrySet()) {</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L202" title="All 2 branches covered.">                    if (!first) json.append(&quot;,&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L203">                    json.append(&quot;\&quot;&quot;).append(escapeJson(entry.getKey())).append(&quot;\&quot;:&quot;);</span>

<span class="fc" id="L205">                    Object value = entry.getValue();</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L206" title="All 2 branches covered.">                    if (value instanceof String) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L207">                        json.append(&quot;\&quot;&quot;).append(escapeJson((String) value)).append(&quot;\&quot;&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L208" title="3 of 4 branches missed.">                    } else if (value instanceof Number || value instanceof Boolean) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L209">                        json.append(value);</span>
                    } else {
<span class="nc" id="L211">                        json.append(&quot;\&quot;&quot;).append(escapeJson(String.valueOf(value))).append(&quot;\&quot;&quot;);</span>
                    }

<span class="fc" id="L214">                    first = false;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L215">                }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L216">                json.append(&quot;}&quot;);</span>
            }

<span class="fc" id="L219">            json.append(&quot;}&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L220">            return json.toString();</span>
        }

        /**
         * Escapes special characters in JSON strings.
         */
        private static String escapeJson(String input) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L227" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            if (input == null) return &quot;&quot;;</span>

<span class="fc" id="L229">            return input</span>
<span class="fc" id="L230">                    .replace(&quot;\\&quot;, &quot;\\\\&quot;)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L231">                    .replace(&quot;\&quot;&quot;, &quot;\\\&quot;&quot;)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L232">                    .replace(&quot;\b&quot;, &quot;\\b&quot;)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L233">                    .replace(&quot;\f&quot;, &quot;\\f&quot;)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L234">                    .replace(&quot;\n&quot;, &quot;\\n&quot;)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L235">                    .replace(&quot;\r&quot;, &quot;\\r&quot;)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L236">                    .replace(&quot;\t&quot;, &quot;\\t&quot;);</span>
        }
    }
}
</pre><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>RotatingTokenStore.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.security</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">RotatingTokenStore.java</span></div><h1>RotatingTokenStore.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.security;

import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.Optional;
import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;

/**
 * SECURITY: Token rotation wrapper that adds graceful token transition support.
 *
 * Allows applications to rotate tokens to new values while still accepting
 * the previous token for a configurable grace period. This prevents immediate
 * breakage when tokens are updated in Clockify workspace settings.
 *
 * Usage:
 * &lt;pre&gt;{@code
 * TokenStoreSPI baseStore = new DatabaseTokenStore(url, user, pass);
 * TokenStoreSPI rotatingStore = new RotatingTokenStore(baseStore);
 * rotatingStore.rotate(&quot;workspace-1&quot;, &quot;new-token&quot;);  // Supports old and new for grace period
 * }&lt;/pre&gt;
 *
 * Thread-safe: Uses ConcurrentHashMap for rotation state tracking.
 */
public class RotatingTokenStore implements TokenStoreSPI {
<span class="nc" id="L28">    private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(RotatingTokenStore.class);</span>

    private final TokenStoreSPI delegate;
    private final long gracePeriodMs;  // How long to accept old token

    // Track rotation state: workspaceId -&gt; {previousToken, rotatedAt}
<span class="nc" id="L34">    private final Map&lt;String, RotationState&gt; rotationState = new ConcurrentHashMap&lt;&gt;();</span>

    /**
     * Default grace period: 1 hour (3600000 ms)
     * Enough time for all running instances to pick up the new token
     */
    private static final long DEFAULT_GRACE_PERIOD_MS = 3600000;

    /**
     * Creates a rotating token store with default grace period (1 hour).
     *
     * @param delegate the underlying token store to wrap
     */
    public RotatingTokenStore(TokenStoreSPI delegate) {
<span class="nc" id="L48">        this(delegate, DEFAULT_GRACE_PERIOD_MS);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L49">    }</span>

    /**
     * Creates a rotating token store with custom grace period.
     *
     * @param delegate the underlying token store to wrap
     * @param gracePeriodMs milliseconds to accept old token after rotation
     */
<span class="nc" id="L57">    public RotatingTokenStore(TokenStoreSPI delegate, long gracePeriodMs) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L58">        this.delegate = delegate;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L59">        this.gracePeriodMs = gracePeriodMs;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L60">        logger.info(&quot;RotatingTokenStore initialized with grace period: {}ms&quot;, gracePeriodMs);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L61">    }</span>

    @Override
    public void save(String workspaceId, String token) {
<span class="nc" id="L65">        delegate.save(workspaceId, token);</span>
        // Clear rotation state when saving (not a rotation)
<span class="nc" id="L67">        rotationState.remove(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L68">    }</span>

    @Override
    public Optional&lt;String&gt; get(String workspaceId) {
<span class="nc" id="L72">        return delegate.get(workspaceId);</span>
    }

    @Override
    public void remove(String workspaceId) {
<span class="nc" id="L77">        delegate.remove(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L78">        rotationState.remove(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L79">    }</span>

    /**
     * SECURITY: Rotates token to new value while keeping old value in grace period.
     *
     * @param workspaceId workspace identifier
     * @param newToken the new token to use
     */
    @Override
    public void rotate(String workspaceId, String newToken) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L89" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (workspaceId == null || workspaceId.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L90">            throw new IllegalArgumentException(&quot;workspaceId required&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="nc bnc" id="L92" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (newToken == null || newToken.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L93">            throw new IllegalArgumentException(&quot;newToken required&quot;);</span>
        }

        // Get current token before updating
<span class="nc" id="L97">        Optional&lt;String&gt; currentOpt = delegate.get(workspaceId);</span>

        // Save new token
<span class="nc" id="L100">        delegate.save(workspaceId, newToken);</span>

        // Track old token in rotation state
<span class="nc bnc" id="L103" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (currentOpt.isPresent()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L104">            String previousToken = currentOpt.get();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L105">            long now = System.currentTimeMillis();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L106">            RotationState state = new RotationState(previousToken, now, now + gracePeriodMs);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L107">            rotationState.put(workspaceId, state);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L108">            logger.info(&quot;Token rotated for workspace: {} (grace period: {}ms)&quot;, workspaceId, gracePeriodMs);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L109">        } else {</span>
            // No previous token, just clear rotation state
<span class="nc" id="L111">            rotationState.remove(workspaceId);</span>
        }
<span class="nc" id="L113">    }</span>

    /**
     * SECURITY: Validates token against current and recent previous tokens.
     *
     * @param workspaceId workspace identifier
     * @param token token to validate
     * @return true if token matches current OR previous (within grace period)
     */
    @Override
    public boolean isValidToken(String workspaceId, String token) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L124" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (token == null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L125">            return false;</span>
        }

        // Check current token
<span class="nc" id="L129">        Optional&lt;String&gt; current = delegate.get(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L130" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (current.isPresent() &amp;&amp; current.get().equals(token)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L131">            return true;</span>
        }

        // Check previous token (if in grace period)
<span class="nc" id="L135">        RotationState state = rotationState.get(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L136" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (state != null &amp;&amp; state.isInGracePeriod()) {</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L137" title="All 2 branches missed.">            if (state.previousToken.equals(token)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L138">                logger.debug(&quot;Token validation: accepting previous token for workspace: {} (in grace period)&quot;,</span>
                        workspaceId);
<span class="nc" id="L140">                return true;</span>
            }
<span class="nc bnc" id="L142" title="All 2 branches missed.">        } else if (state != null) {</span>
            // Grace period expired, clean up rotation state
<span class="nc" id="L144">            rotationState.remove(workspaceId);</span>
        }

<span class="nc" id="L147">        return false;</span>
    }

    /**
     * SECURITY: Gets rotation metadata for monitoring.
     *
     * @param workspaceId workspace identifier
     * @return rotation metadata if token is currently rotating
     */
    @Override
    public Optional&lt;RotationMetadata&gt; getRotationMetadata(String workspaceId) {
<span class="nc" id="L158">        RotationState state = rotationState.get(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L159" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (state == null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L160">            return Optional.empty();</span>
        }

<span class="nc bnc" id="L163" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (!state.isInGracePeriod()) {</span>
            // Expired, clean up
<span class="nc" id="L165">            rotationState.remove(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L166">            return Optional.empty();</span>
        }

<span class="nc" id="L169">        return Optional.of(new RotationMetadata(state.rotatedAt, state.gracePeriodEndAt));</span>
    }

    /**
     * Internal state for token rotation.
     */
    private static class RotationState {
        final String previousToken;
        final long rotatedAt;
        final long gracePeriodEndAt;

<span class="nc" id="L180">        RotationState(String previousToken, long rotatedAt, long gracePeriodEndAt) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L181">            this.previousToken = previousToken;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L182">            this.rotatedAt = rotatedAt;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L183">            this.gracePeriodEndAt = gracePeriodEndAt;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L184">        }</span>

        boolean isInGracePeriod() {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L187" title="All 2 branches missed.">            return System.currentTimeMillis() &lt; gracePeriodEndAt;</span>
        }
    }
}
</pre><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>WebhookSignatureValidator.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.security</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">WebhookSignatureValidator.java</span></div><h1>WebhookSignatureValidator.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.security;

import com.clockify.addon.sdk.HttpResponse;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

import javax.crypto.Mac;
import javax.crypto.spec.SecretKeySpec;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;

/**
 * Webhook signature validation helpers.
 * - verify(request, workspaceId): high-level verification using stored TokenStore secret
 * - validate(signatureHeader, body, secret): low-level validator
 */
public final class WebhookSignatureValidator {
<span class="fc" id="L19">    private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(WebhookSignatureValidator.class);</span>

    private WebhookSignatureValidator() {}

    public static final String SIGNATURE_HEADER = &quot;clockify-webhook-signature&quot;;
<span class="fc" id="L24">    private static final String[] ALT_HEADERS = new String[]{</span>
            &quot;x-clockify-webhook-signature&quot;,
            &quot;Clockify-Webhook-Signature&quot;,
            &quot;X-Clockify-Webhook-Signature&quot;,
            // Developer workspace often sends JWT under this header
            &quot;Clockify-Signature&quot;
    };

    public static class VerificationResult {
        private final boolean valid;
        private final HttpResponse response;
<span class="fc" id="L35">        public VerificationResult(boolean valid, HttpResponse response) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L36">            this.valid = valid;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L37">            this.response = response;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L38">        }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L39">        public boolean isValid() { return valid; }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L40">        public HttpResponse response() { return response; }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L41">        public static VerificationResult ok() { return new VerificationResult(true, HttpResponse.ok(&quot;ok&quot;)); }</span>
    }

    /**
     * Validates the request using the stored installation token for the workspace.
     * Returns 401 if token/signature missing; 403 if signature mismatch.
     * Logs detailed information at each decision point for troubleshooting.
     */
    public static VerificationResult verify(HttpServletRequest request, String workspaceId) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L50" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (workspaceId == null || workspaceId.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L51">            logger.warn(&quot;Webhook signature validation failed: workspaceId is missing or blank&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L52">            return new VerificationResult(false, HttpResponse.error(401, &quot;{\&quot;error\&quot;:\&quot;workspaceId missing\&quot;}&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;));</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L55">        var tokenOpt = TokenStore.get(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L56" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (tokenOpt.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L57">            logger.warn(&quot;Webhook signature validation failed for workspace '{}': no installation token found in TokenStore&quot;, workspaceId);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L58">            return new VerificationResult(false, HttpResponse.error(401, &quot;{\&quot;error\&quot;:\&quot;installation token not found\&quot;}&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;));</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L60">        logger.debug(&quot;Webhook signature validation starting for workspace '{}'&quot;, workspaceId);</span>

<span class="fc" id="L62">        String sigHeader = request.getHeader(SIGNATURE_HEADER);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L63">        String signatureHeaderUsed = SIGNATURE_HEADER;</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L64" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (sigHeader == null || sigHeader.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L65" title="All 2 branches covered.">            for (String h : ALT_HEADERS) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L66">                String v = request.getHeader(h);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L67" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">                if (v != null &amp;&amp; !v.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L68">                    sigHeader = v;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L69">                    signatureHeaderUsed = h;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L70">                    logger.debug(&quot;Webhook signature validation: signature found in alternate header '{}'&quot;, h);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L71">                    break;</span>
                }
            }
        } else {
<span class="fc" id="L75">            logger.debug(&quot;Webhook signature validation: signature found in primary header&quot;);</span>
        }

<span class="pc bpc" id="L78" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (sigHeader == null || sigHeader.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L79">            logger.warn(&quot;Webhook signature validation failed for workspace '{}': no signature header found (checked {} headers)&quot;,</span>
<span class="fc" id="L80">                workspaceId, 1 + ALT_HEADERS.length);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L81">            return new VerificationResult(false, HttpResponse.error(401, &quot;{\&quot;error\&quot;:\&quot;signature header missing\&quot;}&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;));</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L84">        byte[] body = readRawBody(request).getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L85">        logger.debug(&quot;Webhook signature validation: payload size = {} bytes&quot;, body.length);</span>

        // Path 1: HMAC (sha256=&lt;hex&gt; or raw hex)
<span class="fc bfc" id="L88" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (looksLikeHmac(sigHeader)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L89">            logger.debug(&quot;Webhook signature validation: signature format is HMAC-SHA256&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L90">            boolean ok = validate(sigHeader, body, tokenOpt.get().token());</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L91" title="All 2 branches covered.">            if (!ok) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L92">                logger.warn(&quot;Webhook signature validation failed for workspace '{}': HMAC signature mismatch&quot;, workspaceId);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L93">                return new VerificationResult(false, HttpResponse.error(403, &quot;{\&quot;error\&quot;:\&quot;invalid signature\&quot;}&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;));</span>
            }
<span class="fc" id="L95">            logger.info(&quot;Webhook signature validation successful for workspace '{}': HMAC-SHA256 verified&quot;, workspaceId);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L96">            return VerificationResult.ok();</span>
        }

        // Path 2: Developer JWT (Clockify-Signature)  optionally accept by inspecting payload
<span class="pc bpc" id="L100" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (looksLikeJwt(sigHeader)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L101">            boolean jwtAccepted = acceptJwtDevSignature();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L102">            logger.debug(&quot;Webhook signature validation: signature format is JWT (acceptance enabled: {})&quot;, jwtAccepted);</span>

<span class="pc bpc" id="L104" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            if (jwtAccepted) {</span>
                try {
<span class="fc" id="L106">                    String payload = decodeJwtPayload(sigHeader);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L107">                    logger.debug(&quot;Webhook signature validation: JWT payload decoded successfully&quot;);</span>
                    // naive JSON parse to avoid dependencies
<span class="fc" id="L109">                    String wsFromJwt = extractJsonString(payload, &quot;workspaceId&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L110" title="All 4 branches covered.">                    if (wsFromJwt != null &amp;&amp; wsFromJwt.equals(workspaceId)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L111">                        logger.info(&quot;Webhook signature validation successful for workspace '{}': JWT workspace ID matched&quot;, workspaceId);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L112">                        return VerificationResult.ok();</span>
                    }
                    // fallback: allow when workspaceId missing but header present
<span class="pc bpc" id="L115" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">                    if (wsFromJwt == null || wsFromJwt.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L116">                        logger.info(&quot;Webhook signature validation successful for workspace '{}': JWT accepted (workspaceId not in token)&quot;, workspaceId);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L117">                        return VerificationResult.ok();</span>
                    }
<span class="fc" id="L119">                    logger.warn(&quot;Webhook signature validation failed for workspace '{}': JWT workspace ID mismatch (expected '{}', got '{}')&quot;,</span>
                        workspaceId, workspaceId, wsFromJwt);
<span class="fc" id="L121">                } catch (Exception e) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L122">                    logger.warn(&quot;Webhook signature validation failed for workspace '{}': JWT decoding error: {}&quot;, workspaceId, e.getMessage());</span>
<span class="fc" id="L123">                }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L124">                return new VerificationResult(false, HttpResponse.error(403, &quot;{\&quot;error\&quot;:\&quot;invalid jwt signature\&quot;}&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;));</span>
            } else {
<span class="nc" id="L126">                logger.warn(&quot;Webhook signature validation failed for workspace '{}': JWT signature provided but JWT acceptance is disabled&quot;, workspaceId);</span>
            }
        }

        // Unknown format  treat as invalid
<span class="nc" id="L131">        logger.warn(&quot;Webhook signature validation failed for workspace '{}': signature format unrecognized (neither HMAC nor JWT)&quot;, workspaceId);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L132">        return new VerificationResult(false, HttpResponse.error(403, &quot;{\&quot;error\&quot;:\&quot;invalid signature\&quot;}&quot;, &quot;application/json&quot;));</span>
    }

    /** Low-level validator using HMAC-SHA256 hex. */
    public static boolean validate(String signatureHeader, byte[] body, String sharedSecret) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L137" title="2 of 6 branches missed.">        if (signatureHeader == null || sharedSecret == null || body == null) return false;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L138">        String expected = hmacHex(sharedSecret.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8), body);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L139">        String provided = normalize(signatureHeader);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L140">        return constantTimeEquals(expected, provided);</span>
    }

    /** Utility for tests and tooling: returns header-style signature (&quot;sha256=&lt;hex&gt;&quot;). */
    public static String computeSignature(String sharedSecret, String body) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L145" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (sharedSecret == null) throw new IllegalArgumentException(&quot;sharedSecret is required&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L146">        byte[] key = sharedSecret.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L147" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        byte[] data = body != null ? body.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8) : new byte[0];</span>
<span class="fc" id="L148">        String hex = hmacHex(key, data);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L149">        return &quot;sha256=&quot; + hex;</span>
    }

    private static String readRawBody(HttpServletRequest request) {
<span class="fc" id="L153">        Object cached = request.getAttribute(&quot;clockify.rawBody&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L154" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (cached instanceof String s) return s;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L155">        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L156">        try (BufferedReader reader = request.getReader()) {</span>
            String line;
<span class="fc bfc" id="L158" title="All 2 branches covered.">            while ((line = reader.readLine()) != null) { sb.append(line); }</span>
<span class="pc" id="L159">        } catch (Exception ignored) {}</span>
<span class="fc" id="L160">        return sb.toString();</span>
    }

    private static String hmacHex(byte[] key, byte[] data) {
        try {
<span class="fc" id="L165">            Mac mac = Mac.getInstance(&quot;HmacSHA256&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L166">            mac.init(new SecretKeySpec(key, &quot;HmacSHA256&quot;));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L167">            byte[] out = mac.doFinal(data);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L168">            return toHex(out);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L169">        } catch (Exception e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L170">            throw new RuntimeException(&quot;HMAC failure&quot;, e);</span>
        }
    }

    private static String toHex(byte[] bytes) {
<span class="fc" id="L175">        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(bytes.length * 2);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L176" title="All 2 branches covered.">        for (byte b : bytes) sb.append(String.format(&quot;%02x&quot;, b));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L177">        return sb.toString();</span>
    }

    private static String normalize(String header) {
<span class="fc" id="L181">        String v = header.trim();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L182">        int idx = v.indexOf('=');</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L183" title="All 2 branches covered.">        return (idx &gt; 0) ? v.substring(idx + 1) : v;</span>
    }

    private static boolean constantTimeEquals(String a, String b) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L187" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (a == null || b == null) return false;</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L188" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (a.length() != b.length()) return false;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L189">        int result = 0;</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L190" title="All 2 branches covered.">        for (int i = 0; i &lt; a.length(); i++) result |= a.charAt(i) ^ b.charAt(i);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L191" title="All 2 branches covered.">        return result == 0;</span>
    }

    private static boolean looksLikeHmac(String sig) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L195" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        String s = sig != null ? sig.trim() : &quot;&quot;;</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L196" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (s.startsWith(&quot;sha256=&quot;)) s = s.substring(&quot;sha256=&quot;.length());</span>
<span class="fc" id="L197">        return s.matches(&quot;[0-9a-fA-F]{64}&quot;);</span>
    }

    private static boolean looksLikeJwt(String sig) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L201" title="3 of 6 branches missed.">        return sig != null &amp;&amp; sig.contains(&quot;.&quot;) &amp;&amp; sig.split(&quot;\\.&quot;).length &gt;= 2;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Controls whether to accept developer JWT signatures (dev workspaces only).
     * SECURITY: Defaults to FALSE for safety. Requires explicit opt-in for development.
     * Environment variable: ADDON_ACCEPT_JWT_SIGNATURE (set to &quot;true&quot; to enable)
     */
    private static boolean acceptJwtDevSignature() {
<span class="fc" id="L210">        String v = System.getProperty(&quot;ADDON_ACCEPT_JWT_SIGNATURE&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L211" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (v == null || v.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L212">            v = System.getenv(&quot;ADDON_ACCEPT_JWT_SIGNATURE&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L214">        return &quot;true&quot;.equalsIgnoreCase(v);</span>
    }

    private static String decodeJwtPayload(String jwt) {
<span class="fc" id="L218">        String[] parts = jwt.split(&quot;\\.&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L219" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (parts.length &lt; 2) return &quot;&quot;;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L220">        String b64 = parts[1]</span>
<span class="fc" id="L221">                .replace('-', '+')</span>
<span class="fc" id="L222">                .replace('_', '/')</span>
<span class="fc" id="L223">                .trim();</span>
        // pad base64url if needed
<span class="fc bfc" id="L225" title="All 2 branches covered.">        while (b64.length() % 4 != 0) b64 += &quot;=&quot;;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L226">        byte[] bytes = java.util.Base64.getDecoder().decode(b64);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L227">        return new String(bytes, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);</span>
    }

    private static String extractJsonString(String json, String key) {
        // very small parser: looks for &quot;key&quot;:&quot;value&quot;
<span class="pc bpc" id="L232" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (json == null || key == null) return null;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L233">        String pattern = &quot;\&quot;&quot; + key + &quot;\&quot;\s*:\s*\&quot;&quot;; // &quot;key&quot;:&quot;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L234">        java.util.regex.Matcher m = java.util.regex.Pattern.compile(pattern).matcher(json);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L235" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (m.find()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L236">            int start = m.end();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L237">            int end = json.indexOf('&quot;', start);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L238" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            if (end &gt; start) return json.substring(start, end);</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L240">        return null;</span>
    }
}
