src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.security</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">InMemoryTokenStore.java</span></div><h1>InMemoryTokenStore.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.security;

import java.util.Map;
import java.util.Optional;
import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;

/**
 * In-memory demo implementation. Not suitable for production.
 */
<span class="nc" id="L10">public class InMemoryTokenStore implements TokenStoreSPI {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L11">    private final Map&lt;String, String&gt; tokenByWorkspace = new ConcurrentHashMap&lt;&gt;();</span>

    @Override
    public void save(String workspaceId, String token) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L15" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (workspaceId == null || workspaceId.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L16">            throw new IllegalArgumentException(&quot;workspaceId is required&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="nc bnc" id="L18" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (token == null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L19">            throw new IllegalArgumentException(&quot;token is required&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="nc" id="L21">        tokenByWorkspace.put(workspaceId, token);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L22">    }</span>

    @Override
    public Optional&lt;String&gt; get(String workspaceId) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L26" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (workspaceId == null || workspaceId.isEmpty()) return Optional.empty();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L27">        return Optional.ofNullable(tokenByWorkspace.get(workspaceId));</span>
    }

    @Override
    public void remove(String workspaceId) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L32" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (workspaceId == null || workspaceId.isEmpty()) return;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L33">        tokenByWorkspace.remove(workspaceId);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L34">    }</span>
}
</pre><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>PooledDatabaseTokenStore.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.security</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">PooledDatabaseTokenStore.java</span></div><h1>PooledDatabaseTokenStore.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.security;

import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
import com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariConfig;
import com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

import java.sql.Connection;
import java.sql.PreparedStatement;
import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.util.Objects;
import java.util.Optional;

/**
 * PRODUCTION: Database token store with HikariCP connection pooling.
 *
 * Features:
 * - High-performance connection pooling (HikariCP)
 * - Configurable pool size and timeouts
 * - Thread-safe and production-ready
 * - Metrics and monitoring integration
 * - Automatic connection validation
 *
 * HikariCP is the fastest and most reliable JDBC connection pool for Java.
 * Default pool: 10 connections, 30-second idle timeout.
 *
 * Usage:
 * &lt;pre&gt;{@code
 * PooledDatabaseTokenStore tokenStore = new PooledDatabaseTokenStore(
 *     &quot;jdbc:postgresql://localhost/clockify_addon&quot;,
 *     &quot;clockify_user&quot;,
 *     &quot;secure_password&quot;
 * );
 * // Uses connection pooling transparently
 * tokenStore.save(&quot;workspace-id&quot;, &quot;token&quot;);
 * tokenStore.shutdown();  // Close pool on application shutdown
 * }&lt;/pre&gt;
 */
public class PooledDatabaseTokenStore implements TokenStoreSPI, AutoCloseable {
<span class="nc" id="L43">    private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(PooledDatabaseTokenStore.class);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L44">    private static final ObjectMapper OBJECT_MAPPER = new ObjectMapper();</span>

    private final HikariDataSource dataSource;

    // Default HikariCP configuration
    private static final int DEFAULT_POOL_SIZE = 10;
    private static final long DEFAULT_IDLE_TIMEOUT_MS = 30000;  // 30 seconds
    private static final long DEFAULT_MAX_LIFETIME_MS = 1800000; // 30 minutes

    /**
     * Creates a pooled token store with default HikariCP configuration.
     *
     * @param jdbcUrl JDBC connection URL
     * @param username database username
     * @param password database password
     */
    public PooledDatabaseTokenStore(String jdbcUrl, String username, String password) {
<span class="nc" id="L61">        this(jdbcUrl, username, password, DEFAULT_POOL_SIZE);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L62">    }</span>

    /**
     * Creates a pooled token store with custom pool size.
     *
     * @param jdbcUrl JDBC connection URL
     * @param username database username
     * @param password database password
     * @param poolSize number of connections to maintain
     */
<span class="nc" id="L72">    public PooledDatabaseTokenStore(String jdbcUrl, String username, String password, int poolSize) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L73">        Objects.requireNonNull(jdbcUrl, &quot;jdbcUrl is required&quot;);</span>

<span class="nc" id="L75">        HikariConfig config = new HikariConfig();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L76">        config.setJdbcUrl(jdbcUrl);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L77">        config.setUsername(username);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L78">        config.setPassword(password);</span>

        // Pool configuration
<span class="nc" id="L81">        config.setMaximumPoolSize(poolSize);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L82">        config.setMinimumIdle(Math.max(2, poolSize / 3));  // At least 2 idle connections</span>
<span class="nc" id="L83">        config.setIdleTimeout(DEFAULT_IDLE_TIMEOUT_MS);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L84">        config.setMaxLifetime(DEFAULT_MAX_LIFETIME_MS);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L85">        config.setConnectionTimeout(30000);  // 30 seconds to acquire connection</span>

        // Validation
<span class="nc" id="L88">        config.setLeakDetectionThreshold(60000);  // Log if connection held &gt; 60 seconds</span>
<span class="nc" id="L89">        config.setAutoCommit(true);</span>

        // Pool name for metrics and monitoring
<span class="nc" id="L92">        config.setPoolName(&quot;ClockifyAddonPool&quot;);</span>

        // Register shutdown hook for graceful shutdown
<span class="nc" id="L95">        config.setRegisterMbeans(true);</span>

<span class="nc" id="L97">        this.dataSource = new HikariDataSource(config);</span>

<span class="nc" id="L99">        logger.info(&quot;PooledDatabaseTokenStore initialized: jdbcUrl={}, poolSize={}, idleTimeout={}ms&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L100">                jdbcUrl, poolSize, DEFAULT_IDLE_TIMEOUT_MS);</span>

        // Ensure table exists
<span class="nc" id="L103">        ensureTable();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L104">    }</span>

    /**
     * Creates a pooled token store from environment variables.
     *
     * @return configured PooledDatabaseTokenStore
     * @throws IllegalStateException if required variables are missing
     */
    public static PooledDatabaseTokenStore fromEnvironment() {
<span class="nc" id="L113">        String url = System.getenv(&quot;DB_URL&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L114">        String user = System.getenv(&quot;DB_USERNAME&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L115">        String pass = System.getenv(&quot;DB_PASSWORD&quot;);</span>

<span class="nc bnc" id="L117" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (url == null || url.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L118">            throw new IllegalStateException(&quot;DB_URL is required to use PooledDatabaseTokenStore&quot;);</span>
        }

<span class="nc" id="L121">        String poolSizeEnv = System.getenv(&quot;DB_POOL_SIZE&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L122">        int poolSize = DEFAULT_POOL_SIZE;</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L123" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (poolSizeEnv != null &amp;&amp; !poolSizeEnv.isBlank()) {</span>
            try {
<span class="nc" id="L125">                poolSize = Integer.parseInt(poolSizeEnv);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L126" title="All 2 branches missed.">                if (poolSize &lt; 1) poolSize = DEFAULT_POOL_SIZE;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L127">            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L128">                logger.warn(&quot;Invalid DB_POOL_SIZE: {} (using default: {})&quot;, poolSizeEnv, DEFAULT_POOL_SIZE);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L129">            }</span>
        }

<span class="nc" id="L132">        return new PooledDatabaseTokenStore(url, user, pass, poolSize);</span>
    }

    @Override
    public void save(String workspaceId, String token) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L137" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (workspaceId == null || workspaceId.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L138">            throw new IllegalArgumentException(&quot;workspaceId required&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="nc bnc" id="L140" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (token == null || token.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L141">            throw new IllegalArgumentException(&quot;token required&quot;);</span>
        }

<span class="nc" id="L144">        long now = System.currentTimeMillis();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L145">        String upsert = &quot;INSERT INTO addon_tokens (workspace_id, auth_token, api_base_url, created_at, last_accessed_at) &quot; +</span>
                &quot;VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?) &quot; +
                &quot;ON CONFLICT (workspace_id) DO UPDATE SET auth_token = EXCLUDED.auth_token, api_base_url = EXCLUDED.api_base_url, last_accessed_at = EXCLUDED.last_accessed_at&quot;;
<span class="nc" id="L148">        String apiBaseUrl = extractApiBaseUrl(token);</span>

<span class="nc" id="L150">        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L151">        try (Connection c = dataSource.getConnection();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L152">             PreparedStatement ps = c.prepareStatement(upsert)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L153">            ps.setString(1, workspaceId);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L154">            ps.setString(2, token);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L155">            ps.setString(3, apiBaseUrl);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L156">            ps.setLong(4, now);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L157">            ps.setLong(5, now);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L158">            int rows = ps.executeUpdate();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L159">            long elapsed = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L160">            logger.info(&quot;Token saved for workspace '{}': rows_affected={}, elapsed_ms={}&quot;, workspaceId, rows, elapsed);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L161">        } catch (SQLException e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L162">            long elapsed = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L163">            String errorMsg = String.format(&quot;Failed to save token for workspace %s: %s&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L164">                    workspaceId, e.getMessage());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L165">            logger.error(&quot;Token save failed for workspace '{}': elapsed_ms={}, error_code={}, message={}&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L166">                    workspaceId, elapsed, e.getErrorCode(), e.getMessage(), e);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L167">            throw new RuntimeException(errorMsg, e);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L168">        }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L169">    }</span>

    @Override
    public Optional&lt;String&gt; get(String workspaceId) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L173" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (workspaceId == null || workspaceId.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L174">            logger.debug(&quot;Token get requested with blank workspace ID&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L175">            return Optional.empty();</span>
        }

<span class="nc" id="L178">        String sql = &quot;SELECT auth_token FROM addon_tokens WHERE workspace_id = ?&quot;;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L179">        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L180">        try (Connection c = dataSource.getConnection();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L181">             PreparedStatement ps = c.prepareStatement(sql)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L182">            ps.setString(1, workspaceId);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L183">            try (ResultSet rs = ps.executeQuery()) {</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L184" title="All 2 branches missed.">                if (rs.next()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L185">                    long elapsed = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L186">                    logger.debug(&quot;Token found for workspace '{}': elapsed_ms={}&quot;, workspaceId, elapsed);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L187">                    return Optional.ofNullable(rs.getString(1));</span>
                }
<span class="nc bnc" id="L189" title="All 2 branches missed.">            }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L190">            long elapsed = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L191">            logger.warn(&quot;Token not found for workspace '{}': elapsed_ms={}&quot;, workspaceId, elapsed);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L192" title="All 4 branches missed.">        } catch (SQLException e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L193">            long elapsed = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L194">            String errorMsg = String.format(&quot;Failed to fetch token for workspace %s: %s&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L195">                    workspaceId, e.getMessage());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L196">            logger.error(&quot;Token get failed for workspace '{}': elapsed_ms={}, error_code={}, message={}&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L197">                    workspaceId, elapsed, e.getErrorCode(), e.getMessage(), e);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L198">            throw new RuntimeException(errorMsg, e);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L199">        }</span>

<span class="nc" id="L201">        return Optional.empty();</span>
    }

    @Override
    public void remove(String workspaceId) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L206" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (workspaceId == null || workspaceId.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L207">            logger.debug(&quot;Token remove requested with blank workspace ID&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L208">            return;</span>
        }

<span class="nc" id="L211">        String sql = &quot;DELETE FROM addon_tokens WHERE workspace_id = ?&quot;;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L212">        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L213">        try (Connection c = dataSource.getConnection();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L214">             PreparedStatement ps = c.prepareStatement(sql)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L215">            ps.setString(1, workspaceId);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L216">            int rows = ps.executeUpdate();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L217">            long elapsed = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L218">            logger.info(&quot;Token removed for workspace '{}': rows_deleted={}, elapsed_ms={}&quot;, workspaceId, rows, elapsed);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L219">        } catch (SQLException e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L220">            long elapsed = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L221">            String errorMsg = String.format(&quot;Failed to delete token for workspace %s: %s&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L222">                    workspaceId, e.getMessage());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L223">            logger.error(&quot;Token remove failed for workspace '{}': elapsed_ms={}, error_code={}, message={}&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L224">                    workspaceId, elapsed, e.getErrorCode(), e.getMessage(), e);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L225">            throw new RuntimeException(errorMsg, e);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L226">        }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L227">    }</span>

    /**
     * Health check: returns number of active tokens.
     */
    public long count() {
<span class="nc" id="L233">        String sql = &quot;SELECT COUNT(*) FROM addon_tokens&quot;;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L234">        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L235">        try (Connection c = dataSource.getConnection();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L236">             PreparedStatement ps = c.prepareStatement(sql);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L237">             ResultSet rs = ps.executeQuery()) {</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L238" title="All 2 branches missed.">            if (rs.next()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L239">                long count = rs.getLong(1);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L240">                long elapsed = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L241">                logger.debug(&quot;Token count query completed: count={}, elapsed_ms={}&quot;, count, elapsed);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L242">                return count;</span>
            }
<span class="nc" id="L244">            long elapsed = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L245">            logger.debug(&quot;Token count query returned no results: elapsed_ms={}&quot;, elapsed);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L246">            return 0L;</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L247" title="All 6 branches missed.">        } catch (SQLException e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L248">            long elapsed = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L249">            String errorMsg = String.format(&quot;Failed to count tokens: %s&quot;, e.getMessage());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L250">            logger.error(&quot;Token count failed: elapsed_ms={}, error_code={}, message={}&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L251">                    elapsed, e.getErrorCode(), e.getMessage(), e);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L252">            throw new RuntimeException(errorMsg, e);</span>
        }
    }

    /**
     * Gets HikariCP pool statistics for monitoring.
     */
    public HikariPoolStats getPoolStats() {
<span class="nc" id="L260">        int active = dataSource.getHikariPoolMXBean().getActiveConnections();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L261">        int idle = dataSource.getHikariPoolMXBean().getIdleConnections();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L262">        int total = dataSource.getHikariPoolMXBean().getTotalConnections();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L263">        int waiting = dataSource.getHikariPoolMXBean().getThreadsAwaitingConnection();</span>

<span class="nc" id="L265">        HikariPoolStats stats = new HikariPoolStats(active, idle, total, waiting);</span>

        // Log pool statistics at DEBUG level for monitoring
<span class="nc bnc" id="L268" title="All 2 branches missed.">        double usagePercent = total &gt; 0 ? (active * 100.0 / total) : 0;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L269">        logger.debug(&quot;Connection pool stats: active={}, idle={}, total={}, waiting={}, usage={}%&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L270">                active, idle, total, waiting, String.format(&quot;%.1f&quot;, usagePercent));</span>

        // Warn if pool is approaching exhaustion
<span class="nc bnc" id="L273" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (waiting &gt; 0) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L274">            logger.warn(&quot;Threads waiting for connection pool: {} threads (active={}, total={})&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L275">                    waiting, active, total);</span>
        }
<span class="nc bnc" id="L277" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (usagePercent &gt; 80) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L278">            logger.warn(&quot;Connection pool usage high: {}% (active={}, total={})&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L279">                    String.format(&quot;%.1f&quot;, usagePercent), active, total);</span>
        }

<span class="nc" id="L282">        return stats;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Pool statistics for monitoring and debugging.
     */
    public static class HikariPoolStats {
        public final int activeConnections;
        public final int idleConnections;
        public final int totalConnections;
        public final int threadsWaiting;

<span class="nc" id="L294">        public HikariPoolStats(int active, int idle, int total, int waiting) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L295">            this.activeConnections = active;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L296">            this.idleConnections = idle;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L297">            this.totalConnections = total;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L298">            this.threadsWaiting = waiting;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L299">        }</span>

        @Override
        public String toString() {
<span class="nc" id="L303">            return String.format(&quot;HikariPool[active=%d, idle=%d, total=%d, waiting=%d]&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L304">                    activeConnections, idleConnections, totalConnections, threadsWaiting);</span>
        }
    }

    /**
     * Ensures token table exists in database.
     */
    private void ensureTable() {
<span class="nc" id="L312">        String ddl = &quot;CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS addon_tokens (&quot; +</span>
                &quot;workspace_id VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY, &quot; +
                &quot;auth_token TEXT NOT NULL, &quot; +
                &quot;api_base_url VARCHAR(512), &quot; +
                &quot;created_at BIGINT NOT NULL, &quot; +
                &quot;last_accessed_at BIGINT NOT NULL)&quot;;

<span class="nc" id="L319">        try (Connection c = dataSource.getConnection();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L320">             PreparedStatement ps = c.prepareStatement(ddl)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L321">            ps.execute();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L322">            logger.debug(&quot;Ensured addon_tokens table exists&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L323">        } catch (SQLException e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L324">            logger.warn(&quot;Could not auto-create addon_tokens table (may already exist or require manual setup): {}&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L325">                    e.getMessage());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L326">        }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L327">    }</span>

    private String extractApiBaseUrl(String rawToken) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L330" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (rawToken == null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L331">            return null;</span>
        }
<span class="nc" id="L333">        String trimmed = rawToken.trim();</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L334" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (!trimmed.startsWith(&quot;{&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L335">            return null;</span>
        }
        try {
<span class="nc" id="L338">            JsonNode node = OBJECT_MAPPER.readTree(trimmed);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L339">            JsonNode current = node.get(&quot;current&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L340" title="All 4 branches missed.">            if (current != null &amp;&amp; current.hasNonNull(&quot;apiBaseUrl&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L341">                return current.get(&quot;apiBaseUrl&quot;).asText();</span>
            }
<span class="nc" id="L343">        } catch (Exception ignored) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L344">        }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L345">        return null;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Closes the connection pool.
     * IMPORTANT: Call this on application shutdown to prevent resource leaks.
     */
    @Override
    public void close() {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L354" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (dataSource != null &amp;&amp; !dataSource.isClosed()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L355">            logger.info(&quot;Closing PooledDatabaseTokenStore connection pool&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L356">            dataSource.close();</span>
        }
<span class="nc" id="L358">    }</span>

    /**
     * Checks if the pool is closed.
     */
    public boolean isClosed() {
<span class="nc" id="L364">        return dataSource.isClosed();</span>
    }

    /**
     * Validates database connection.
     * Useful for health checks.
     */
    public void validateConnection() throws SQLException {
<span class="nc" id="L372">        try (Connection c = dataSource.getConnection()) {</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L373" title="All 2 branches missed.">            if (c.isClosed()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L374">                throw new SQLException(&quot;Connection is closed&quot;);</span>
            }
<span class="nc" id="L376">            logger.debug(&quot;Database connection validated successfully&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="nc" id="L378">    }</span>
}

"http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.security</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">DatabaseTokenStore.java</span></div><h1>DatabaseTokenStore.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.security;

import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

import java.sql.Connection;
import java.sql.DriverManager;
import java.sql.PreparedStatement;
import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.util.Objects;
import java.util.Optional;

/**
 * Minimal JDBC-based TokenStore implementation suitable for production use.
 *
 * Notes:
 * - Uses a simple table named {@code addon_tokens} with columns
 *   (workspace_id VARCHAR PRIMARY KEY, auth_token TEXT, created_at BIGINT, last_accessed_at BIGINT, api_base_url VARCHAR).
 * - Opens a connection per operation. For production, prefer a connection pool (e.g., HikariCP).
 * - Does not manage schema migrations; will attempt to create the table if it does not exist.
 */
public class DatabaseTokenStore implements TokenStoreSPI {
<span class="nc" id="L26">    private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(DatabaseTokenStore.class);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L27">    private static final ObjectMapper OBJECT_MAPPER = new ObjectMapper();</span>

    private final String jdbcUrl;
    private final String username;
    private final String password;

<span class="nc" id="L33">    public DatabaseTokenStore(String jdbcUrl, String username, String password) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L34">        this.jdbcUrl = Objects.requireNonNull(jdbcUrl, &quot;jdbcUrl&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L35">        this.username = username;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L36">        this.password = password;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L37">        ensureTable();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L38">    }</span>

    /** Construct from environment variables: DB_URL, DB_USER, DB_PASSWORD. */
    public static DatabaseTokenStore fromEnvironment() {
<span class="nc" id="L42">        String url = System.getenv(&quot;DB_URL&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L43">        String user = System.getenv(&quot;DB_USER&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L44">        String pass = System.getenv(&quot;DB_PASSWORD&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L45" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (url == null || url.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L46">            throw new IllegalStateException(&quot;DB_URL is required to use DatabaseTokenStore&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="nc" id="L48">        return new DatabaseTokenStore(url, user, pass);</span>
    }

    @Override
    public void save(String workspaceId, String token) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L53" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (workspaceId == null || workspaceId.isBlank()) throw new IllegalArgumentException(&quot;workspaceId required&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L54" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (token == null || token.isBlank()) throw new IllegalArgumentException(&quot;token required&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L55">        long now = System.currentTimeMillis();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L56">        String upsert = &quot;INSERT INTO addon_tokens (workspace_id, auth_token, api_base_url, created_at, last_accessed_at) &quot; +</span>
                &quot;VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?) &quot; +
                &quot;ON CONFLICT (workspace_id) DO UPDATE SET auth_token = EXCLUDED.auth_token, api_base_url = EXCLUDED.api_base_url, last_accessed_at = EXCLUDED.last_accessed_at&quot;;
<span class="nc" id="L59">        String apiBaseUrl = extractApiBaseUrl(token);</span>
        // MySQL fallback will ignore ON CONFLICT; users can adapt schema/SQL as needed.
<span class="nc" id="L61">        try (Connection c = getConnection()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L62">            try (PreparedStatement ps = c.prepareStatement(upsert)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L63">                ps.setString(1, workspaceId);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L64">                ps.setString(2, token);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L65">                ps.setString(3, apiBaseUrl);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L66">                ps.setLong(4, now);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L67">                ps.setLong(5, now);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L68">                ps.executeUpdate();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L69">            } catch (SQLException e) {</span>
                // Fallback to separate insert/update for drivers without ON CONFLICT support
<span class="nc" id="L71">                logger.debug(&quot;ON CONFLICT not supported, falling back to INSERT/UPDATE: {}&quot;, e.getMessage());</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L72" title="All 2 branches missed.">                if (!tryUpdate(c, workspaceId, token, apiBaseUrl, now)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L73">                    tryInsert(c, workspaceId, token, apiBaseUrl, now);</span>
                }
<span class="nc" id="L75">            }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L76">        } catch (SQLException e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L77">            String errorMsg = String.format(&quot;Failed to save token for workspace %s: %s&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L78">                    workspaceId, e.getMessage());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L79">            logger.error(errorMsg, e);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L80">            throw new RuntimeException(errorMsg, e);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L81">        }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L82">    }</span>

    @Override
    public Optional&lt;String&gt; get(String workspaceId) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L86" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (workspaceId == null || workspaceId.isBlank()) return Optional.empty();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L87">        String sql = &quot;SELECT auth_token FROM addon_tokens WHERE workspace_id = ?&quot;;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L88">        try (Connection c = getConnection(); PreparedStatement ps = c.prepareStatement(sql)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L89">            ps.setString(1, workspaceId);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L90">            try (ResultSet rs = ps.executeQuery()) {</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L91" title="All 2 branches missed.">                if (rs.next()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L92">                    return Optional.ofNullable(rs.getString(1));</span>
                }
<span class="nc bnc" id="L94" title="All 2 branches missed.">            }</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L95" title="All 4 branches missed.">        } catch (SQLException e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L96">            String errorMsg = String.format(&quot;Failed to fetch token for workspace %s: %s&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L97">                    workspaceId, e.getMessage());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L98">            logger.error(errorMsg, e);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L99">            throw new RuntimeException(errorMsg, e);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L100">        }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L101">        return Optional.empty();</span>
    }

    @Override
    public void remove(String workspaceId) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L106" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (workspaceId == null || workspaceId.isBlank()) return;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L107">        String sql = &quot;DELETE FROM addon_tokens WHERE workspace_id = ?&quot;;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L108">        try (Connection c = getConnection(); PreparedStatement ps = c.prepareStatement(sql)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L109">            ps.setString(1, workspaceId);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L110">            ps.executeUpdate();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L111">        } catch (SQLException e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L112">            String errorMsg = String.format(&quot;Failed to delete token for workspace %s: %s&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L113">                    workspaceId, e.getMessage());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L114">            logger.error(errorMsg, e);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L115">            throw new RuntimeException(errorMsg, e);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L116">        }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L117">    }</span>

    /** Simple utility for health checks: returns number of rows. */
    public long count() {
<span class="nc" id="L121">        String sql = &quot;SELECT COUNT(*) FROM addon_tokens&quot;;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L122">        try (Connection c = getConnection(); PreparedStatement ps = c.prepareStatement(sql); ResultSet rs = ps.executeQuery()) {</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L123" title="All 2 branches missed.">            if (rs.next()) return rs.getLong(1);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L124">            return 0L;</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L125" title="All 6 branches missed.">        } catch (SQLException e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L126">            String errorMsg = String.format(&quot;Failed to count tokens: %s&quot;, e.getMessage());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L127">            logger.error(errorMsg, e);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L128">            throw new RuntimeException(errorMsg, e);</span>
        }
    }

    private boolean tryUpdate(Connection c, String ws, String token, String apiBaseUrl, long now) {
<span class="nc" id="L133">        String upd = &quot;UPDATE addon_tokens SET auth_token = ?, api_base_url = ?, last_accessed_at = ? WHERE workspace_id = ?&quot;;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L134">        try (PreparedStatement ps = c.prepareStatement(upd)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L135">            ps.setString(1, token);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L136">            ps.setString(2, apiBaseUrl);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L137">            ps.setLong(3, now);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L138">            ps.setString(4, ws);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L139">            int n = ps.executeUpdate();</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L140" title="All 2 branches missed.">            return n &gt; 0;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L141">        } catch (SQLException ex) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L142">            String errorMsg = String.format(&quot;Failed to update token for workspace %s: %s&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L143">                    ws, ex.getMessage());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L144">            logger.warn(errorMsg, ex);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L145">            return false;</span>
        }
    }

    private void tryInsert(Connection c, String ws, String token, String apiBaseUrl, long now) throws SQLException {
<span class="nc" id="L150">        String ins = &quot;INSERT INTO addon_tokens (workspace_id, auth_token, api_base_url, created_at, last_accessed_at) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)&quot;;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L151">        try (PreparedStatement ps = c.prepareStatement(ins)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L152">            ps.setString(1, ws);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L153">            ps.setString(2, token);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L154">            ps.setString(3, apiBaseUrl);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L155">            ps.setLong(4, now);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L156">            ps.setLong(5, now);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L157">            ps.executeUpdate();</span>
        }
<span class="nc" id="L159">    }</span>

    private Connection getConnection() throws SQLException {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L162" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (username != null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L163">            return DriverManager.getConnection(jdbcUrl, username, password);</span>
        }
<span class="nc" id="L165">        return DriverManager.getConnection(jdbcUrl);</span>
    }

    private void ensureTable() {
<span class="nc" id="L169">        String ddlPg = &quot;CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS addon_tokens (&quot; +</span>
                &quot;workspace_id VARCHAR(255) PRIMARY KEY, &quot; +
                &quot;auth_token TEXT NOT NULL, &quot; +
                &quot;api_base_url VARCHAR(512), &quot; +
                &quot;created_at BIGINT NOT NULL, &quot; +
                &quot;last_accessed_at BIGINT NOT NULL)&quot;;
<span class="nc" id="L175">        try (Connection c = getConnection(); PreparedStatement ps = c.prepareStatement(ddlPg)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L176">            ps.execute();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L177">            logger.debug(&quot;Ensured addon_tokens table exists&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L178">        } catch (SQLException e) {</span>
            // Log the error but continue - allow external schema management or retry on next operation
<span class="nc" id="L180">            logger.warn(&quot;Could not auto-create addon_tokens table (may already exist or require manual setup): {}&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L181">                    e.getMessage());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L182">        }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L183">    }</span>

    private String extractApiBaseUrl(String rawToken) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L186" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (rawToken == null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L187">            return null;</span>
        }
<span class="nc" id="L189">        String trimmed = rawToken.trim();</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L190" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (!trimmed.startsWith(&quot;{&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L191">            return null;</span>
        }
        try {
<span class="nc" id="L194">            JsonNode node = OBJECT_MAPPER.readTree(trimmed);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L195">            JsonNode current = node.get(&quot;current&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L196" title="All 4 branches missed.">            if (current != null &amp;&amp; current.hasNonNull(&quot;apiBaseUrl&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L197">                return current.get(&quot;apiBaseUrl&quot;).asText();</span>
            }
<span class="nc" id="L199">        } catch (Exception ignored) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L200">        }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L201">        return null;</span>
    }

PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.logging</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">LoggingContext.java</span></div><h1>LoggingContext.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.logging;

import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import org.slf4j.MDC;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

/**
 * Helper for temporarily attaching structured context (workspaceId, userId, etc.) to MDC.
 * Usage:
 * &lt;pre&gt;
 * try (LoggingContext ctx = LoggingContext.create(request).workspace(workspaceId).user(userId)) {
 *     // handler logic
 * }
 * &lt;/pre&gt;
 */
public final class LoggingContext implements AutoCloseable {
<span class="nc" id="L19">    private final List&lt;String&gt; keys = new ArrayList&lt;&gt;();</span>

<span class="nc" id="L21">    private LoggingContext() {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L22">    }</span>

    public static LoggingContext create() {
<span class="nc" id="L25">        return new LoggingContext();</span>
    }

    public static LoggingContext create(HttpServletRequest request) {
<span class="nc" id="L29">        LoggingContext ctx = new LoggingContext();</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L30" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (request != null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L31">            Object workspaceId = request.getAttribute(com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware.DiagnosticContextFilter.WORKSPACE_ID_ATTR);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L32">            Object userId = request.getAttribute(com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware.DiagnosticContextFilter.USER_ID_ATTR);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L33" title="All 2 branches missed.">            ctx.workspace(workspaceId == null ? null : workspaceId.toString());</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L34" title="All 2 branches missed.">            ctx.user(userId == null ? null : userId.toString());</span>
        }
<span class="nc" id="L36">        return ctx;</span>
    }

    public LoggingContext workspace(String workspaceId) {
<span class="nc" id="L40">        return put(&quot;workspaceId&quot;, workspaceId);</span>
    }

    public LoggingContext user(String userId) {
<span class="nc" id="L44">        return put(&quot;userId&quot;, userId);</span>
    }

    public LoggingContext request(String requestId) {
<span class="nc" id="L48">        return put(&quot;requestId&quot;, requestId);</span>
    }

    private LoggingContext put(String key, String value) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L52" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (value != null &amp;&amp; !value.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L53">            MDC.put(key, value);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L54">            keys.add(key);</span>
        }
<span class="nc" id="L56">        return this;</span>
    }

    @Override
    public void close() {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L61" title="All 2 branches missed.">        for (String key : keys) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L62">            MDC.remove(key);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L63">        }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L64">    }</span>
}
</pre><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>RedactingLogger.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.logging</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">RedactingLogger.java</span></div><h1>RedactingLogger.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.logging;

import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

import java.util.Collections;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Locale;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.Set;

/**
 * Wraps an SLF4J logger and redacts sensitive headers before emitting structured messages.
 */
public final class RedactingLogger {
    public static final String REDACTED_VALUE = &quot;redacted&quot;;
<span class="fc" id="L17">    private static final Set&lt;String&gt; SECRET_HEADERS = Set.of(</span>
            &quot;authorization&quot;,
            &quot;proxy-authorization&quot;,
            &quot;x-addon-token&quot;,
            &quot;clockify-webhook-signature&quot;,
            &quot;cookie&quot;,
            &quot;set-cookie&quot;
    );

    private final Logger logger;

<span class="fc" id="L28">    private RedactingLogger(Class&lt;?&gt; owner) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L29">        this.logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(owner);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L30">    }</span>

    public static RedactingLogger get(Class&lt;?&gt; owner) {
<span class="fc" id="L33">        return new RedactingLogger(owner);</span>
    }

    /**
     * Logs an HTTP request with sensitive headers redacted.
     */
    public void infoRequest(String method, String path, Map&lt;String, String&gt; headers) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L40" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (logger.isInfoEnabled()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L41">            logger.info(&quot;{} {} headers={}&quot;, method, path, redactInternal(headers));</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L43">    }</span>

    public static Map&lt;String, String&gt; redactHeaders(Map&lt;String, String&gt; headers) {
<span class="fc" id="L46">        return redactInternal(headers);</span>
    }

    private static Map&lt;String, String&gt; redactInternal(Map&lt;String, String&gt; headers) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L50" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (headers == null || headers.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L51">            return Collections.emptyMap();</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L53">        Map&lt;String, String&gt; sanitized = new HashMap&lt;&gt;();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L54">        headers.forEach((name, value) -&gt; {</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L55" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            String key = name == null ? &quot;&quot; : name;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L56">            String normalized = key.toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L57" title="All 2 branches covered.">            sanitized.put(key, SECRET_HEADERS.contains(normalized) ? REDACTED_VALUE : value);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L58">        });</span>
<span class="fc" id="L59">        return sanitized;</span>
    }
}

PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">ClockifyManifest.java</span></div><h1>ClockifyManifest.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk;

import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonInclude;
import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.List;

/**
 * Manifest builder for Clockify add-ons (schema version {@code 1.3}).
 * &lt;p&gt;
 * The model provides a fluent builder that mirrors the JSON manifest Clockify
 * expects. Declarative registration of lifecycle and webhook endpoints happens
 * automatically when using {@link ClockifyAddon}.
 * &lt;/p&gt;
 * &lt;p&gt;
 * Example usage:
 * &lt;/p&gt;
 * &lt;pre&gt;{@code
 * ClockifyManifest manifest = ClockifyManifest.v1_3Builder()
 *     .key(&quot;my-addon&quot;)
 *     .name(&quot;My Add-on&quot;)
 *     .description(&quot;Greets users&quot;)
 *     .baseUrl(&quot;https://example.com/my-addon&quot;)
 *     .minimalSubscriptionPlan(&quot;FREE&quot;)
 *     .scopes(new String[]{&quot;WORKSPACE_READ&quot;})
 *     .build();
 * }&lt;/pre&gt;
 */
@JsonInclude(JsonInclude.Include.NON_NULL)
<span class="fc" id="L32">public class ClockifyManifest {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L33">    @JsonProperty(&quot;schemaVersion&quot;)</span>
    private String schemaVersion = &quot;1.3&quot;;

    private String key;
    private String name;
    private String description;

    private String baseUrl;

    private String minimalSubscriptionPlan;

    private String[] scopes;
    private List&lt;LifecycleEndpoint&gt; lifecycle;
    private List&lt;WebhookEndpoint&gt; webhooks;
    private List&lt;ComponentEndpoint&gt; components;
    private Object settings;

    // Getters
<span class="fc" id="L51">    public String getSchemaVersion() { return schemaVersion; }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L52">    public String getKey() { return key; }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L53">    public String getName() { return name; }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L54">    public String getDescription() { return description; }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L55">    public String getBaseUrl() { return baseUrl; }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L56">    public String getMinimalSubscriptionPlan() { return minimalSubscriptionPlan; }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L57">    public String[] getScopes() { return scopes; }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L58">    public List&lt;LifecycleEndpoint&gt; getLifecycle() { return lifecycle; }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L59">    public List&lt;WebhookEndpoint&gt; getWebhooks() { return webhooks; }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L60">    public List&lt;ComponentEndpoint&gt; getComponents() { return components; }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L61">    public Object getSettings() { return settings; }</span>

    // Setters (for Jackson)
<span class="nc" id="L64">    public void setSchemaVersion(String schemaVersion) { this.schemaVersion = schemaVersion; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L65">    public void setKey(String key) { this.key = key; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L66">    public void setName(String name) { this.name = name; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L67">    public void setDescription(String description) { this.description = description; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L68">    public void setBaseUrl(String baseUrl) { this.baseUrl = baseUrl; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L69">    public void setMinimalSubscriptionPlan(String minimalSubscriptionPlan) { this.minimalSubscriptionPlan = minimalSubscriptionPlan; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L70">    public void setScopes(String[] scopes) { this.scopes = scopes; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L71">    public void setLifecycle(List&lt;LifecycleEndpoint&gt; lifecycle) { this.lifecycle = lifecycle; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L72">    public void setWebhooks(List&lt;WebhookEndpoint&gt; webhooks) { this.webhooks = webhooks; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L73">    public void setComponents(List&lt;ComponentEndpoint&gt; components) { this.components = components; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L74">    public void setSettings(Object settings) { this.settings = settings; }</span>

    // Builder
    public static Builder v1_3Builder() {
<span class="fc" id="L78">        return new Builder();</span>
    }

<span class="fc" id="L81">    public static class Builder {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L82">        private final ClockifyManifest manifest = new ClockifyManifest();</span>

        public Builder key(String key) {
<span class="fc" id="L85">            manifest.key = key;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L86">            return this;</span>
        }

        public Builder name(String name) {
<span class="fc" id="L90">            manifest.name = name;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L91">            return this;</span>
        }

        public Builder description(String description) {
<span class="fc" id="L95">            manifest.description = description;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L96">            return this;</span>
        }

        public Builder baseUrl(String baseUrl) {
<span class="fc" id="L100">            manifest.baseUrl = baseUrl;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L101">            return this;</span>
        }

        public Builder minimalSubscriptionPlan(String plan) {
<span class="fc" id="L105">            manifest.minimalSubscriptionPlan = plan;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L106">            return this;</span>
        }

        public Builder scopes(String[] scopes) {
<span class="fc" id="L110">            manifest.scopes = scopes;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L111">            return this;</span>
        }

        public ClockifyManifest build() {
            // Initialize default lifecycle endpoints
<span class="pc bpc" id="L116" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            if (manifest.lifecycle == null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L117">                manifest.lifecycle = new ArrayList&lt;&gt;();</span>
            }

            // Initialize default webhooks
<span class="pc bpc" id="L121" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            if (manifest.webhooks == null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L122">                manifest.webhooks = new ArrayList&lt;&gt;();</span>
            }

            // Initialize default components
<span class="pc bpc" id="L126" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            if (manifest.components == null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L127">                manifest.components = new ArrayList&lt;&gt;();</span>
            }

<span class="fc" id="L130">            return manifest;</span>
        }
    }

    // Nested classes for manifest structure
    @JsonInclude(JsonInclude.Include.NON_NULL)
    public static class LifecycleEndpoint {
        private String type;
        private String path;

<span class="nc" id="L140">        public LifecycleEndpoint() {}</span>

<span class="fc" id="L142">        public LifecycleEndpoint(String type, String path) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L143">            this.type = type;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L144">            this.path = path;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L145">        }</span>

<span class="fc" id="L147">        public String getType() { return type; }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L148">        public String getPath() { return path; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L149">        public void setType(String type) { this.type = type; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L150">        public void setPath(String path) { this.path = path; }</span>
    }

    @JsonInclude(JsonInclude.Include.NON_NULL)
    public static class WebhookEndpoint {
        private String event;
        private String path;

<span class="nc" id="L158">        public WebhookEndpoint() {}</span>

<span class="fc" id="L160">        public WebhookEndpoint(String event, String path) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L161">            this.event = event;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L162">            this.path = path;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L163">        }</span>

<span class="fc" id="L165">        public String getEvent() { return event; }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L166">        public String getPath() { return path; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L167">        public void setEvent(String event) { this.event = event; }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L168">        public void setPath(String path) { this.path = path; }</span>
    }

    @JsonInclude(JsonInclude.Include.NON_NULL)
    public static class ComponentEndpoint {
        private String type;
        private String path;
        private String label;
        private String accessLevel;

<span class="nc" id="L178">        public ComponentEndpoint() {}</span>

<span class="nc" id="L180">        public ComponentEndpoint(String type, String path, String label) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L181">            this.type = type;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L182">            this.path = path;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L183">            this.label = label;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L184">        }</span>

<span class="nc" id="L186">        public ComponentEndpoint(String type, String path, String label, String accessLevel) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L187">            this.type = type;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L188">            this.path = path;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L189">            this.label = label;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L190">            this.accessLevel = accessLevel;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L191">        }</span>

<span class="nc" id="L193">        public String getType() { return type; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L194">        public String getPath() { return path; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L195">        public String getLabel() { return label; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L196">        public String getAccessLevel() { return accessLevel; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L197">        public void setType(String type) { this.type = type; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L198">        public void setPath(String path) { this.path = path; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L199">        public void setLabel(String label) { this.label = label; }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L200">        public void setAccessLevel(String accessLevel) { this.accessLevel = accessLevel; }</span>
    }
}
</pre><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>DefaultManifestController.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">DefaultManifestController.java</span></div><h1>DefaultManifestController.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk;

import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.SerializationFeature;
import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;

import java.util.Optional;

/**
 * Default implementation for serving a Clockify manifest with forwarded-header awareness.
 * &lt;p&gt;
 * When a forwarded base URL is detected, the manifest JSON is cloned with a per-request
 * {@code baseUrl} override so the underlying {@link ClockifyManifest} configuration remains
 * unchanged for subsequent requests.
 * &lt;/p&gt;
 */
public class DefaultManifestController implements RequestHandler {
    private final ClockifyManifest manifest;
    private final ObjectMapper mapper;
    private final BaseUrlDetector baseUrlDetector;

    public DefaultManifestController(ClockifyManifest manifest) {
<span class="nc" id="L24">        this(manifest, new ObjectMapper(), new BaseUrlDetector());</span>
<span class="nc" id="L25">    }</span>

<span class="fc" id="L27">    DefaultManifestController(ClockifyManifest manifest, ObjectMapper mapper, BaseUrlDetector baseUrlDetector) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L28">        this.manifest = manifest;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L29">        this.mapper = mapper;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L30">        this.mapper.enable(SerializationFeature.INDENT_OUTPUT);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L31">        this.baseUrlDetector = baseUrlDetector;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L32">    }</span>

    @Override
    public HttpResponse handle(HttpServletRequest request) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L36">        Optional&lt;String&gt; detectedBaseUrl = baseUrlDetector.detectBaseUrl(request)</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L37" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">                .filter(base -&gt; !base.isBlank() &amp;&amp; !base.equals(manifest.getBaseUrl()));</span>

        String json;
<span class="pc bpc" id="L40" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (detectedBaseUrl.isPresent()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L41">            ObjectNode manifestNode = mapper.convertValue(manifest, ObjectNode.class);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L42">            manifestNode.put(&quot;baseUrl&quot;, detectedBaseUrl.get());</span>
<span class="fc" id="L43">            json = mapper.writeValueAsString(manifestNode);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L44">        } else {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L45">            json = mapper.writeValueAsString(manifest);</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L48">        return HttpResponse.ok(json, &quot;application/json&quot;);</span>
    }
}
</pre><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0"
