href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>AddonServlet.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">AddonServlet.java</span></div><h1>AddonServlet.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk;

import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
import io.micrometer.core.instrument.Counter;
import io.micrometer.core.instrument.Timer;
import com.clockify.addon.sdk.metrics.MetricsHandler;
import com.clockify.addon.sdk.error.ErrorHandler;

import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.stream.Collectors;

/**
 * Primary servlet entry point that routes HTTP requests to {@link RequestHandler}
 * implementations registered on a {@link ClockifyAddon} instance.
 * &lt;p&gt;
 * Typical usage embeds the servlet in a Jetty server via {@link EmbeddedServer}:
 * &lt;/p&gt;
 * &lt;pre&gt;{@code
 * ClockifyAddon addon = new ClockifyAddon(manifest);
 * ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper();
 * addon.registerCustomEndpoint(&quot;/manifest.json&quot;, request -&gt;
 *     HttpResponse.ok(mapper.writeValueAsString(manifest), &quot;application/json&quot;));
 * addon.registerWebhookHandler(&quot;TIME_ENTRY_UPDATED&quot;, request -&gt; HttpResponse.ok(&quot;handled&quot;));
 *
 * AddonServlet servlet = new AddonServlet(addon);
 * new EmbeddedServer(servlet, &quot;/my-addon&quot;).start(8080);
 * }&lt;/pre&gt;
 * The servlet automatically wires lifecycle and webhook handlers that were
 * previously registered on the {@link ClockifyAddon}.
 */
public class AddonServlet extends HttpServlet {
<span class="fc" id="L39">    private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(AddonServlet.class);</span>
    private final ClockifyAddon addon;
<span class="fc" id="L41">    private final ObjectMapper objectMapper = new ObjectMapper();</span>

    /**
     * Creates a new servlet wrapper around the provided add-on instance.
     *
     * @param addon configured add-on containing registered handlers
     */
<span class="fc" id="L48">    public AddonServlet(ClockifyAddon addon) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L49">        this.addon = addon;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L50">    }</span>

    @Override
    protected void service(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp) throws IOException {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L54" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        String path = req.getPathInfo() != null ? req.getPathInfo() : &quot;/&quot;;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L55">        String method = req.getMethod();</span>

<span class="fc" id="L57">        logger.info(&quot;{} {}&quot;, method, path);</span>

        try {
<span class="fc" id="L60">            HttpResponse response = handleRequest(req, path);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L61">            sendResponse(resp, response);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L62">        } catch (Exception e) {</span>
            // Use centralized error handler for safe error responses
<span class="nc" id="L64">            ErrorHandler.ErrorResponse errorResponse = ErrorHandler.unknownError(e,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L65">                String.format(&quot;%s %s&quot;, method, path));</span>
<span class="nc" id="L66">            HttpResponse response = HttpResponse.error(</span>
<span class="nc" id="L67">                errorResponse.getStatusCode(),</span>
<span class="nc" id="L68">                errorResponse.getBody(),</span>
<span class="nc" id="L69">                errorResponse.getContentType()</span>
            );
<span class="nc" id="L71">            sendResponse(resp, response);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L72">        }</span>
<span class="fc" id="L73">    }</span>

    private HttpResponse handleRequest(HttpServletRequest req, String path) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L76">        RequestHandler customHandler = addon.getEndpoints().get(path);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L77" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (customHandler != null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L78">            return customHandler.handle(req);</span>
        }

<span class="pc bpc" id="L81" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (&quot;POST&quot;.equalsIgnoreCase(req.getMethod())) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L82">            HttpResponse webhookResponse = tryHandleWebhook(req, path);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L83" title="All 2 branches covered.">            if (webhookResponse != null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L84">                return webhookResponse;</span>
            }

<span class="fc" id="L87">            HttpResponse lifecycleResponse = tryHandleLifecycle(req, path);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L88" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            if (lifecycleResponse != null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L89">                return lifecycleResponse;</span>
            }
        }

<span class="nc" id="L93">        return HttpResponse.error(404, &quot;Endpoint not found: &quot; + path);</span>
    }

    private HttpResponse tryHandleWebhook(HttpServletRequest req, String path) throws Exception {
        // Never treat lifecycle endpoints as webhooks
<span class="pc bpc" id="L98" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (path != null &amp;&amp; path.startsWith(&quot;/lifecycle&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L99">            return null;</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L101">        Map&lt;String, RequestHandler&gt; handlersForPath = addon.getWebhookHandlersByPath().get(path);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L102">        boolean usingDefaultPath = ClockifyAddon.DEFAULT_WEBHOOK_PATH.equals(path);</span>

<span class="pc bpc" id="L104" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (handlersForPath == null &amp;&amp; !usingDefaultPath) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L105">            handlersForPath = addon.getWebhookHandlersByPath().get(ClockifyAddon.DEFAULT_WEBHOOK_PATH);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L106">            usingDefaultPath = true;</span>
        }

<span class="pc bpc" id="L109" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (handlersForPath == null &amp;&amp; usingDefaultPath) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L110">            handlersForPath = addon.getWebhookHandlers();</span>
        }

<span class="pc bpc" id="L113" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (handlersForPath == null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L114">            return null;</span>
        }

<span class="pc bpc" id="L117" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (handlersForPath.isEmpty() &amp;&amp; !usingDefaultPath) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L118">            return null;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L121">        return handleWebhook(req, handlersForPath);</span>
    }

    private HttpResponse tryHandleLifecycle(HttpServletRequest req, String path) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L125">        RequestHandler handlerByPath = addon.getLifecycleHandlersByPath().get(path);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L126" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (handlerByPath != null) {</span>
            // Defer JSON parsing to the concrete handler for explicit lifecycle paths.
            // This avoids double-reading the request stream and allows custom payload handling.
<span class="fc" id="L129">            return handlerByPath.handle(req);</span>
        }

        // Fallback: support direct POST to /lifecycle/{type} even if path map is not populated.
<span class="nc bnc" id="L133" title="All 6 branches missed.">        if (path != null &amp;&amp; path.startsWith(&quot;/lifecycle/&quot;) &amp;&amp; path.length() &gt; &quot;/lifecycle/&quot;.length()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L134">            String type = path.substring(&quot;/lifecycle/&quot;.length());</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L135" title="All 2 branches missed.">            if (!type.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L136">                String key = type.toUpperCase();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L137">                RequestHandler byType = addon.getLifecycleHandlers().get(key);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L138" title="All 2 branches missed.">                if (byType != null) {</span>
                    // Ensure JSON body is cached before calling the handler
                    try {
<span class="nc" id="L141">                        readAndCacheJsonBody(req);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L142">                    } catch (IOException e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L143">                        logger.warn(&quot;Failed to read JSON body for lifecycle event&quot;, e);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L144">                        return HttpResponse.error(400, &quot;Invalid JSON payload&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L145">                    }</span>
<span class="nc" id="L146">                    return byType.handle(req);</span>
                }
            }
        }

<span class="nc bnc" id="L151" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (!&quot;/lifecycle&quot;.equals(path)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L152">            return null;</span>
        }

        JsonNode json;
        try {
<span class="nc" id="L157">            json = readAndCacheJsonBody(req);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L158">        } catch (IOException e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L159">            String errorBody = objectMapper.createObjectNode()</span>
<span class="nc" id="L160">                    .put(&quot;message&quot;, &quot;Invalid JSON payload&quot;)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L161">                    .put(&quot;details&quot;, e.getMessage())</span>
<span class="nc" id="L162">                    .toString();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L163">            return HttpResponse.error(400, errorBody, &quot;application/json&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L164">        }</span>

<span class="nc bnc" id="L166" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (json == null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L167">            String errorBody = objectMapper.createObjectNode()</span>
<span class="nc" id="L168">                    .put(&quot;message&quot;, &quot;Lifecycle payload is required&quot;)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L169">                    .toString();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L170">            return HttpResponse.error(400, errorBody, &quot;application/json&quot;);</span>
        }

<span class="nc" id="L173">        String lifecycleType = extractLifecycleType(json);</span>

<span class="nc bnc" id="L175" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (lifecycleType == null || lifecycleType.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L176">            String errorBody = objectMapper.createObjectNode()</span>
<span class="nc" id="L177">                    .put(&quot;message&quot;, &quot;Missing lifecycle identifier in request&quot;)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L178">                    .toString();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L179">            return HttpResponse.error(400, errorBody, &quot;application/json&quot;);</span>
        }

<span class="nc" id="L182">        RequestHandler handler = addon.getLifecycleHandlers().get(lifecycleType);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L183" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (handler != null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L184">            return handler.handle(req);</span>
        }

<span class="nc" id="L187">        logger.warn(&quot;No handler registered for lifecycle: {}&quot;, lifecycleType);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L188">        String responseBody = objectMapper.createObjectNode()</span>
<span class="nc" id="L189">                .put(&quot;status&quot;, &quot;ignored&quot;)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L190">                .put(&quot;message&quot;, &quot;Lifecycle event received but not handled: &quot; + lifecycleType)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L191">                .toString();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L192">        return HttpResponse.ok(responseBody, &quot;application/json&quot;);</span>
    }

    private HttpResponse handleWebhook(HttpServletRequest req, Map&lt;String, RequestHandler&gt; handlers) throws Exception {
        JsonNode json;
        try {
<span class="fc" id="L198">            json = readAndCacheJsonBody(req);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L199">        } catch (IOException e) {</span>
            // metrics: invalid payload
<span class="nc" id="L201">            Counter.builder(&quot;webhook_errors_total&quot;)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L202">                    .tag(&quot;reason&quot;, &quot;invalid_json&quot;)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L203">                    .register(MetricsHandler.registry())</span>
<span class="nc" id="L204">                    .increment();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L205">            String errorBody = objectMapper.createObjectNode()</span>
<span class="nc" id="L206">                    .put(&quot;message&quot;, &quot;Invalid JSON payload&quot;)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L207">                    .put(&quot;details&quot;, e.getMessage())</span>
<span class="nc" id="L208">                    .toString();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L209">            return HttpResponse.error(400, errorBody, &quot;application/json&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L210">        }</span>

<span class="fc" id="L212">        String event = null;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L213">        String headerEventType = req.getHeader(&quot;clockify-webhook-event-type&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L214" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (headerEventType != null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L215">            headerEventType = headerEventType.trim();</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L216" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            if (!headerEventType.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L217">                event = headerEventType;</span>
            }
        }

<span class="fc bfc" id="L221" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (event == null) {</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L222" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            if (json == null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L223">                Counter.builder(&quot;webhook_errors_total&quot;)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L224">                        .tag(&quot;reason&quot;, &quot;missing_body&quot;)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L225">                        .register(MetricsHandler.registry())</span>
<span class="nc" id="L226">                        .increment();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L227">                return HttpResponse.error(400, &quot;Missing request body&quot;);</span>
            }
<span class="fc bfc" id="L229" title="All 2 branches covered.">            if (json.has(&quot;event&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L230">                event = json.get(&quot;event&quot;).asText(null);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L231" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">                if (event != null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L232">                    event = event.trim();</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L233" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">                    if (event.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L234">                        event = null;</span>
                    }
                }
            }
        }

<span class="fc bfc" id="L240" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (event == null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L241">            Counter.builder(&quot;webhook_errors_total&quot;)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L242">                    .tag(&quot;reason&quot;, &quot;missing_event&quot;)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L243">                    .register(MetricsHandler.registry())</span>
<span class="fc" id="L244">                    .increment();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L245">            return HttpResponse.error(400, &quot;Missing webhook event type&quot;);</span>
        }

        // SECURITY: Validate event type against manifest and sanitize for metrics
<span class="fc" id="L249">        String validationError = validateWebhookEventType(event);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L250" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (validationError != null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L251">            String sanitizedEvent = sanitizeForLogging(event);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L252">            logger.warn(&quot;Invalid webhook event type: {}&quot;, sanitizedEvent);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L253">            Counter.builder(&quot;webhook_errors_total&quot;)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L254">                    .tag(&quot;reason&quot;, &quot;invalid_event_type&quot;)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L255">                    .register(MetricsHandler.registry())</span>
<span class="fc" id="L256">                    .increment();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L257">            return HttpResponse.error(400, validationError, &quot;application/json&quot;);</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L260">        RequestHandler handler = handlers.get(event);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L261" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (handler != null) {</span>
            // metrics: count + duration per event/path
<span class="pc bpc" id="L263" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            String path = req.getPathInfo() != null ? req.getPathInfo() : &quot;/&quot;;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L264">            String sanitizedEvent = sanitizeForLogging(event);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L265">            Timer.Sample sample = Timer.start(MetricsHandler.registry());</span>
<span class="fc" id="L266">            Counter.builder(&quot;webhook_requests_total&quot;)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L267">                    .tag(&quot;event&quot;, sanitizedEvent)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L268">                    .tag(&quot;path&quot;, path)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L269">                    .register(MetricsHandler.registry())</span>
<span class="fc" id="L270">                    .increment();</span>
            HttpResponse response;
            try {
<span class="fc" id="L273">                response = handler.handle(req);</span>
            } finally {
<span class="fc" id="L275">                Timer timer = Timer.builder(&quot;webhook_request_seconds&quot;)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L276">                        .tag(&quot;event&quot;, sanitizedEvent)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L277">                        .tag(&quot;path&quot;, path)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L278">                        .register(MetricsHandler.registry());</span>
<span class="fc" id="L279">                sample.stop(timer);</span>
            }
<span class="fc" id="L281">            return response;</span>
        }

<span class="nc" id="L284">        String sanitizedEvent = sanitizeForLogging(event);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L285">        logger.warn(&quot;No handler registered for webhook event: {}&quot;, sanitizedEvent);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L286">        Counter.builder(&quot;webhook_not_handled_total&quot;)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L287">                .tag(&quot;event&quot;, sanitizedEvent)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L288">                .register(MetricsHandler.registry())</span>
<span class="nc" id="L289">                .increment();</span>
<span class="nc" id="L290">        return HttpResponse.ok(&quot;Webhook event received but not handled: &quot; + event);</span>
    }

    /**
     * SECURITY: Validates webhook event type against registered handlers in manifest.
     * Prevents log injection and unexpected behavior from malicious event types.
     * Only whitelisted events from the manifest are accepted.
     *
     * @param event the event type to validate
     * @return null if valid, or error message JSON string if invalid
     */
    private String validateWebhookEventType(String event) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L302" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (event == null || event.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L303">            return objectMapper.createObjectNode()</span>
<span class="nc" id="L304">                    .put(&quot;message&quot;, &quot;Event type cannot be null or empty&quot;)</span>
<span class="nc" id="L305">                    .toString();</span>
        }

        // Check length to prevent DoS/memory exhaustion
<span class="fc bfc" id="L309" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (event.length() &gt; 255) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L310">            return objectMapper.createObjectNode()</span>
<span class="fc" id="L311">                    .put(&quot;message&quot;, &quot;Event type exceeds maximum length (255 characters)&quot;)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L312">                    .toString();</span>
        }

        // Validate event type contains only alphanumeric, underscore, and hyphen
<span class="fc bfc" id="L316" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (!event.matches(&quot;^[A-Za-z0-9_-]+$&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L317">            return objectMapper.createObjectNode()</span>
<span class="fc" id="L318">                    .put(&quot;message&quot;, &quot;Event type contains invalid characters&quot;)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L319">                    .toString();</span>
        }

        // Whitelist: event must be registered in manifest webhooks
<span class="fc" id="L323">        boolean isValidEvent = addon.getManifest().getWebhooks().stream()</span>
<span class="fc" id="L324">                .anyMatch(w -&gt; w.getEvent().equals(event));</span>

<span class="fc bfc" id="L326" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (!isValidEvent) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L327">            return objectMapper.createObjectNode()</span>
<span class="fc" id="L328">                    .put(&quot;message&quot;, &quot;Event type not registered in addon manifest&quot;)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L329">                    .toString();</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L332">        return null; // valid</span>
    }

    /**
     * SECURITY: Sanitizes event type for safe logging/metrics.
     * Truncates and escapes to prevent log injection attacks.
     *
     * @param event the event type to sanitize
     * @return sanitized version safe for logging
     */
    private String sanitizeForLogging(String event) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L343" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (event == null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L344">            return &quot;(null)&quot;;</span>
        }
        // Truncate to prevent log flood
<span class="fc bfc" id="L347" title="All 2 branches covered.">        String truncated = event.length() &gt; 64 ? event.substring(0, 64) + &quot;...&quot; : event;</span>
        // Replace newlines and control characters that could enable log injection
<span class="fc" id="L349">        return truncated.replaceAll(&quot;[\\r\\n\\t\\x00-\\x1F]&quot;, &quot;?&quot;);</span>
    }

    private JsonNode readAndCacheJsonBody(HttpServletRequest req) throws IOException {
<span class="fc" id="L353">        Object cachedJson = req.getAttribute(&quot;clockify.jsonBody&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L354" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (cachedJson instanceof JsonNode) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L355">            return (JsonNode) cachedJson;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L358">        Object cachedBody = req.getAttribute(&quot;clockify.rawBody&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L359" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (cachedBody instanceof String) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L360">            String bodyString = (String) cachedBody;</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L361" title="All 2 branches missed.">            if (bodyString.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L362">                return null;</span>
            }
<span class="nc" id="L364">            JsonNode jsonNode = objectMapper.readTree(bodyString);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L365">            req.setAttribute(&quot;clockify.jsonBody&quot;, jsonNode);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L366">            return jsonNode;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L369">        String body = req.getReader().lines().collect(Collectors.joining());</span>
<span class="fc" id="L370">        req.setAttribute(&quot;clockify.rawBody&quot;, body);</span>

<span class="pc bpc" id="L372" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (body.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L373">            return null;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L376">        JsonNode json = objectMapper.readTree(body);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L377">        req.setAttribute(&quot;clockify.jsonBody&quot;, json);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L378">        return json;</span>
    }

    private String extractLifecycleType(JsonNode json) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L382" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (json == null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L383">            return null;</span>
        }

<span class="nc bnc" id="L386" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (json.hasNonNull(&quot;lifecycle&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L387">            return json.get(&quot;lifecycle&quot;).asText();</span>
        }

<span class="nc bnc" id="L390" title="All 2 branches missed.">        if (json.hasNonNull(&quot;type&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L391">            return json.get(&quot;type&quot;).asText();</span>
        }

<span class="nc" id="L394">        return null;</span>
    }

    private void sendResponse(HttpServletResponse resp, HttpResponse response) throws IOException {
<span class="fc" id="L398">        resp.setStatus(response.getStatusCode());</span>
<span class="fc" id="L399">        resp.setContentType(response.getContentType());</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L400" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (response.getHeaders() != null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L401">            response.getHeaders().forEach(resp::setHeader);</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L403">        resp.getWriter().write(response.getBody());</span>
<span class="fc" id="L404">    }</span>
}

class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">HttpResponse.java</span></div><h1>HttpResponse.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk;

import java.util.Collections;
import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
import java.util.Map;

/**
 * Immutable representation of an HTTP response returned by {@link RequestHandler}s.
 */
public class HttpResponse {
    private final int statusCode;
    private final String body;
    private final String contentType;
    private final Map&lt;String, String&gt; headers;

    public HttpResponse(int statusCode, String body, String contentType) {
<span class="fc" id="L17">        this(statusCode, body, contentType, Collections.emptyMap());</span>
<span class="fc" id="L18">    }</span>

<span class="fc" id="L20">    private HttpResponse(int statusCode, String body, String contentType, Map&lt;String, String&gt; headers) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L21">        this.statusCode = statusCode;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L22">        this.body = body;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L23">        this.contentType = contentType;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L24">        this.headers = Collections.unmodifiableMap(headers);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L25">    }</span>

    /**
     * Convenience factory for a {@code 200 OK} plain-text response.
     */
    public static HttpResponse ok(String body) {
<span class="fc" id="L31">        return new HttpResponse(200, body, &quot;text/plain&quot;);</span>
    }

    /**
     * Convenience factory for a {@code 200 OK} response with a custom content type.
     */
    public static HttpResponse ok(String body, String contentType) {
<span class="fc" id="L38">        return new HttpResponse(200, body, contentType);</span>
    }

    /**
     * Convenience factory for a non-OK response using {@code text/plain}.
     */
    public static HttpResponse error(int statusCode, String message) {
<span class="fc" id="L45">        return new HttpResponse(statusCode, message, &quot;text/plain&quot;);</span>
    }

    /**
     * Convenience factory for a non-OK response with a custom content type.
     */
    public static HttpResponse error(int statusCode, String message, String contentType) {
<span class="fc" id="L52">        return new HttpResponse(statusCode, message, contentType);</span>
    }

    /**
     * Returns a new immutable response with a header appended.
     */
    public HttpResponse withHeader(String name, String value) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L59" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (name == null || name.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L60">            return this;</span>
        }
<span class="nc" id="L62">        Map&lt;String, String&gt; mutable = new LinkedHashMap&lt;&gt;(this.headers);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L63">        mutable.put(name, value);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L64">        return new HttpResponse(this.statusCode, this.body, this.contentType, mutable);</span>
    }

    public int getStatusCode() {
<span class="fc" id="L68">        return statusCode;</span>
    }

    public String getBody() {
<span class="fc" id="L72">        return body;</span>
    }

    public String getContentType() {
<span class="fc" id="L76">        return contentType;</span>
    }

    public Map&lt;String, String&gt; getHeaders() {
<span class="fc" id="L80">        return headers;</span>
    }
}

width="5" height="10" title="6" alt="6"/></td><td class="ctr2" id="c9">85%</td><td class="bar" id="d9"><img src="../jacoco-resources/redbar.gif" width="4" height="10" title="1" alt="1"/><img height="10" title="3" alt="3"/></td><td class="ctr2" id="c1">100%</td><td class="bar" id="d11"/><td class="ctr2" id="e11">n/a</td><td class="ctr1" id="f11">0</td><td class="ctr2" id="g11">1</td><td id="c2">100%</td><td class="bar" id="d12"/><td class="ctr2" id="e12">n/a</td><td class="ctr1" id="f12">0</td><td class="ctr2" id="g12">1</td><td class="ctr1" id="h12">0</td><td class="ctr2" id="i12">1</td><td class="ctr1" id="j12">0</td><td class="ctr2" id="k12">1</td></tr></tbody></table><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>BaseUrlDetector.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">BaseUrlDetector.java</span></div><h1>BaseUrlDetector.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk;

import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;

import java.util.Optional;

/**
 * Normalizes Clockify add-on base URLs by respecting forwarded headers.
 */
<span class="fc" id="L10">class BaseUrlDetector {</span>
    Optional&lt;String&gt; detectBaseUrl(HttpServletRequest request) {
<span class="fc" id="L12">        Optional&lt;String&gt; forwardedProto = forwardedOrHeader(request, &quot;proto&quot;, &quot;X-Forwarded-Proto&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L13">        Optional&lt;String&gt; forwardedHost = forwardedOrHeader(request, &quot;host&quot;, &quot;X-Forwarded-Host&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L14">        Optional&lt;String&gt; forwardedPort = forwardedOrHeader(request, &quot;port&quot;, &quot;X-Forwarded-Port&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L15">        Optional&lt;String&gt; hostHeader = firstHeaderValue(request, &quot;Host&quot;);</span>

<span class="pc bpc" id="L17" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        Optional&lt;String&gt; forwardedProtoValue = forwardedProto.filter(value -&gt; !value.isBlank());</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L18" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        Optional&lt;String&gt; forwardedHostValue = forwardedHost.filter(value -&gt; !value.isBlank());</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L19" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        Optional&lt;String&gt; forwardedPortValue = forwardedPort.filter(value -&gt; !value.isBlank());</span>

<span class="fc" id="L21">        String scheme = forwardedProtoValue</span>
<span class="fc" id="L22">            .orElseGet(() -&gt; {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L23">                String requestScheme = request.getScheme();</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L24" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">                return (requestScheme == null || requestScheme.isBlank()) ? &quot;http&quot; : requestScheme;</span>
            });
<span class="fc" id="L26">        String host = forwardedHostValue</span>
<span class="fc" id="L27">            .or(() -&gt; hostHeader)</span>
<span class="fc" id="L28">            .orElse(request.getServerName());</span>

<span class="pc bpc" id="L30" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (host == null || host.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L31">            return Optional.empty();</span>
        }

<span class="fc bfc" id="L34" title="All 2 branches covered.">        boolean hasForwardingHeaders = forwardedProtoValue.isPresent()</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L35" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            || forwardedHostValue.isPresent()</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L36" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            || forwardedPortValue.isPresent();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L37">        String port = forwardedPortValue.orElse(null);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L38" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (port == null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L39">            port = inferPort(host, scheme, request, hasForwardingHeaders);</span>
        }

<span class="pc bpc" id="L42" title="2 of 6 branches missed.">        if (port != null &amp;&amp; !port.isBlank() &amp;&amp; !hostHasExplicitPort(host)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L43">            host = host + &quot;:&quot; + port;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L46">        String contextPath = Optional.ofNullable(request.getContextPath()).orElse(&quot;&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L47" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (!contextPath.isEmpty() &amp;&amp; !contextPath.startsWith(&quot;/&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L48">            contextPath = &quot;/&quot; + contextPath;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L51">        String normalized = (scheme + &quot;://&quot; + host + contextPath).replaceAll(&quot;/+$&quot;, &quot;&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L52" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (normalized.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L53">            return Optional.empty();</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L55">        return Optional.of(normalized);</span>
    }

    private Optional&lt;String&gt; forwardedOrHeader(HttpServletRequest request, String forwardedKey, String headerName) {
<span class="fc" id="L59">        Optional&lt;String&gt; forwarded = forwardedHeaderValue(request, forwardedKey);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L60" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (forwarded.isPresent()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L61">            return forwarded;</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L63">        Optional&lt;String&gt; header = firstHeaderValue(request, headerName);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L64" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (header.isPresent()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L65">            return header;</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L67">        return Optional.empty();</span>
    }

    private String inferPort(String host, String scheme, HttpServletRequest request, boolean hasForwardingHeaders) {
<span class="fc bfc" id="L71" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (hostHasExplicitPort(host)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L72">            return null;</span>
        }

<span class="fc bfc" id="L75" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (hasForwardingHeaders) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L76">            return null;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L79">        int serverPort = request.getServerPort();</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L80" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (!shouldIncludeServerPort(scheme, serverPort)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L81">            return null;</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L83">        return Integer.toString(serverPort);</span>
    }

    private boolean shouldIncludeServerPort(String scheme, int serverPort) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L87" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (serverPort &lt;= 0) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L88">            return false;</span>
        }

<span class="pc bpc" id="L91" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        String normalizedScheme = scheme == null ? &quot;&quot; : scheme.toLowerCase();</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L92" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if ((&quot;http&quot;.equals(normalizedScheme) &amp;&amp; serverPort == 80)</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L93" title="3 of 4 branches missed.">                || (&quot;https&quot;.equals(normalizedScheme) &amp;&amp; serverPort == 443)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L94">            return false;</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L96">        return true;</span>
    }

    private boolean hostHasExplicitPort(String host) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L100" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (host == null || host.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L101">            return false;</span>
        }

<span class="fc bfc" id="L104" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (host.startsWith(&quot;[&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L105">            int endBracket = host.indexOf(']');</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L106" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            if (endBracket &lt; 0) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L107">                return false;</span>
            }
<span class="fc bfc" id="L109" title="All 2 branches covered.">            return host.indexOf(':', endBracket) &gt; endBracket;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L112">        return host.contains(&quot;:&quot;);</span>
    }

    private Optional&lt;String&gt; firstHeaderValue(HttpServletRequest request, String headerName) {
<span class="fc" id="L116">        String raw = request.getHeader(headerName);</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L117" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (raw == null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L118">            return Optional.empty();</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L120">        int commaIndex = raw.indexOf(',');</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L121" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        String value = commaIndex &gt;= 0 ? raw.substring(0, commaIndex) : raw;</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L122" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        value = value == null ? null : value.trim();</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L123" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        return (value == null || value.isEmpty()) ? Optional.empty() : Optional.of(value);</span>
    }

    private Optional&lt;String&gt; forwardedHeaderValue(HttpServletRequest request, String parameterName) {
<span class="fc" id="L127">        String raw = request.getHeader(&quot;Forwarded&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L128" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (raw == null || raw.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L129">            return Optional.empty();</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L131">        int commaIndex = raw.indexOf(',');</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L132" title="All 2 branches covered.">        String firstSegment = commaIndex &gt;= 0 ? raw.substring(0, commaIndex) : raw;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L133">        String[] pairs = firstSegment.split(&quot;;&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L134" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        String targetKey = parameterName == null ? &quot;&quot; : parameterName.trim().toLowerCase();</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L135" title="All 2 branches covered.">        for (String pair : pairs) {</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L136" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">            if (pair == null || pair.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L137">                continue;</span>
            }
<span class="fc" id="L139">            int equalsIndex = pair.indexOf('=');</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L140" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            if (equalsIndex &lt; 0) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L141">                continue;</span>
            }
<span class="fc" id="L143">            String key = pair.substring(0, equalsIndex).trim().toLowerCase();</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L144" title="All 2 branches covered.">            if (!key.equals(targetKey)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L145">                continue;</span>
            }
<span class="fc" id="L147">            String value = pair.substring(equalsIndex + 1).trim();</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L148" title="2 of 6 branches missed.">            if (value.startsWith(&quot;\&quot;&quot;) &amp;&amp; value.endsWith(&quot;\&quot;&quot;) &amp;&amp; value.length() &gt;= 2) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L149">                value = value.substring(1, value.length() - 1);</span>
            }
<span class="pc bpc" id="L151" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            if (value.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L152">                return Optional.empty();</span>
            }
<span class="fc" id="L154">            return Optional.of(value);</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L156">        return Optional.empty();</span>
    }
}
</pre><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>EmbeddedServer.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">EmbeddedServer.java</span></div><h1>EmbeddedServer.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk;

import com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware.CriticalEndpointRateLimiter;
import com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware.DiagnosticContextFilter;
import com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware.CsrfProtectionFilter;
import com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware.HttpsEnforcementFilter;
import com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware.RequestSizeLimitFilter;
import com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware.RequestIdPropagationFilter;
import org.eclipse.jetty.server.Server;
import org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.ServletContextHandler;
import org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.ServletHolder;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
import org.eclipse.jetty.servlet.FilterHolder;

import jakarta.servlet.DispatcherType;
import jakarta.servlet.Filter;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.EnumSet;
import java.util.List;

/**
 * Convenience wrapper around Jetty for local development of Clockify add-ons.
 * &lt;p&gt;
 * The server installs the provided {@link AddonServlet} under the supplied
 * context path and blocks until shutdown:
 * &lt;/p&gt;
 * &lt;pre&gt;{@code
 * AddonServlet servlet = new AddonServlet(addon);
 * EmbeddedServer server = new EmbeddedServer(servlet, &quot;/auto-tag-assistant&quot;);
 * server.start(8080);
 * }&lt;/pre&gt;
 */
public class EmbeddedServer {
<span class="fc" id="L36">    private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(EmbeddedServer.class);</span>
    private final AddonServlet servlet;
    private final String contextPath;
<span class="fc" id="L39">    private final List&lt;Filter&gt; filters = new ArrayList&lt;&gt;();</span>
    private Server server;

    public EmbeddedServer(AddonServlet servlet) {
<span class="nc" id="L43">        this(servlet, &quot;/&quot;);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L44">    }</span>

<span class="fc" id="L46">    public EmbeddedServer(AddonServlet servlet, String contextPath) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L47">        this.servlet = servlet;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L48">        this.contextPath = contextPath;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L49">    }</span>

    public void start(int port) throws Exception {
<span class="fc" id="L52">        server = new Server(port);</span>

<span class="fc" id="L54">        ServletContextHandler context = new ServletContextHandler(ServletContextHandler.SESSIONS);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L55">        context.setContextPath(contextPath);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L56">        server.setHandler(context);</span>

        // SECURITY: Apply critical endpoint rate limiter first to fail fast on abusive calls
<span class="fc" id="L59">        context.addFilter(</span>
                new FilterHolder(new DiagnosticContextFilter()),
                &quot;/*&quot;,
<span class="fc" id="L62">                EnumSet.of(DispatcherType.REQUEST));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L63">        logger.debug(&quot;Diagnostic context filter installed&quot;);</span>

<span class="fc" id="L65">        context.addFilter(</span>
                new FilterHolder(new RequestIdPropagationFilter()),
                &quot;/*&quot;,
<span class="fc" id="L68">                EnumSet.of(DispatcherType.REQUEST));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L69">        logger.debug(&quot;Request id propagation filter installed&quot;);</span>

<span class="fc" id="L71">        context.addFilter(</span>
                new FilterHolder(new CriticalEndpointRateLimiter(true)),
                &quot;/*&quot;,
<span class="fc" id="L74">                EnumSet.of(DispatcherType.REQUEST));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L75">        logger.debug(&quot;Critical endpoint rate limiter installed&quot;);</span>

        // SECURITY: Apply request size limit to guard memory/CPU before body parsing
<span class="fc" id="L78">        context.addFilter(</span>
<span class="fc" id="L79">                new FilterHolder(RequestSizeLimitFilter.fromEnvironment()),</span>
                &quot;/*&quot;,
<span class="fc" id="L81">                EnumSet.of(DispatcherType.REQUEST));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L82">        logger.debug(&quot;Request size limit filter installed&quot;);</span>

        // SECURITY: Apply HTTPS enforcement
        // Blocks non-HTTPS requests in production
<span class="fc" id="L86">        boolean enforceHttps = shouldEnforceHttps();</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L87" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (enforceHttps) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L88">            context.addFilter(</span>
                    new FilterHolder(new HttpsEnforcementFilter(true)),
                    &quot;/*&quot;,
<span class="nc" id="L91">                    EnumSet.of(DispatcherType.REQUEST));</span>
<span class="nc" id="L92">            logger.debug(&quot;HTTPS enforcement filter installed&quot;);</span>
        }

        // SECURITY: Apply CSRF protection filter
        // Webhooks use signature validation (exempt), custom endpoints get token-based CSRF protection
<span class="fc" id="L97">        context.addFilter(</span>
                new FilterHolder(new CsrfProtectionFilter()),
                &quot;/*&quot;,
<span class="fc" id="L100">                EnumSet.of(DispatcherType.REQUEST));</span>
<span class="fc" id="L101">        logger.debug(&quot;CSRF protection filter installed&quot;);</span>

        // Register any additional configured filters
<span class="pc bpc" id="L104" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (!filters.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L105" title="All 2 branches missed.">            for (Filter f : filters) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L106">                context.addFilter(new FilterHolder(f), &quot;/*&quot;, EnumSet.of(DispatcherType.REQUEST));</span>
<span class="nc" id="L107">            }</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L110">        ServletHolder servletHolder = new ServletHolder(servlet);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L111">        context.addServlet(servletHolder, &quot;/*&quot;);</span>

<span class="fc" id="L113">        server.start();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L114">        logger.info(&quot;Server started on port {} with context path {}&quot;, port, contextPath);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L115">        server.join();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L116">    }</span>

    public void stop() throws Exception {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L119" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (server != null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L120">            server.stop();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L121">            logger.info(&quot;Server stopped&quot;);</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L123">    }</span>

    /**
     * Add a servlet filter to the embedded server. Call before start().
     */
    public EmbeddedServer addFilter(Filter filter) {
<span class="nc" id="L129">        this.filters.add(filter);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L130">        return this;</span>
    }

    /**
     * SECURITY: Determines whether HTTPS enforcement should be enabled.
     * Enabled by default unless explicitly disabled for local development.
     *
     * @return true if HTTPS should be enforced
     */
    private boolean shouldEnforceHttps() {
<span class="fc" id="L140">        String enforceEnv = System.getenv(&quot;ENFORCE_HTTPS&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L141" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (enforceEnv != null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L142">            return &quot;true&quot;.equalsIgnoreCase(enforceEnv);</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L145">        String enforceProp = System.getProperty(&quot;enforce.https&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L146" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (enforceProp != null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L147">            return &quot;true&quot;.equalsIgnoreCase(enforceProp);</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L150">        String env = resolveEnv(&quot;ENV&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L151">        return &quot;prod&quot;.equalsIgnoreCase(env);</span>
    }

    private String resolveEnv(String key) {
<span class="fc" id="L155">        String override = System.getProperty(&quot;env.&quot; + key);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L156" title="3 of 4 branches missed.">        if (override != null &amp;&amp; !override.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L157">            return override.trim();</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L159">        return System.getenv(key);</span>
    }
}

"http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">ClockifyAddon.java</span></div><h1>ClockifyAddon.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk;

import com.clockify.addon.sdk.util.PathSanitizer;

import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.Map;

/**
 * Central coordinator that keeps track of all handlers and manifest metadata
 * for a Clockify add-on.
 * &lt;p&gt;
 * Example lifecycle configuration:
 * &lt;/p&gt;
 * &lt;pre&gt;{@code
 * ClockifyAddon addon = new ClockifyAddon(manifest);
 * addon.registerLifecycleHandler(&quot;INSTALLED&quot;, request -&gt; HttpResponse.ok(&quot;installed&quot;));
 * addon.registerLifecycleHandler(&quot;DELETED&quot;, request -&gt; HttpResponse.ok(&quot;deleted&quot;));
 * addon.registerWebhookHandler(&quot;TIME_ENTRY_CREATED&quot;, request -&gt; HttpResponse.ok(&quot;ok&quot;));
 * addon.registerCustomEndpoint(&quot;/settings&quot;, new SettingsController());
 * }&lt;/pre&gt;
 */
public class ClockifyAddon {
    public static final String DEFAULT_WEBHOOK_PATH = &quot;/webhook&quot;;

    private final ClockifyManifest manifest;
<span class="fc" id="L26">    private final Map&lt;String, RequestHandler&gt; endpoints = new HashMap&lt;&gt;();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L27">    private final Map&lt;String, RequestHandler&gt; lifecycleHandlers = new HashMap&lt;&gt;();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L28">    private final Map&lt;String, RequestHandler&gt; lifecycleHandlersByPath = new HashMap&lt;&gt;();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L29">    private final Map&lt;String, String&gt; lifecyclePathsByType = new HashMap&lt;&gt;();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L30">    private final Map&lt;String, Map&lt;String, RequestHandler&gt;&gt; webhookHandlersByPath = new HashMap&lt;&gt;();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L31">    private final Map&lt;String, String&gt; webhookPathsByEvent = new HashMap&lt;&gt;();</span>

<span class="fc" id="L33">    public ClockifyAddon(ClockifyManifest manifest) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L34">        this.manifest = manifest;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L35">    }</span>

    public ClockifyManifest getManifest() {
<span class="fc" id="L38">        return manifest;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Register a custom endpoint (e.g., {@code /manifest.json}, {@code /settings}, {@code /health}).
     *
     * @param path     path relative to the add-on base URL
     * @param handler  handler that will process requests to {@code path}
     */
    public void registerCustomEndpoint(String path, RequestHandler handler) {
<span class="fc" id="L48">        String normalizedPath = PathSanitizer.sanitize(path);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L49">        endpoints.put(normalizedPath, handler);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L50">    }</span>

    /**
     * Register a lifecycle handler (e.g., {@code INSTALLED}, {@code DELETED}).
     *
     * @param lifecycleType lifecycle event type reported by Clockify
     * @param handler       handler that should process the request
     */
    public void registerLifecycleHandler(String lifecycleType, RequestHandler handler) {
<span class="fc" id="L59">        registerLifecycleHandler(lifecycleType, null, handler);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L60">    }</span>

    public void registerLifecycleHandler(String lifecycleType, String path, RequestHandler handler) {
<span class="fc" id="L63">        String normalizedPath = normalizeLifecyclePath(lifecycleType, path);</span>

<span class="fc" id="L65">        lifecycleHandlers.put(lifecycleType, handler);</span>

<span class="fc" id="L67">        String previousPath = lifecyclePathsByType.put(lifecycleType, normalizedPath);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L68" title="3 of 4 branches missed.">        if (previousPath != null &amp;&amp; !previousPath.equals(normalizedPath)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L69">            lifecycleHandlersByPath.remove(previousPath);</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L71">        lifecycleHandlersByPath.put(normalizedPath, handler);</span>

<span class="fc" id="L73">        ClockifyManifest.LifecycleEndpoint endpoint = manifest.getLifecycle().stream()</span>
<span class="fc" id="L74">                .filter(l -&gt; l.getType().equals(lifecycleType))</span>
<span class="fc" id="L75">                .findFirst()</span>
<span class="fc" id="L76">                .orElse(null);</span>

<span class="pc bpc" id="L78" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (endpoint == null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L79">            manifest.getLifecycle().add(new ClockifyManifest.LifecycleEndpoint(lifecycleType, normalizedPath));</span>
        } else {
<span class="nc" id="L81">            endpoint.setPath(normalizedPath);</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L83">    }</span>

    /**
     * Register a webhook handler (e.g., {@code TIME_ENTRY_CREATED}).
     * The handler is auto-registered in the manifest if missing.
     *
     * @param event   webhook event identifier
     * @param handler handler that processes the event
     */
    public void registerWebhookHandler(String event, RequestHandler handler) {
<span class="fc" id="L93">        registerWebhookHandler(event, DEFAULT_WEBHOOK_PATH, handler);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L94">    }</span>

    public void registerWebhookHandler(String event, String path, RequestHandler handler) {
<span class="fc" id="L97">        String normalizedPath = normalizeWebhookPath(path);</span>

<span class="fc" id="L99">        Map&lt;String, RequestHandler&gt; handlersForPath = webhookHandlersByPath</span>
<span class="fc" id="L100">                .computeIfAbsent(normalizedPath, key -&gt; new HashMap&lt;&gt;());</span>
<span class="fc" id="L101">        handlersForPath.put(event, handler);</span>

<span class="fc" id="L103">        String previousPath = webhookPathsByEvent.put(event, normalizedPath);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L104" title="3 of 4 branches missed.">        if (previousPath != null &amp;&amp; !previousPath.equals(normalizedPath)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L105">            Map&lt;String, RequestHandler&gt; previousHandlers = webhookHandlersByPath.get(previousPath);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L106" title="All 2 branches missed.">            if (previousHandlers != null) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L107">                previousHandlers.remove(event);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L108" title="All 2 branches missed.">                if (previousHandlers.isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L109">                    webhookHandlersByPath.remove(previousPath);</span>
                }
            }
        }

<span class="fc" id="L114">        ClockifyManifest.WebhookEndpoint endpoint = manifest.getWebhooks().stream()</span>
<span class="fc" id="L115">                .filter(w -&gt; w.getEvent().equals(event))</span>
<span class="fc" id="L116">                .findFirst()</span>
<span class="fc" id="L117">                .orElse(null);</span>

<span class="fc bfc" id="L119" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (endpoint == null) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L120">            manifest.getWebhooks().add(new ClockifyManifest.WebhookEndpoint(event, normalizedPath));</span>
        } else {
<span class="fc" id="L122">            endpoint.setPath(normalizedPath);</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L124">    }</span>

    /**
     * Get all registered endpoints.
     *
     * @return map of endpoint paths to handler implementations
     */
    public Map&lt;String, RequestHandler&gt; getEndpoints() {
<span class="fc" id="L132">        return endpoints;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Get lifecycle handlers keyed by lifecycle type.
     *
     * @return map of lifecycle event type to handler implementation
     */
    public Map&lt;String, RequestHandler&gt; getLifecycleHandlers() {
<span class="fc" id="L141">        return lifecycleHandlers;</span>
    }

    public Map&lt;String, RequestHandler&gt; getLifecycleHandlersByPath() {
<span class="fc" id="L145">        return lifecycleHandlersByPath;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Get webhook handlers keyed by webhook event.
     *
     * @return map of webhook event to handler implementation
     */
    public Map&lt;String, RequestHandler&gt; getWebhookHandlers() {
<span class="fc" id="L154">        return webhookHandlersByPath.computeIfAbsent(DEFAULT_WEBHOOK_PATH, key -&gt; new HashMap&lt;&gt;());</span>
    }

    public Map&lt;String, Map&lt;String, RequestHandler&gt;&gt; getWebhookHandlersByPath() {
<span class="fc" id="L158">        return webhookHandlersByPath;</span>
    }

    public Map&lt;String, String&gt; getWebhookPathsByEvent() {
<span class="fc" id="L162">        return webhookPathsByEvent;</span>
    }

    private String normalizeLifecyclePath(String lifecycleType, String path) {
<span class="fc" id="L166">        return PathSanitizer.sanitizeLifecyclePath(lifecycleType, path);</span>
    }

    private String normalizeWebhookPath(String path) {
<span class="fc" id="L170">        return PathSanitizer.sanitizeWebhookPath(path);</span>
    }
}
</pre><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>ConfigValidator.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">ConfigValidator.java</span></div><h1>ConfigValidator.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk;

import java.net.MalformedURLException;
import java.net.URL;
import java.util.Locale;

/**
 * Utility class for validating configuration values from environment variables.
 * &lt;p&gt;
 * Provides helpful error messages to aid in troubleshooting configuration issues.
 * All validation methods throw {@link IllegalArgumentException} with descriptive
 * messages when validation fails.
 * &lt;/p&gt;
 *
 * &lt;p&gt;Example usage:&lt;/p&gt;
 * &lt;pre&gt;{@code
 * String baseUrl = ConfigValidator.validateUrl(
 *     System.getenv(&quot;ADDON_BASE_URL&quot;),
 *     &quot;http://localhost:8080/addon&quot;,
 *     &quot;ADDON_BASE_URL&quot;
 * );
 * int port = ConfigValidator.validatePort(
 *     System.getenv(&quot;ADDON_PORT&quot;),
 *     8080,
 *     &quot;ADDON_PORT&quot;
 * );
 * }&lt;/pre&gt;
 *
 * @since 0.1.0
 */
<span class="nc" id="L31">public class ConfigValidator {</span>

    /**
     * Validates and parses a port number from a string.
     *
     * @param portStr the port string to parse
     * @param defaultPort the default port to use if portStr is null or empty
     * @param varName the environment variable name for error messages
     * @return validated port number
     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if port is invalid
     */
    public static int validatePort(String portStr, int defaultPort, String varName) {
<span class="nc bnc" id="L43" title="All 4 branches missed.">        if (portStr == null || portStr.trim().isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L44">            return defaultPort;</span>
        }

        try {
<span class="nc" id="L48">            int port = Integer.parseInt(portStr.trim());</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L49" title="All 4 branches missed.">            if (port &lt; 1 || port &gt; 65535) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L50">                throw new IllegalArgumentException(</span>
<span class="nc" id="L51">                    String.format(&quot;Invalid %s: %d. Port must be between 1 and 65535.&quot;, varName, port)</span>
                );
            }
<span class="nc" id="L54">            return port;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L55">        } catch (NumberFormatException e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L56">            throw new IllegalArgumentException(</span>
<span class="nc" id="L57">                String.format(&quot;Invalid %s: '%s'. Must be a valid integer between 1 and 65535.&quot;, varName, portStr),</span>
                e
            );
        }
    }

    /**
     * Validates a base URL string.
     *
     * @param urlStr the URL string to validate
     * @param defaultUrl the default URL to use if urlStr is null or empty
     * @param varName the environment variable name for error messages
     * @return validated URL string
     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if URL is malformed
     */
    public static String validateUrl(String urlStr, String defaultUrl, String varName) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L73" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        String candidate = (urlStr == null || urlStr.trim().isEmpty()) ? defaultUrl : urlStr.trim();</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L74" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        String url = candidate.endsWith(&quot;/&quot;) ? candidate.substring(0, candidate.length() - 1) : candidate;</span>

        try {
<span class="fc" id="L77">            new URL(url); // Validate URL format</span>
<span class="nc" id="L78">        } catch (MalformedURLException e) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L79">            throw new IllegalArgumentException(</span>
<span class="nc" id="L80">                String.format(&quot;Invalid %s: '%s'. Must be a valid URL (e.g., http://localhost:8080/addon)&quot;, varName, url),</span>
                e
            );
<span class="fc" id="L83">        }</span>

<span class="fc bfc" id="L85" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (requiresHttpsInProduction()) {</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L86" title="All 2 branches covered.">            if (!url.toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT).startsWith(&quot;https://&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L87">                throw new IllegalArgumentException(</span>
<span class="fc" id="L88">                    String.format(&quot;%s must use HTTPS when ENV=prod for secure deployments&quot;, varName)</span>
                );
            }
        }

<span class="fc" id="L93">        return url;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Gets an environment variable with a default value.
     *
     * @param varName the environment variable name
     * @param defaultValue the default value if not set
     * @return the environment variable value or default
     */
    public static String getEnv(String varName, String defaultValue) {
<span class="nc" id="L104">        String value = System.getenv(varName);</span>
<span class="nc bnc" id="L105" title="All 4 branches missed.">        return (value == null || value.trim().isEmpty()) ? defaultValue : value.trim();</span>
    }

    private static boolean requiresHttpsInProduction() {
<span class="fc" id="L109">        String envValue = resolveProperty(&quot;ENV&quot;);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L110" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        return envValue != null &amp;&amp; envValue.equalsIgnoreCase(&quot;prod&quot;);</span>
    }

    private static String resolveProperty(String key) {
<span class="fc" id="L114">        String override = System.getProperty(&quot;env.&quot; + key);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L115" title="1 of 4 branches missed.">        if (override != null &amp;&amp; !override.isBlank()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L116">            return override.trim();</span>
        }
<span class="fc" id="L118">        return System.getenv(key);</span>
    }
}

onclick="toggleSort(this)">Missed</td><td class="sortable ctr2" id="g" onclick="toggleSort(this)">Cxty</td><td class="sortable ctr1" id="h" onclick="toggleSort(this)">Missed</td><td class="sortable class="sortable ctr1" id="l" onclick="toggleSort(this)">Missed</td><td class="sortable ctr2" id="m" onclick="toggleSort(this)">Classes</td></tr></thead><tfoot><tr><td>Total</td><td class="bar">74 of alt="277"/></td><td class="ctr2" id="c0">78%</td><td class="bar" id="d0"><img src="../jacoco-resources/redbar.gif" width="23" height="10" title="14" alt="14"/><img
