id="m0">1</td></tr></tbody></table><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"><html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" lang="en"><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=UTF-8"/><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/report.css" type="text/css"/><link rel="shortcut icon" href="../jacoco-resources/report.gif" type="image/gif"/><title>PathSanitizer.java</title><link rel="stylesheet" href="../jacoco-resources/prettify.css" type="text/css"/><script type="text/javascript" src="../jacoco-resources/prettify.js"></script></head><body onload="window['PR_TAB_WIDTH']=4;prettyPrint()"><div class="breadcrumb" id="breadcrumb"><span class="info"><a href="../jacoco-sessions.html" class="el_session">Sessions</a></span><a href="../index.html" class="el_report">addon-sdk</a> &gt; <a href="index.source.html" class="el_package">com.clockify.addon.sdk.util</a> &gt; <span class="el_source">PathSanitizer.java</span></div><h1>PathSanitizer.java</h1><pre class="source lang-java linenums">package com.clockify.addon.sdk.util;

import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

/**
 * Utility for sanitizing and validating URL paths to prevent security issues.
 * Handles path traversal, null bytes, double slashes, and invalid characters.
 */
public class PathSanitizer {
<span class="fc" id="L11">    private static final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(PathSanitizer.class);</span>

    private PathSanitizer() {
        // Utility class
    }

    /**
     * Sanitizes a path to prevent security vulnerabilities.
     *
     * @param path The path to sanitize
     * @return Sanitized path starting with /
     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if path contains malicious patterns
     */
    public static String sanitize(String path) {
<span class="fc bfc" id="L25" title="All 4 branches covered.">        if (path == null || path.trim().isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L26">            return &quot;/&quot;;</span>
        }

        // Pre-trim checks: examine the raw input to avoid trim() hiding trailing control chars
<span class="fc" id="L30">        String raw = path;</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L31" title="All 2 branches covered.">        boolean rawHasNullChar = raw.indexOf('\u0000') &gt;= 0;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L32">        boolean rawHasPercent00 = raw.toLowerCase().contains(&quot;%00&quot;);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L33">        boolean rawHasBackslashZero = false; // &quot;\\0&quot;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L34">        boolean rawHasUnicodeLiteralNull = raw.toLowerCase().contains(&quot;\\u0000&quot;); // literal text &quot;\u0000&quot;</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L35" title="All 2 branches covered.">        for (int i = 0; i + 1 &lt; raw.length(); i++) {</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L36" title="All 4 branches covered.">            if (raw.charAt(i) == '\\' &amp;&amp; raw.charAt(i + 1) == '0') {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L37">                rawHasBackslashZero = true;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L38">                break;</span>
            }
        }
<span class="fc bfc" id="L41" title="All 8 branches covered.">        if (rawHasNullChar || rawHasBackslashZero || rawHasPercent00 || rawHasUnicodeLiteralNull) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L42">            logger.warn(&quot;Path contains null byte or encoding before trim (nullChar?={}, \\0?={}, %00?={}, \\u0000?={}): {}&quot;,</span>
<span class="fc" id="L43">                rawHasNullChar, rawHasBackslashZero, rawHasPercent00, rawHasUnicodeLiteralNull, path);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L44">            throw new IllegalArgumentException(&quot;Path contains null bytes&quot;);</span>
        }

        // Now trim and continue normalization/validation
<span class="fc" id="L48">        String sanitized = path.trim();</span>

        // Detect common null-byte representations again after trim
<span class="pc bpc" id="L51" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        boolean hasNullChar = sanitized.indexOf('\u0000') &gt;= 0;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L52">        boolean hasPercent00 = sanitized.toLowerCase().contains(&quot;%00&quot;); // URL-encoded null byte</span>
<span class="fc" id="L53">        boolean hasUnicodeLiteralNull = sanitized.toLowerCase().contains(&quot;\\u0000&quot;); // literal text &quot;\u0000&quot;</span>
<span class="fc" id="L54">        boolean hasBackslashZero = false; // robust detection for &quot;\\0&quot; (backslash then zero)</span>
<span class="fc bfc" id="L55" title="All 2 branches covered.">        for (int i = 0; i + 1 &lt; sanitized.length(); i++) {</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L56" title="3 of 4 branches missed.">            if (sanitized.charAt(i) == '\\' &amp;&amp; sanitized.charAt(i + 1) == '0') {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L57">                hasBackslashZero = true;</span>
<span class="nc" id="L58">                break;</span>
            }
        }

        // Check for null bytes (potential security issue) or common encodings
<span class="pc bpc" id="L63" title="4 of 8 branches missed.">        if (hasNullChar || hasBackslashZero || hasPercent00 || hasUnicodeLiteralNull) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L64">            logger.warn(&quot;Path contains null byte or encoding (nullChar?={}, \\0?={}, %00?={}, \\u0000?={}): {}&quot;,</span>
<span class="nc" id="L65">                    hasNullChar, hasBackslashZero, hasPercent00, hasUnicodeLiteralNull, path);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L66">            throw new IllegalArgumentException(&quot;Path contains null bytes&quot;);</span>
        }

        // Disallow ASCII control characters (0x00-0x1F) for safety
<span class="fc bfc" id="L70" title="All 2 branches covered.">        for (int i = 0; i &lt; sanitized.length(); i++) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L71">            char ch = sanitized.charAt(i);</span>
<span class="pc bpc" id="L72" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">            if (ch &lt;= 0x1F) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L73">                logger.warn(&quot;Path contains control characters (&lt;=0x1F): {}&quot;, path);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L74">                throw new IllegalArgumentException(&quot;Path contains control characters&quot;);</span>
            }
        }

        // Check for path traversal attempts
<span class="fc bfc" id="L79" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (sanitized.contains(&quot;..&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L80">            logger.warn(&quot;Path contains directory traversal attempt: {}&quot;, path);</span>
<span class="fc" id="L81">            throw new IllegalArgumentException(&quot;Path contains directory traversal patterns (..)&quot;);</span>
        }

        // Remove duplicate slashes
<span class="fc bfc" id="L85" title="All 2 branches covered.">        while (sanitized.contains(&quot;//&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L86">            sanitized = sanitized.replace(&quot;//&quot;, &quot;/&quot;);</span>
        }

        // Ensure path starts with /
<span class="fc bfc" id="L90" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (!sanitized.startsWith(&quot;/&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L91">            sanitized = &quot;/&quot; + sanitized;</span>
        }

        // Remove trailing slash (except for root path)
<span class="fc bfc" id="L95" title="All 4 branches covered.">        if (sanitized.length() &gt; 1 &amp;&amp; sanitized.endsWith(&quot;/&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L96">            sanitized = sanitized.substring(0, sanitized.length() - 1);</span>
        }

        // Validate characters (allow alphanumeric, -, _, /, ., and common URL chars)
<span class="pc bpc" id="L100" title="1 of 2 branches missed.">        if (!sanitized.matches(&quot;^[/a-zA-Z0-9._~:?#\\[\\]@!$&amp;'()*+,;=-]*$&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L101">            logger.warn(&quot;Path contains invalid characters: {}&quot;, path);</span>
<span class="nc" id="L102">            throw new IllegalArgumentException(&quot;Path contains invalid characters&quot;);</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L105">        return sanitized;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Normalizes a path without strict validation (for backward compatibility).
     * Use sanitize() for security-critical paths.
     *
     * @param path The path to normalize
     * @return Normalized path
     */
    public static String normalize(String path) {
<span class="pc bpc" id="L116" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (path == null || path.trim().isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L117">            return &quot;/&quot;;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L120">        String normalized = path.trim();</span>

        // Remove duplicate slashes
<span class="fc bfc" id="L123" title="All 2 branches covered.">        while (normalized.contains(&quot;//&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L124">            normalized = normalized.replace(&quot;//&quot;, &quot;/&quot;);</span>
        }

        // Ensure path starts with /
<span class="fc bfc" id="L128" title="All 2 branches covered.">        if (!normalized.startsWith(&quot;/&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L129">            normalized = &quot;/&quot; + normalized;</span>
        }

        // Remove trailing slash (except for root path)
<span class="pc bpc" id="L133" title="2 of 4 branches missed.">        if (normalized.length() &gt; 1 &amp;&amp; normalized.endsWith(&quot;/&quot;)) {</span>
<span class="nc" id="L134">            normalized = normalized.substring(0, normalized.length() - 1);</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L137">        return normalized;</span>
    }

    /**
     * Validates a path for lifecycle endpoints.
     *
     * @param lifecycleType The lifecycle type
     * @param path The custom path (can be null)
     * @return Sanitized path
     */
    public static String sanitizeLifecyclePath(String lifecycleType, String path) {
<span class="fc bfc" id="L148" title="All 4 branches covered.">        if (path == null || path.trim().isEmpty()) {</span>
            // Generate safe default path
<span class="fc" id="L150">            String safeLcType = lifecycleType.replaceAll(&quot;[^a-zA-Z0-9_-]&quot;, &quot;&quot;).toLowerCase();</span>
<span class="fc" id="L151">            return &quot;/lifecycle/&quot; + safeLcType;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L154">        return sanitize(path);</span>
    }

    /**
     * Validates a path for webhook endpoints.
     *
     * @param path The webhook path (can be null for default)
     * @return Sanitized path
     */
    public static String sanitizeWebhookPath(String path) {
<span class="fc bfc" id="L164" title="All 4 branches covered.">        if (path == null || path.trim().isEmpty()) {</span>
<span class="fc" id="L165">            return &quot;/webhook&quot;;</span>
        }

<span class="fc" id="L168">        return sanitize(path);</span>
    }
}
</pre><div class="footer"><span class="right">Created with <a href="http://www.jacoco.org/jacoco">JaCoCo</a> 0.8.12.202403310830</span></div></body></html><?xml version="1.0" Test set: com.clockify.addon.sdk.middleware.RequestIdPropagationFilterTest
